1111112222212.content:
Even for Larry, this was a bit too much. Looking at his own face from the third person was weird enough, but seeing it talk without him was a bit more disturbing. 'I can't really sound that annoying, right?' Larry wondered mentally as he listened to his own voice.

"Well that's, uh, wonderful Larry!" Larry told himself from Franziska's body. "I'm glad I could help, but I'm really busy. You know, lawyer stuff. I gotta go... file some papers? Litigate something? Stuff like that."

Larry's body merely nodded in accord, "I'll never forget what you did for me today! I'll see you around Franzy, you're a lifesaver, thank you!" It then pulled Larry in for a tight hug, before letting him go and skipping off.

Larry just watched himself a bit dumbfounded and breathed a sigh of relief. He was glad to have gotten out of that easily. "Three's a crowd after all," he said, flicking some hair out of his eyes, "even if two of them are me!" With a smile, he then turned and went over to the parking, putting his old body out of his mind as he searched for a vehicle. Eventually he got impatient and just pulled out Franziska's keys, turning on a car alarm.

"Wow, what a ride!" He exclaimed upon finding Franziska's rather expensive looking car. He hadn't driven in a long while, but he figured it'd come back to him. "Like riding a unicycle, right?" he reasoned as he situated himself in the front seat, trying to put Franziska's house key in the ignition. He knew that Franziska had a nice apartment or condo or something, but he never saw it personally. It would definitely be nice to go there and feel like he was living the high life for a bit! But, he was also an attractive, wealthy woman with a car in Los Angelos; there was tons of stuff he could do alone out on the town! Putting a heeled foot on the pedal, Larry decided to go...
1111112222212.title: Duck out of the way for now

choices: Larry in Von Karma's body doing whatever he wants
Edgeworth trying to find out what's wrong
Phoenix, trying to find Larry and get him out of that body
11111122222121.content:
Larry looked at Franziska's wallet to find out where she lived, and to his surprise, the address in it was that of a hotel room, The Gatewater hotel. Larry had never been to a fancy hotel before, so he hurried there. Once he arrived, he practically barged into the hotel lobby. Normally he was questioned and kicked out of fancy places like this because he had no money, but now that he did have money, he could do whatever he wanted here! Larry headed to the elevator and pressed the button for Franziska's floor.

Once in Franziska's hotel room, Larry was overjoyed by the room. He was surprised at just how big the entire thing was, even the bed was huge! He took off Franziska's shoes and began to jump on it as he looked around the room. There was a chair and a nice looking desk, and a large bookshelf with all sorts of files. Larry was a bit disappointed that there was no T.V. in the room, upon closer inspection, it looked like the bookshelf was in a place that would more suit a T.V. set, maybe Franziska ordered the hotel to remove the T.V. and bring in her bookshelf?

After jumping a bit longer, Larry got bored and stopped. Larry wondered what to do, thankfully, Franziska's stomach asked for him. Larry noticed a phone in the room and a grin spread across his face, he began to dial the number for the hotel lobby

"Hello?" someone at the front desk asked.

"Yes, this is Franziska Von Karma, I am staying at the hotel and I have a question, can I order food to my room?" Larry said, trying to imitate Franziska

"Why of course Ms. Von Karma! The Gatewater hotel offers only the best of 5 star cuisine, we can give you the chef's-"

"Bring me the biggest, juiciest, hamburger you can make!" Larry said, stating his idea of a 5 star meal.

The person on the other end of the phone was silent for a minute "Madame, you must be joking. Perhaps you want some lobster or some-"

"Bring me my Hamburger! Oh, and some soda too! Or do I have to order from somewhere else" Larry said like a child. He impersonation of Von Karma vanishing

"O-Of course Madame, right away!" The person on the other end of the line said. Both out of fear of not getting money from Franziska buying food and out of fear to what she had done to the entire staff last time she was told 'No'

Once the other person had hung up, Larry put down the phone. He wondered what to do while he waited and his eyes were drawn to Franziska's closet. He rushed over to the side of the room and opened it, alongside many fancy outfits, there was a full body mirror! Larry hopped up and down, poses in attractive ways, and overall just amused himself with the mirror for a few minutes.

After getting bored just posing in the mirror, Larry's attention was drawn to the outfits in the closest "Franzy won't mind if I try a few on." Larry said as he began to unbutton and take off the top Franziska's current outfit. As he was taking it off, he heard a knock at the door.

Larry answered the door and to his joy, a Bellboy had arrived with his hamburger and soda, Larry took the food from the Bellboy and closed the door, not even leaving a tip. On the other side of the door, the Bellboy was blushing and confused, one of the hotels richest guests just answered the door wearing only a bra as her top.

Larry sat on the bed, not bothering to put on a top, and began to eat his burger like a pig, not caring about the mess he was making on the bed or on Franziska's skirt. "I'm going to love this!" Larry said between bites.

--------14 DAYS LATER--------------

If you were in the hotel room two weeks ago, you would scarcely believe this was the same one. The bed, once clean neatly made and clean, was now unmade with blankets thrown everywhere and stains covered it. The desk, once organized with only important and relevant papers on top, was now covered in food wrappers, shopping bags and empty soda cans, as was the floor. Gone was the bookshelf, in it's place was a large T.V. Larry ordered be brought in. All the files were once organized and placed carefully on the shelf were now thrown on the ground, some ruined due to spilled soda cans.

Along with the room, the woman who occupied it was unrecognizable. Gone was the strict prosecutor who would whip all those who disobey her, Sitting on the bed watching T.V. and eating popcorn was a woman wearing only underwear and a baggy blue badger T-shirt Larry had bought.

Over the past two weeks, Larry had been doing whatever he wanted as Franziska. He had been going out to amusement parks, eating whatever he wanted, taking her car out on joyrides, even getting her a speeding ticket at one point, and he had even gone on two dates with his own body.

You know what he hasn't done? Gone to court, he was completely unconcerned with Franziska's job as a prosecutor, the only time he had really thought about it was a few days ago when he received a phone call on Franziska's cell phone.

"Ms. Von Karma, are you well? You scheduled to prosecute a case every day this month, but other than the case against Mr. Butz, you haven't shown up to court once! What is-" That was all Larry listened to before he hand up.

As Larry sat on the bed, Franziska's cell phone once again began to ring, he looked at the caller I.D. and he recognized the name. "Hey Edgey!" Larry yelled as he picked up the phone

The other side of phone was silent for a few seconds before Edgeworth began to speak "Franziska, why haven't you shown up to any of the cases you volunteered to take?" He said seriously.

"Oh, you know," Larry began as he thought up an excuse "I've just been taking a break and enjoying life! Spending my money, going on dates with the handsome Larry friend of yours. I'm even going on another date with him tonight. I'll come back to the courtroom sometime, I mean, what's the harm in missing a few cases."

The other side of the line was silent, Edgeworth hung up

-----------------

In his office, Edgeworth clutched his phone in his hands, something was definitely wrong with Franziska, she would never be so nonchalant about cases, something was wrong and he needed to find out what before her career was ruined forever. This strange behavior started last time she fought Wright in court, Edgeworth decided to give him a call.

"Hello, Mr. Nick speaking." Phoenix's voiced answered.

Edgeworth wondered why he introduced himself that way, but he had more urgent business to take care of. "Wright, something's wrong with Franziska, this began after she last fought you in court, do you have any idea what happened?"

"No, is she sick, what's wrong?" "Phoenix" asked.

Edgeworth didn't want to explain to anyone what was currently going on with "Franziska" "Nothing I have to explain to you, Wright, I'm going to question Larry about this, if he comes running to your office, tell me immediately." Edgeworth said as he hung up.

Edgeworth put on his coat and began to head out, determined to question the only other person that "Franziska" talked about, Larry Butz

----------------------

On the other end of the phone, "Phoenix" was standing worried, suddenly, "Maya" stomped into the room "Pearls, I told you, if the phone rings or someone knocks on the door, don't do anything and wait for me to switch back.

Over the past two weeks, Phoenix and Maya had been using the remote and now were pretty skilled at using it, they had tried out all the buttons and knew exactly how everything worked on it. The three of them were currently in each others bodies via 'Aware Swap.' Phoenix was in Maya's body, Pearl was in his, and Maya was currently at Kurain village in Pearl's body.

"Mr. Ed-jih-worth was worried about Ms. Von Karma, I think she's sick." Pearl said to Phoenix, sounding worried.

Phoenix's eyes widened like he saw a ghost. "I forgot about Larry." He couldn't believe that he had made such a colossal mistake, he could of ruined Von Karma's life. He hurried out the door with the remote, not bothering to switch back to his own body. He needed to find out where Larry in Von Karma's body was and get him out of that body! First, he needed to find out where Von Karma lived!

Who shall the story follow?
11111122222121.title: Check out Franziska's home

111111222221213.content:
Phoenix had to admit that he may have been a bit over anxious in running out of his office, with only the remote and no plan. He even left Pearl alone at the office with his body!

Phoenix reached down to where his pocket usually was on his clothes, but he remembered that Maya's outfit didn't have pockets and he left her cell phone at the office. So he went over to a nearby payphone and began to dial the number for Kurain Village. He asked to talk to 'Pearl'.

"Hey Nick, or is it Pearl?" Maya in Pearl's body asked from the other side of the phone.

"Maya it's me, Phoenix, we've got a problem! Do you remember the first time we used the remote? When we let Larry into Franziska's body?!" Phoenix hurriedly explained.

"Yeah, we let him in her body so you can win the- AHHHHHH we forgot to get him out of her body!" Maya yelled, realizing what had gone wrong.

"Get on the next train, I'm going to try to sort this mess out." Phoenix explained to her.

"Got it! I'll be at the office in about two hours!" Maya said, hanging up the phone.

Now that Phoenix called Maya, he dialed another number, hopefully this person would be able to help him.

"Hello? Who is this?" Edgeworth asked as he answered his cellphone.

"Edgeworth, it's me, Maya" Over the past two weeks of using the remote, Phoenix had gotten used to using a different name while talking.

"Ms. Fey, what do you want?" Edgeworth asked

"I know what's wrong with Franziska." Phoenix said bluntly.

"I spoke with Wright earlier, and I just visited Mr. Butz, neither of them knew what was wrong with her, why do you?" Edgeworth asked skeptically.

"It's not something I can explain over the phone. Do you have somewhere we can meet?" Phoenix asked.

"....Come to my office, we'll talk there." Edgeworth said, before hanging up.

----------------------------

Phoenix arrived at Edgeworth's office, he was sitting at his desk looking over some files and drinking a cup of tea, on the table was a second cup of tea he had clearly prepared for 'Maya'. "So, Ms. Fey. What's wrong with Franziska?" Edgeworth asked.

Phoenix didn't drink the tea that was prepared for him, he was more of a coffee person. "This will take a while to explain." Phoenix said before he told Edgeworth the whole story of the remote, everything from all of the functions, to how Larry was currently in Franziska's body, to how the person sitting right in front of Edgeworth was really Phoenix Wright in Maya Fey's body.

Edgeworth sat and listened to the story, once Phoenix was done explaining, Edgeworth spoke up. "Ms. Fey, you just spent 30 minutes of my time with nonsense. Do you actually expect me to believe that you have some sort of-" Edgeworth was suddenly cut off

"-Remote that can......" Maya's body began to say, before putting a hand to it's throat. Edgeworth looked down to see he was now clothed in Maya's robes, he was now in her body. It only took him a moment to regain his composure. He grabbed the cup of tea that Phoenix hadn't touched and began to drink it. "Alright, Wright, I believe you. So tell me, how did Larry end up in Franziska's body?"

Phoenix was silent "Well, that's sort of, my fault."

Edgeworth scowled at Phoenix from Maya's body "Well then, we must fix this immediately. I'll handle the planning. Rest assured, Larry won't spend another day in her body."

"Okay Edgeworth, I'm counting on you." Phoenix said, he picked up the remote and once again did an Aware Swap with Edgeworth. Unfortunately for Phoenix, Edgeworth was still holding the cup of tea when Phoenix swapped, which Phoenix proceeded to drop and spill all over Maya's robes "Ow, Ow, ow! Hot tea! Hot Tea!" Phoenix yelped in pain.

'And this is why I'm in charge of the plan' Edgeworth thought to himself. Edgeworth and Phoenix spent several minutes in silence as Edgeworth thought of a plan, eventually Edgeworth broke the silence

"EUREKA! I thought of something! So, apparently Larry in planning to go on a date with himself tonight. If I were to take a guess, he's trying to increase his own reputation by making it appear he's dating Franziska. The two of us could show up at their date and get him out of her body from there, but if he were released from her body from there he could just possess any random passerby, we can't let that happen. What we need to do is lead him to somewhere secluded either my office or yours. I highly doubt he would listen to either of us, but there is one person he is guaranteed to listen to, himself. If his own body lead him somewhere, he would think it was all part of the 'date', once we lead him to the assigned place, we can extract him from the body." Edgeworth laid out his plan to Phoenix.

Phoenix was impressed Edgeworth had thought of the plan so quickly. He nodded his head in agreement "So, who's going to be in Larry's body and impersonate him?" He asked.

"Whichever of the two of us can do a better impersonation of him, after all, the person we need to fool is himself." Edgeworth answered.

Both Phoenix and Edgeworth thought about how well the each of them could impersonate Larry. Both shivered at the thought of having to act like Larry. After some more thinking, it was decided that _____ should play the role of Larry
111111222221213.title: Phoenix, trying to find Larry

1111112222212131.content:
"Alright, I'll do it." Phoenix volunteered. "I think I'll do a better job at pretending to be Larry, after all, Larry's very energetic and spontaneous, and you're.....Edgeworth" Phoenix tried to explain without using the word 'Boring' to describe Edgeworth.

"I'll overlook that." Edgeworth ignored Phoenix's last comment. "We'll need to call Larry's body here so we could put you in it." Edgeworth said as he pulled out his cellphone and began to dial Larry's number.

"Hold on, hand it to me." Phoenix asked and Edgeworth handed over the phone once Larry had answered, Phoenix put on an act "Oh Larry, I heard you were dating Von Karma. Did you forget about little old me?" Phoenix felt vomit building up in his throat as he put on a flirty voice to talk with Larry's body.

"M-Maya, uh, I," Larry's body said, flustered. 'First Franzy wants to start dating, now Maya is flirting with me, this is the luckiest month of my life!'.

"Why don't you come over to Edgeworth's office, we can, talk, there." Phoenix flirted again, it wasn't even a second later that Larry's body hung up the phone and began to drive over. "I think I'm going to be sick." Phoenix said to Edgeworth.

It didn't take long for Larry's to arrive at Edgeworth's office. He wasn't even 5 steps into the room before Phoenix used the 'Aware Swap' button and swapped bodies with Larry's body. From Larry's body's point of view, he was now looking at himself. "Ahh! What are you?! Some kind of shapeshifting alien who wants to take my body so he could date Franzy?!" He yelled.

Edgeworth shut the Larry copy up by handing him a hand mirror. Larry looked at his reflection in surprise, he was in Maya's body! "Larry, we're going to let you be Maya for one hour. However, you must tell us where you planing to meet with Franziska for your date."

The Larry copy was too preoccupied staring at his new reflection to think about questions or think about the question Edgeworth had just asked. "I'm supposed to pick her up at the Gatewater Hotel in twenty minutes." He answered.

"Alright, Edgeworth, let's go!" Phoenix said and headed out the door. Edgeworth followed suit, however, once he left, he made sure to lock the Larry copy in Maya's body inside.

"Why didn't you just use the 'Possession' function?" Edgeworth asked curious.

"If I did that, there would be a Maya copy in her body. Maya would probably be smart enough to leave the office if it was locked, Larry, not so much." Phoenix explained.

----------------------

Edgeworth drove Phoenix in to the Gatewater Hotel to meet Larry in Franziska's body. "Oh yeah, Maya should be arriving at my office any minute now. Edgeworth, call my phone and explain everything to Maya and Pearl. Tell them to meet us at your office." Phoenix told Edgeworth as he exited the car, Edgeworth merely nodded and pulled out his phone as Phoenix walked away.

Phoenix couldn't believe what he saw, it was clearly Franziska's body, but it wasn't dressed anything like Franziska. Larry clearly just threw on a white T-Shirt with a food stain and a random pair of running shorts, neither of which looked like something Franziska owned. Her hair was a complete mess. Larry clearly hadn't been taking good care of the body.

Phoenix took a deep breath and walked up to Larry in Franziska's body, doing his best impression of Larry. "Franzy!" Phoenix said and pulled Larry in for a hug. "I left the Samurai Dog stand early so I could come and meet you!" He made up a Larry-like excuse for why he was here slightly early.

"Don't do that! I- I mean, you need as much money as you can make to pay this month's rent" Larry said to what he thought was his double. He believed the excuse because he would do something like that.

"Sorry, Franzy. Anyway, I have a super fun place for us to go on our date tonight, I even got someone to drive us there!" Phoenix said and began to lead Larry to Edgeworth car. Edgeworth was just putting his phone away, he had explained everything to Maya and Pearl. "I asked Edgey to drive us anywhere we wanted on our date tonight!" Phoenix said

Edgeworth glared at Phoenix for calling him by the nickname that Larry had given him, but he didn't say anything about it and merely went along with the act. "Yes, that's right, I am a gentlemen after all, I wouldn't turn down a favor from a friend."

Larry in Franziska's body was skeptical, Edgeworth never helped him before! However, Larry said nothing, after all, what reason would his double have to lie? He got in the car and Edgeworth began to drive off to his office.

---------------

When the three of them arrived at the Prosecutor's building, they found Maya in Pearl's body, and Pearl in Phoenix's body waiting outside. Once Edgeworth parked, Maya walked over to Phoenix in Larry's body "Hey Nick! Good job getting Larry! Maya said cheerfully.

Larry's eyes widened as he realized he'd been tricked. He stood up and tried to escape, but he stopped by Edgeworth."You're not getting away, Larry." Edgeworth said and Larry sat back down in the backseat of the car.

Before doing anything else, Phoenix swapped Maya and Pearl, so Maya was in his body and Pearl was in her own body. He then swapped himself with Maya, getting his own body back and putting Maya in Larry's body. Phoenix and Edgeworth then proceeded to drag Larry in Franziska's body upstairs to Edgeworth's office.

"So, did the Maya copy give you any trouble?" Maya said, assuming that Phoenix took Larry's body via possession for this plan.

"Well.......actually" Phoenix began to explain, but he was interrupted as Edgeworth unlocked and opened the door to his office, revealing the Larry copy in Maya's body halfway through undressing.

"You let the Larry copy in my body?!" Maya said as she ran into the office and stopped the Larry copy from going any further. The real Larry in Franziska's body smiled at the sight he just saw. Once Maya had stopped the Larry copy, Phoenix used the remote and put Maya in her own body and the Larry copy into Larry's body.

"Okay, tie Larry's body up while we hold the real Larry still." Edgeworth said, and Maya and Pearl proceeded to do just that. Tying the Larry copy to Edgeworth's office chair.

"Done! All we need to do now is have Larry Possess his own body! Oh, when Franziska wakes back up, she's gonna be mad when we explain to her what happened, you might not want to be around for that Pearly." Maya said. Pearl took the hint and began to head out of the office, planning to go home.

"Larry, if you attempt to possess any body here other than you own, we will find out, and your punishment will be much more severe" Edgeworth explained and pointed the remote at Larry in Franziska's body.

Larry didn't know what to do, if he went back to his own body, who knows what Franziska would do to him?! But, how would he escape. Then he had an idea, Maya's cousin just left, no one here would notice if he took her body! But, there was a chance they would check on her when they find out that he went to another body, he didn't have much time to think, he decided to
1111112222212131.title: Phoenix: Playing the role of Larry

11111122222121311.content:
"Larry, if you attempt to possess any body here other than you own, we will find out, and your punishment will be much more severe" Edgeworth explained and pointed the remote at Larry in Franziska's body and hit the possession button.

In a moment, Larry was once again floating in a ghost like state, just as he had been when he first possessed Franziska's body. With Edgeworth's threat in mind and Phoenix and Maya standing in the room, he went back to his own body. Franziska's body seemed to be unconscious for about a minute, a blank look in her eye, possibly a side effect of being possessed for so long. Once she seemed to regain consciousness, she began to question where she was and what was going on, after some questioning, it was clear that she was back to normal.

Phoenix, Edgeworth, and Maya explained what had happened to Franziska, they explained everything about the remote and what Larry had been doing in her body for the next two weeks. With every word out of their mouths, the look on Franziska's face got angrier and angrier. By the time they finished explaining, Franziska looked like she was going to strangle Larry. However, before she did anything, she turned to Phoenix and Maya and asked them a question "So, which one of you fools let this foolish fool into my body?" She asked coldly, as if asking who she should kill. Maya backed away and pointed to Phoenix.

Franziska reached to where she normally kept her whip, but found it to be absent. Her attention then turn to the clothes she was currently dressed in, clothes completely unfitting of a Von Karma. She looked over to Larry in fury

"Uh, you didn't have any casual clothes, so I went on a shopping spree" Larry tried to explain. This only infuriated Franziska even more. Before Franziska went insane, Maya walked up to her and whispered something into her ear. Franziska looked skeptical at first, but as Maya continued to explain, a small smirk formed on Franziska's face. Maya handed her the remote and She walked out of the office.

"Where is she going?" Phoenix asked, nervously.

"The store." Maya said, smugly.

"And what is she getting?" Edgeworth asked, and eyebrow raised.

"Ooooh, you'll she" Maya said playfully, meanwhile, Larry had a scared look on his face, it was clear he wasn't ready for the consequences of his actions.

After a while, Franziska returned from the store.........with a small cage. She swiftly pointed the remote at Larry and in an instant all that remained on the chair was a bird. The bird began to freak out, it tried to jump and flap it's wings to get away, but Larry didn't know how to fly. Franziska took bird-Larry and put him in the cage. "How long did you say this foolish fool was in my body?" She asked the other three.

"Fourteen days" Edgeworth stated.

"Then for the next Twenty Eight days he shall be stuck like this. Wright, you shall be the one to take care of this pest." Franziska ordered, no one in the room objected.

Now that Franziska had regained control of her body and trapped Larry in the body of a bird, her first priority should be to attempt to save what little bit of a reputation she had left, however, there were still two loose ends about this situation that bothered her, Phoenix Wright and Maya Fey. Because of these two, a complete fool had full reign of her life and body, nearly ruining both, these two weren't going to get off unpunished.

Thankfully for Franziska, she still had the remote in hand. She even had a punishment thought up already, for the past two weeks someone with a complete opposite personality from herself had been in her body, Phoenix and Maya needed the same thing to happen to them. Perhaps being possessed for a few weeks will teach them a lesson about meddling with other people's lives.

The question now was, who should she punish first?
11111122222121311.title: Go back to his body

choices: Follow Edgeworth, the new Maya for 42 days
111111222221213112.content:
"Miles, I am going to use the 'Possession' function on you right now." Franziska began to explain. "Once you are in the ghost-like state, possess Ms. Fey. If you don't, I will use the remote to punish you." She threatened. Edgeworth wanted to object, he didn't want anything to do with this remote, but he knew how extreme Franziska could get when she was angry, the safest thing to do right now would be to do what she says.

As Franziska used the remote on Edgeworth, Maya had a terrified looked on her face, she regretted handing the remote to Franziska earlier. He scared look turned into a blank expression momentarily before she seemed to regain some sense of composure. The terrified look on her face replaced by a scowl of annoyance, it was clear that Edgeworth was the one now inhabiting her body.

Before Edgeworth in Maya's body could speak, Franziska spoke to Edgeworth's body, now inhabited by a copy of him. "Thank you for letting us use your office, Miles. We'll be taking out leave now" Franziska said and left the office, Phoenix and Edgeworth following close behind.

Franziska turned to Edgeworth in Maya's body. "Now Miles, you are to stay in Ms. Fey's body until Mr. Butz punishment is finished, however, that is not all. Similar to how Mr. Butz put no effort into impersonating me, you are not to behave like Maya Fey. You are prohibited from doing any of her responsibilities as a spirit medium or the future head of the Kurain family. By the end of the month I want people to scarcely recognize you as Maya Fey!" Franziska named her demands.

Edgeworth was awestruck, surely she was joking?! However, he knew Franziska well enough to know that whenever she was mad, she was dead serious. He would've objected and disobeyed her, but he feared that if he did Franziska would keep him in Maya's body for a longer amount of time. So he chose to obey for now. Of course, not doing any of Maya's spirit medium duties wouldn't be hard. He hardly believed that spirit channeling was real, he had no intentions on doing it.

As Franziska explained her terms to Edgeworth, Phoenix slowly back away and began to make his way down the hallway. He had nearly escaped, but bird-Larry, whose cage was currently in Phoenix's hands, began to make noise, giving him away 'Thanks Larry, even when you can't talk you make my case worse' Phoenix thought to himself.

"Don't think you're getting out of this, Mr. Phoenix Wright. I have already chosen who I want to occupy your body, follow me." Franziska said, making her way to the door, not even bothering to look at Phoenix "And leave the bird, 'Ms. Fey' will take care out it until we return." Franziska said on her way out. Phoenix handed the bird cage to Edgeworth and followed close behind.

As Franziska and Phoenix got outside, she stopped to look for her car, Phoenix explained that Edgeworth had driven them here and Franziska's car was still at the Gatewater Hotel. They would have to walk to the place Franziska wanted to go "For making me walk, the punishment for you three has been raised to 42 days." Franziska told Phoenix. Phoenix prayed that Larry hadn't done anything else that would provoke Franziska to raise the time of the punishment.
111111222221213112.title: Maya

11111122222121312.content:
As Larry floated over the scene, he decided to gamble. Pushing past the wall, he made his way into the hall, where Pearl was waiting, chewing on one nail.

"Sorry kid, but a man has to what a man has to do," Larry murmured as he closed his eyes and swiftly took over the body of a small child. Pearl opened her eyes with Larry in control, who let loose a sigh of relief. He'd spent two weeks in a woman's body, so thankfully the only real shock was the change in age. Slowly, he shuffled over to the door, stunned by how big it now was; he could barely reach the nob! He put an ear to the door and listened closely.

"You let him do what?!" he could hear Franziska shout from the other side of the door after the situation was explained to her. A chill ran down his now tiny spine as he listened further to the conversation. The others tried to calm her down to little avail, and to Larry's worry, the conversation shifted to his (vacant) body.

"So, Larry, have you returned?" Now it was the stern voice of Edgeworth butting in.

"Uh, yeah, Edgy. I'm all normal, I promise!" He heard his body say on the other end. "Now uh... you all aren't going to hurt me, right?"

'Yes! Smart-man!' Larry thought with a fist pump. As dumb as he was, the Larry clone knew when to just go with things. He didn't really know what was happening, but he knew that whatever was going on was bad for him, and it'd get worse if he didn't reply affirmatively.

CRACK

"OW, FRANZY PLEASE!"

"EXPECT NO MERCY FOOL!"

SNAP

"AHHHHH"

Larry winced. He could almost feel the pain himself. He knew he made the right choice hiding out in Pearl's tiny form. There's no way they would even hurt him should they find the truth.

After a while longer though, Larry heard a rush of footsteps coming towards the door, and he barely moved away in time as Franziska slammed it open, marching out of the room.

"Where is she going?" Phoenix asked, nervously.

"The store." Maya said, smugly.

"And what is she getting?" Edgeworth asked, and eyebrow raised.

"Ooooh, you'll she" Maya said playfully, meanwhile, Larry's clone had a scared look on his face, it was clear he wasn't ready for the consequences of his actions.

---

Larry could barely hide the pounding of his heart as Franziska came back with a bird cage, which now contained his original, transformed body. Apparently, whipping wasn't enough. Franzy had decided that Larry needed to stay in that shape for 28 days, and he could only watch as his panic-stricken clone was carted off to where-ever Franzy decided to take him.

Not long after, Nick and Maya exited the room with a few welts as well. Thankfully, Franziska spared them similar punishments, as Edgeworth had managed to talk her down.

"She'll give the remote back Wright, I assure you," Edgeworth said as Phoenix struggled his way down the wall. "She's vindictive, but not a crook. Once Larry has served his sentence, I'm sure we can get it back from her and properly figure out what it does."

Phoenix sighed. "Yeah, you're probably right. We treated it like a toy and got into this mess. We ought to be more judicious with it."

"Awww, can't we just steal it back," Maya whined. "We were having a lot of fun! Right Pearly?" She suddenly turned her attention to Larry, who jolted to attention.

"Uh, yeah! It was, er, super fun. I really want to try it again N-Mr. Nick!" Larry had to congratulate himself on that save at the end. He had just barely remembered Pearl's term of respectfulness.

Phoenix just shook his head though. "Sorry Pearl, but at this point we'd just provoke Von Karma. We just need to be patient, okay?" He said softly, looking sympathetic to the young girl who was in truth just Larry hiding from his crimes.

What was Larry's next step?
11111122222121312.title: Possess Pearl

111111222221213121.content:
Larry knew that if he tried to get the remote back now and got caught, they would figure out that he fled into Pearl's body in no time. His best bet for now would be to be patient and stay as Pearl for now. "Okay, Mr. Nick. I hope she gives it back soon." He said in Pearl's voice.

"Come on Pearly, let's get you back to Kurain village." Maya said and took Larry by the hand. Larry followed silently until they were at the train station. When they were on the train to Kurain, Maya kept talking about what she had done in Pearl's body before she had come to help with "The Larry situation"

Larry paid little attention and only gave the ocasional "uh-huh" or nod of affirmination. He was more focused on how he would keep up the Pearl ruse for 28 days at minimum. He nearly messed up in just referring to Nick as "Mr. Nick" earlier, how was he supposed to keep it up while doing spiritual changling training or whatever the thing Pearl and Maya do was called

"Oh! We're here, come on Pearly!" Maya said as the train reached It's destination. The thankfully Maya walked with him all the way to where Pearl stayed, so he didn't too risk his cover by asking where.

Once Maya left and he was alone, he looked around, while the room was bigger than the one he had stayed in as Franziska and he had a whole building and village he could walk around. However, things in Kurain were certainly less luxurious.

He looked in Pearl's closet and found that nearly all of her clothes were identical to the robes she was currently wearing. She did have a normal looking outfits too. Larry found a mirror and stared into it "Guess this is me for the next month" he said pulling on Pearl's cheeks and making silly faces. "Might be fun to be a kid again for a bit, not like It's forever anyway". Larry said, bracing himself for the next 28 days
111111222221213121.title: Be Patient

11111122222122.content:
(Note: I goofed up and forgot an important detail of one of the previous chapters, so I rewrote this one)

As Larry started the car, he thought about where to go. There were plenty of good places around town where he could have fun with some money. His thoughts were interrupted when he felt some hunger begin to grow in Franziska's stomach.

"Guess that settles it! Thanks for choosing where to go new stomach!" Larry said, looking down at Franziska's stomach. He began to drive to a place where he often went to eat, Tres Bien. The food there wasn't particularly good to Larry, but it was French! That meant it must be good, plus France was the country of love. So a true lover must like French food! At least, that's how Larry understood things.

After a drive across town, getting only a few dents on Franziska's car, he had arrived at Tres bien. Once he went in and took his seat, he had already began having a more enjoyable time then he usually did here. Usually he had to give up most of his savings just to have a small meal here, but now he had Franziska's wallet! He went and ordered the most expensive thing on the menu, he had no idea what it was, but he could afford it!

As his food arrived, Larry spent more time eying the waitress, a woman with short hair and glasses, than time spent actually looking at his food. He usually did this, although somehow he felt that it was strange for 'Franziska' to be seen doing that.

Larry took a bite of his food...and immediately spit it out and began rubbing whatever residue was left off his tongue with Franziska's gloved hands. It was just as gross now as it was in his own body. He was honestly disappointed, but he cheered up quickly as he reminded himself that it wasn't his money that was spent.

Looking at his still full plate, Larry's mind went back to the waitress from earlier. More specifically, the waitress' uniform. He looked down at Franziska's body. "I wonder how good Franzy would look as a waitress." He thought aloud.

His mind drifted once more as he thought about was to make that possible. He could go and ask the owner of the place if he could temporarily 'work' at Tres Bien, that way he could get the waitress uniform and just change into it. Although there was the off chance that someone would actually come in and order something, so maybe he shouldn't take the risk.

After thinking it over, Larry chose to...
11111122222122.title: Have fun out on the town

111112.content:
Phoenix had just finished another long day playing 'piano' as he returned to the Wright Talent Agency, which he ran with his daughter. The place had become a second home to him during his legal career, and he couldn't bring himself to let it go even in his disbarment, so he had converted it into a talent agency while he played poker on the side. He had to admit though, gambling didn't give him much of a sense of satisfaction.

When he reached the doorstep, he noticed a small package lying on the doorstep. "Trucy must've missed it," he muttered as he picked it up. It didn't have any address on it, which was curious, but Phoenix doubted it could be dangerous. Not giving it much more thought, he opened the door and walked inside.

"Hey daddy, how was your day!" Trucy greeted Phoenix as he walked in, apparently practicing her 'magic panties' routine. Phoenix worried she might be getting too old for that to still be cute, but he didn't have the heart to tell her.

"It was fine," he replied with a smile, "but I need to take a break. I'll be in my office if anything comes up, alright?"

"Sure thing," she said as he went into his office and decided to look over the package.

---

"Pfft, body swapping?" Phoenix laughed as he read the instructions. "Did Maya send this as a joke? Suppose it gave me a chuckle if she did." He was ready to stow it away and forget about it, but the more he thought about it the more he atleast wanted to try it out. Making a living off gambling for so long was beginning to wear him out a bit. With a device like this he could switch with a lawyer and relive his 'glory days' if just for a bit; it would definitely help his self esteem. He was well acquainted with Kristoph Gavin, another famous lawyer, and he knew Kristoph also had a protege fresh out of law school. If he wanted, he could also switch with someone totally different, like his daughter or one of his friends, and try out something entirely new. It'd be nice to be someone else after seven years of disbarment.

What did Phoenix decide to do with the device?
111112.title: Pre Apollo Justice

1111121.content:
After a bit of thinking, Phoenix chose to use the remote to become another lawyer and briefly relive the good old days. "Heh, the good old days, man I really sound old" Phoenix chuckled to himself.

Now that he had decided to switch with another lawyer, the question was, who should he become? The first person that came to mind was the only other defense attorney that he had contact with, Kristoph Gavin. Phoenix has been a 'friend' of Gavin's for years, ever since his disbarment. While Phoenix severely doubted that Gavin would appreciate the swap, he didn't exactly have a say in it.

While Phoenix did have contact with two other lawyers, he didn't know if becoming either of them was a good idea. After all, these two were prosecutors. The first was a long time friend of Phoenix's and unlike Kristoph, Phoenix could say without a doubt he was a true friend. He was Miles Edgeworth. Phoenix had been in contact with Edgeworth even before his disbarment. While Phoenix knew Edgeworth wouldn't find the remote very amusing, it may be good for both of them to live in each others shoes for a while.

The other Prosecutor he knew was....less nice. She was Franziska Von Karma, the successor to Manfred Von Karma. She was one of the strictest and one of the most win happy Prosecutors around. She even carried a whip around in court, Phoenix could testify for how much she used it. Although she was very trigger happy with her whip and called nearly everyone a fool, she seemed to be a good person at heart and legitimately cared about getting the right verdict in the end. Phoenix figured swapping with her would be a nice bit of payback for all the times she whipped him.

Although the idea switching with either prosecutor rubbed Phoenix the wrong way, it may be interesting to be on the other side of the Prosecution bench for a day or two. After all, other than those two his only real choice was becoming Gavin.

After some careful consideration, Phoenix went to his phone and began to dial the Phone number of......
1111121.title: Switch with another lawyer

1111122.content:
"What're you laughing at daddy?" Trucy asked, peaking her head in through the door. "Something funny happen?"

Calmly, Phoenix put the remote back down on the desk. "It's nothing Trucy, just something I read online."

Trucy smiled, "you'll have to show me later, but I just wanted to let you know I'm heading out with a friend. I might stay with them for the night, but I'll be back tomorrow morning."

Phoenix moved a hand back over the device, "oh? Which friend?"

"Jinxie!" Trucy exclaimed. "She said she wants to show me around Nine Tails Vale. Pretty cool, right? She's got to know the Alderman, so I might even get to see his mansion."

Phoenix nodded along. "Sounds like fun! Just bring your phone along." he replied. 'Could be neat to go along. I could test the device out on Trucy and spend an evening as her, or maybe he could use it on her friend and spend an evening with his daughter, just as her friend. He decided that at least trying the device wouldn't hurt; for some reason he was just really curious to try it out.

Who does Phoenix decide to use the remote on?
1111122.title: Switch with someone else entirely

11111221.content:
"Actually Trucy, what if I had something more interesting?" Phoenix asked, which perked Trucy's attention.

"Oh? Are you keeping a secret?" She asked curiously.

"Not really, I just found it myself," Phoenix said as he lifted the remote up. "But, if it works as advertised, it'll be more exciting than anything else you'd do tonight, that's for sure."

"That's a tall promise!" Trucy replied, putting her arms behind her back as she stepped into the office to examine the device. "What does it do? Don't tell me you're just going to have us watch TV, dad."

"Hah! I hope not," Phoenix responded. "Anyways, won't know what it does properly until we try it, so let's give it a crash course, eh?"

With that, Phoenix aimed the device at Trucy and flipped one of the buttons at random. Which option did the device register with Trucy?
11111221.title: Trucy

choices: "Let's surprise your friend Jinxie with doubles."
1111122122.content:
Clicking in the shapeshift function, nothing seemed to happen at first. "I don't think it worked," Trucy stated, "what was it supposed to do?"

Remembering that the shapeshift function stored a shape and then altered the second person, Phoenix decided to hold off replying. Instead, he shrugged his shoulders and pointed it at himself, activating the device. He suddenly felt his whole view shift, losing weight and height all at once. In the blurry haze, he could see Trucy put a hand to her mouth in shock, amazed at what she was seeing. "D-daddy!"

A bit dizzy, Phoenix rose from the chair, realizing a number of new sensations. Most notably, he was his adopted daughter! Furthermore, he was also clad in her dress, cloak, and hat! His legs and arms suddenly felt very exposed in her short dress; if it weren't all so new he'd be having second thoughts about letting her dress this way. "I can't believe it!" he shouted in her voice, "it really worked!"

"Wow! Is that what that does? That's amazing!" Trucy squealed. "It's like real magic! With that, I bet I could be the most famous magician ever!" She grabbed Phoenix by the shoulders - now the same height as him - with stars in her eyes as she spoke. "Dad, you have to let me use that device!"

Phoenix blinked, still a bit numb from the experience. "Uhm, sure Trucy," he replied, "but hey, don't you want to use the device to have some fun first? It has more functions that shapeshift! There's a lot of things we could do with it! Doesn't magic ever get a bit tiring for you?"

Trucy seemed to consider it for a moment, "I guess so... its not something I think about a lot." The more Trucy thought about it, the more she realized her father maybe just wanted to do something with her. She felt a bit bad for leaping so quick to utilitarianism. "Sure! We can use it for fun first to test its limits. What do you think we should do, me?" She asked with a grin. "I've never had a twin before... it'll be fun!"

Phoenix replied...
1111122122.title: Shapeshift

choices: Trucy came back from the other room
There's a knock at the door
11111221222.content:
Phoenix thought about what to do. Going to see Trucy's friend Jinxie and surprising her with double would be fun, but he might cause her to panic. Jinxie was a very frightened girl and would put 'Yokai warding charms' on people. If she saw two Trucy's she would surely freak out, Phoenix didn't want anyone to panic over this.

"Let's test the device out some more, sound okay Trucy?" Phoenix asked her. Still shocked to hear his own daughter's voice coming out of his mouth.

"Sure thing, Trucy." Trucy said with a laugh. She was enjoying this.

Phoenix was going to use the undo button and return to his regular body, but decided not to. He just used it and he wanted to be someone else for at least a little while before being himself again. Plus, Trucy was enjoying this a lot and he didn't want to ruin her fun. He put the remote on the table

"Okay, when is Jinxie expecting you?" Phoenix asked.

"Not for a little over an hour. We have plenty of time to use the remote before then." Trucy said, hopping up and down with joy as she thought about using the remote.

Phoenix grabbed the manual from the table and handed both it and the remote to Trucy. "Here's everything the remote can do. Read over it and tell me what you want to try out. We could even go out and test it out on people we know." Phoenix explained to her.

"Okay! I'll be back in a minute!" Trucy said and went to another room in the office to read over the manual.

As Trucy went to read over the manual, Phoenix sat down on the couch. Everything felt so different. From the body itself to the clothes, everything was a new experience. His thinking was interrupted as...
11111221222.title: "Let's test the the device more."

111112212221.content:
"Well Trucy 2," the real Trucy said as she returned with the device, "I think have tons of ways to test out the device now!"

"Like what?" Phoenix asked, amused at his daughter's new nickname for him.

"Well, it says here that when you use possession, your body acts like nothing happened," Trucy said, pointing out the instructions. "But what happens when your body is someone else's?" she asked rhetorically.

Phoenix shrugged, "I can'y say I know. That's sort of uncharted territory."

"Well let's find out," Trucy said, putting the remote into Phoenix's hand. "Use that function, and lets see what your - my - whoever's body does when you leave it!"

Phoenix had to admit, it was an interesting question. He pointed the remote at himself, pausing for a moment, "here goes nothing."

Suddenly, Phoenix lifted from his body weightlessly, looking down to see Trucy excitedly stare his body over for a reaction. He noticed the remote itself seemed to be gone as he floated. He hoped it would reappear along with him.

How did Phoenix's shape shifted body react?
111112212221.title: Trucy came back from the other room

1111122122211.content:
As Phoenix floated in the ghost form above his/Trucy's body. The body started freaking out and touching itself all over. "What the-" It said as it felt the hat on top of it's head.

"Trucy! What happened?! I turned into you!" The shape-shifted body said. It seemed that when Phoenix left the body it knew nothing about the remote, like the manual said. That included when he used it to shapeshift into Trucy.

Phoenix flew back into the body. It went stiff for a second as he went back into it.

"I guess that's what happens." Trucy said with glee. "It knows nothing about the remote, so if the second you is in someone else's body, it will freak out."

Phoenix thought about what that meant. "So we would have to be careful when we use possession. If we were in someone else's body and used it, and the second version of us freaked out... well, I guess that would be a bad situation."

"So now what? I have other things I want to try using the remote for. Wanna try some of my ideas? Or do you want to try something" Trucy asked Phoenix
1111122122211.title: It still thinks its Phoenix

choices: "Just go find someone off the street."
1111122122212.content:
As Phoenix rose out of his altered body, it suddenly jolted in surprise. "What! Why am I over there!" it shouted, pointing as Trucy. Trucy herself seemed thrilled as it leaped back against the wall in confusion. "Are you my clone?! Don't hurt me!"

Wanting to forgo any further confusion, Phoenix flew down back into his body, which shook about as he returned. He was glad to be physical again, even if it was only technically his body. "Sorry about that," he said, "I'm back now."

Trucy didn't seem that bothered, "It really though it was me; like a copy or something!" She seemed thrilled

Phoenix nodded, "I guess the remote just makes the empty body act however is most convenient."

"You know," Trucy said, "with that little trick, I could be in two places at once. I could do shows on either end of town I bet, or maybe work it into one show!" She seemed to delve back into practical/theatrical applications of the remote for a bit. "You'd have to be a ghost of course, but I bet people would flood into the shows to see something this fantastic!"

Phoenix put up a hand, "lets not get too far ahead of ourselves,Trucy. We've barely even started using this."

Trucy smiled sheepishly, "Oh yeah, sorry! Anyways, I do have an idea now that I know that works."

Phoenix crossed his arms over his chest briefly, but then lowered them. He was getting used to the voice, but the body was still warding him out, "what's that?"

"Easy! You can leave your body and we'll let 'Trucy 2' go with Jinxie and give us more time to figure this thing out," Trucy suggested, pointing at the remote. "She won't be any the wiser."

Phoenix frowned, Trucy seeming to ignore a big hole in the plan. "What would I do without a body that whole time?"

"You could just take my - wait that wouldn't work," Trucy put a hand to her chin, "I suppose that would be a problem." She paused to think it over, "well, you'll just have to borrow one in the meantime."

"Like who?" Phoenix asked.

"Well, I suppose we could find someone, maybe..."
1111122122212.title: It thinks its Trucy also

choices: Wait for someone else to show up
11111221222122.content:
"Well, I suppose we could find someone, maybe...you could just go and find someone off the street." Trucy suggested.

Phoenix was unsure, something about just stealing someone's body off of the street seemed wrong. However, when he saw the begging look on Trucy's face, he put that thought out of his mind. Phoenix could stay straight-faced and argue with fierce prosecutor's back in his glory days, but he was a complete pushover when it came to his daughter. "Alright. You go hide in the back room so the second you doesn't see you and freak out. I'll be right back in a new body." Phoenix explained

Trucy had a giant grin on her face "Alright, Daddy! Make sure you hurry up!" She said and went to the back room.

Now that she was gone, Phoenix pointed the remote at himself and clicked the possession button. In an instant, he was once again floating above what used to be his body in some sort of ghost-like form. Thankfully, it didn't seem that this second Trucy remembered what happened a few minutes ago.

As Phoenix floated out the wall, he heard a knock at the door. It seemed that Jinxie was here to pick up Trucy 2. That was good, now he wouldn't have to wait for Trucy 2 to leave before he could meet back up with Trucy 1.

As Phoenix floated downward to the streets, he began to look around for a body to take. The first person he saw was another girl. She couldn't have been more than 20 years old. She was wearing a yellow dress and had her hair tied up.

While Phoenix wasn't too pleased with the idea of becoming another girl. Trucy had asked him to hurry up and it wasn't like he was expecting a better body to show up anytime soon. So he decided to....
11111221222122.title: "Just go find someone off the street."

choices: Wanted to keep testing functions at the office
Wanted to go test the remote outside the office
111112212221221.content:
Phoenix had to admit, he felt a bit bad about interrupting this woman's night, but curiosity overrode guilt. He wanted to keep trying out the remote, so he dove downwards and into the woman's body, causing her to nearly trip and fall as Phoenix took over her senses.

"Woah!" Phoenix shrieked in a new, higher pitched voice. He stood on wobbly legs, not sure how to take a step forward in the woman's heels. "Uh, alright, one step at a time," he told himself, legs shaking back and forth as he tried to make his way into the office.

"Ack!" Unfortunately, he failed and fell forward into the grass. He supposed it was better than concrete? 'Better thank Mia's ghost for buying an office with a lawn I guess...' He pulled himself back up, this time opting to just kick the woman's heels off his feet. He took a moment to brush off the woman's dress, feeling more than a bit strange as he did. Her dress was a lot looser than Trucy's; it almost felt like he was wearing a curtain around his torso; he didn't even have anything to cover his arms. The fact that it was cinched right below the chest accentuated a lot of the differences as well.

"Let's just get back inside before I change my mind," Phoenix decided, walking up to the door with his sandals in hand.

*Knock Knock*

Sure enough, the door opened on the other side, revealing a grinning Trucy. "Hello! I take it you're not here to schedule a magic show, right?" She asked, guessing who was really at the helm. Phoenix merely nodded, and awkwardly shuffled in.

"This is amazing dad!" Trucy exclaimed, looking Phoenix up and down. "I can't believe we're almost the same height now! She's really pretty too." Trucy looked a bit closer, and spied the ring sitting on Alita's hand. "Ooooh, I wonder if she's going to be married soon?"

Phoenix shivered a bit at the thought. "So long as her wedding isn't going on tonight, then I don't think it affects us," he said. "So, now that Jinxie with your clone, what do we do? Keep testing the remote, right?"

Trucy...
111112212221221.title: Possess Alita Tiala

choices: Trucy comes in the body she had possessed
Phoenix has a run in with Wocky while waiting for Trucy.
1111122122212212.content:
“Yep, let’s go!” Trucy said and began to make her way toward the door, to Phoenix’s surprise.

“Where are you going?” Phoenix asked confused. He figured that they would continue testing out the remote and its functions in the office.

“Outside of course!” Trucy said excited. “There’s only so much we could do to test out the remote in here. Plus, it will be fun to go out while you are in someone else’s body!”

Phoenix was a bit disheartened. He began to regret possessing this girl if it meant that he would he would to go out in public as her. However, he looked at Trucy’s happy face and decided to suck it up and go outside. “Fine, but I’m going to need to borrow some shoes from you.” He said as he threw the girl’s sandals on the floor.

“Sorry, but I don’t think my shoes will fit you.” Trucy said apologetically as she looked down at Phoenix’s borrowed feet.

Phoenix couldn’t help but groan a bit. Phoenix was probably going to gain some attention from passersby with how he was going to react with every step he took in this dress. He didn’t need any additional looks from people because he was walking around shoeless. He put back on the sandals and wobbled behind Trucy. He was going to need to learn how to walk in these things and do it quick.

As he and Trucy walked down a few blocks, he asked Trucy something he really should have asked back at the office “Where are we going?”
“To People Park. While you went to get a new body I realized. You’re the only one who’s gotten to enjoy being in someone else’s body. I want to go and get one too.” Trucy explained her plan.

As Phoenix nearly tripped again in these heels, he questioned the whole ‘Enjoying someone else’s body’ part of what she said.
Once they had reached People Park, Trucy began to explain what she was going to do. “You wait right here, I’m going to use the Possess someone else, I’ll be back as fast as I can.” Trucy said.

Phoenix was a bit uneasy about letting his daughter go and possess someone else’s body, but he decided to let her do it. He aimed the remote at her and clicked the Possession button. In an instant her body was standing there confused and soon began to walk back in the direction of the office. ‘I hope that her body doesn’t call Jinxie or something like that’ Phoenix thought about whether this was a good idea or not.

Phoenix waited in the same spot for Trucy, he wished that the girl’s body he had taken had some kind of purse or something. With him just holding the remote in his hand, he was afraid of someone taking it or of him dropping it and getting trapped in this body.
1111122122212212.title: Wanted to go test the remote outside the office

11111221222122121.content:
The wait lasted about five minutes. After 3 minutes he started to grow a little impatient. Was Trucy ever going to get back? Or... was she already back and pretending to be someone else so that she could-

"BOO!" Shouted a voice from behind him. "Gotcha, Daddy!"

"Trucy, don't scare me like that!" Phoenix scolded. He turned around to find that Trucy was in the body of...
11111221222122121.title: Trucy comes in the body she had possessed

111112212221222.content:
Phoenix decided against possessing the stranger. For whatever reason, he didn't think possessing her was a good idea. He thought that it might be best to wait a few more minutes and see if anyone else would turn up instead.

Luckily, someone did. About a minute later, he noticed a brunette-haired woman with a lab coat walking by. It was Ema Skye! Even though he'd still be a girl, Phoenix thought it would definitely be a better idea possess someone he knew. But at the same time, possessing her might not be a good idea as well. She was a detective, so he didn't know when an emergency could pop up.

In the end, Phoenix decided to...
111112212221222.title: Wait for someone else to show up

1111122122212222.content:
"No, she probably has work right now," Phoenix said to himself.

Another girl walked by. This was getting tiring. Would someone male ever show up? The girl looked to be about sixteen or seventeen and was wearing a black school uniform. She had a few flowers in her hair.

"Well, if she's in school, I might be able to get away with taking her body for a little while. There aren't many important events you can go to in a school uniform, after all."

What does Phoenix decide to do?
1111122122212222.title: Wait longer

choices: He runs into someone who knows Juniper
11111221222122221.content:
Deciding that he had spent enough time waiting and flew toward the teenager and possessed her. Everything went dark for a short period of time before Phoenix regained consciousness. The first thing that he felt was the breeze between his, or rather, the girl's legs. Even though he had just shapeshifted himself into Trucy a few minutes ago, the sheer strangeness of being in such a young, female, body was nearly impossible to believe. He looked down at himself and began to examine the body he had just taken

The girl's uniform was definitely easier to wear than Trucy's magician clothes, but Phoenix would have a hard time saying that he was 'comfortable' in either of them. While Trucy's cape did an okay job at covering her body's arms, Phoenix could still feel that he was wearing any sleeves. In contrast, this girl's uniform had long sleeves. Unfortunately for Phoenix, both Trucy's dress and this girl's uniform left his legs very exposed. He doubted he would ever get used to that feeling. 'Maybe I should have possessed Ema, at least she wore pants!'

Phoenix looked back up and realized that he misjudged how close this girl was to the office when he had possessed her. She was about two blocks away. Phoenix began to walk back to the office. As he was walking, he took notice to the girl's hair. It was much longer than his and Trucy kept hers tied up near her neck. With every step he took he felt it move and tickle the back of his neck.

With how long Phoenix waited for a body to come by he expected Trucy to be waiting impatiently by the door for him. Phoenix couldn't help but wonder though, did the girl he had possessed have any plans for the afternoon? While he supposed he had no way of finding out, he hoped that his body hijacking wouldn't affect this girl's life in anyway. He chose to put those thoughts out of his mind and just keep walking toward the office.

Does anything happen to him on his way to the office?
11111221222122221.title: Possess Juniper Woods

111112212222.content:
As Phoenix sat on the couch and took in all the new sensations, a knock at the door interrupted his thoughts. (Oh, I'd better get that,) Phoenix thought. But just as he was about to open the door, the sudden realization that he wasn't switched back yet dawned on him. He looked over at the other room. Trucy could be back any second. It would probably be better to just switch back and get the door.

But what if he didn't? It was a risky gamble and it would definitely freak whoever was on the other side out if anything didn't work out in his favor, but the consequences wouldn't be serious. He could rarely afford to take a risk these days, so the idea of taking this one was alluring to him.

Does he play it safe and switch back, or stay as Trucy and pretend to be her?
111112212222.title: There's a knock at the door

1111122122221.content:
Phoenix decided it would be best not to risk it and Shapeshift back to his own body. Unfortunately, he remembered that he had given Trucy the remote when she had gone to the back room. He had no way to change back right now. "Maybe they'll realize no ones home and go away." Phoenix accidentally thought aloud.

"Hello? Trucy? It's me." The person on the other side of the door said, hearing Phoenix. Phoenix wanted to slap his forehead for making such a stupid mistake. He supposed he had no choice now but to answer the door.

Phoenix opened the door was was greeted by the face of Jinxie Tenma, Why was she here? Trucy said she wasn't supposed to be here for a little over an hour, there was no way he was on the couch for that long. "Your here early." He said, he tried to imitate how joyful Trucy sounded all the time, but there was an obvious nervousness in his voice. He didn't want anyone else to know about the remote yet.

"I'm sorry, I just wanted to show you around Nine Tails Vale as soon as possible! Of course, we'll have to be careful, there's yokai all over that town! Don't worry though, I'm prepared!" Jinixe said as she pulled out a yokai warding charm.

As she talked about what kinds of yokai she had 'seen' in Nine Tails Vale, Phoenix couldn't help but think to himself 'Trucy's friends are about as normal as the witnesses I used to cross examine. Hopefully she never ends up witnessing a murder'

"Are you ready to go, Trucy?" Jinxie asked once she was done.

Although Phoenix didn't want to go, since this was supposed to be Trucy's evening plans, he didn't really have a choice. First off, he didn't want to end up spoiling Trucy's friendship with Jinxie by refusing to go with her. This wouldn't be a problem if he could quickly switch back to his own body, but sadly that wasn't a possibility. If he were to rush to the back room, there was a chance that Jinxie would see that there was two Trucys, which would lead to a whole lot of awkward explanation. Phoenix also needed to leave quickly, Trucy could come out of the backroom at any second which would also lead to Jinxie seeing two Trucys.

"Sure, let's go." Phoenix said hesitantly and let with Jinxie. 'Hopefully Trucy figures out why I suddenly left the office' He thought to himself as he walked
1111122122221.title: He stays as Trucy

11111221222212.content:
Trucy heard the sound of a door closing from the other room. She went out to see why, but only found an empty room.

"Daddy? Are you still here?" Trucy asked. No response, as she half-expected.

The feeling that this might be another parental vanishing act was hard to shake. (No, I trust Daddy. And even if he was going to leave, he'd at least do it in his own body!) thought Trucy. She checked for any traces of him or anyone else to try and piece together where he could have gone.

Is she able to piece together what happened or not?

Phoenix quickly ran into the other room.

Is reading the manual enough to stop the switch back from going awry?
