choices: Before the end of the game
1123212.content: Does she find it before or after the end of the game?
1123212.title: Spirit of Justice

11232121.content:
It was odd to think about, but Phoenix Wright's trip to Khura'in was the longest she'd gone without seeing her father in person her whole life. Even longer than when her first dad ran away, crazily enough. Either way, the trip was a pretty big disruptor to the status quo, and having Apollo and Athena as de facto guardians was unsurprisingly hectic. But that was nothing compared with what was to come.

One unusually quiet night, Trucy heard a sharp, singular knock on her bedroom window. She glanced at it, only to find a cardboard box slip just out of view and hit the ground below. She went outside, found that it was labeled with her name and address, and brought it back in.

Excitedly looking over the contents, she found a strange remote-like device and an instruction manual. She put her finger to her chin. (What could this be?) she wondered, examining the remote with her free hand. She checked the instructions and all became clear. It was a body-switching remote! Whatever that meant!

Quietly, she found a sleeping Athena (who was staying with her for the time being) and attempted an "unaware swap", which switches their bodies without anyone noticing a change, just to see if it worked. One look at her feet and it was clear that her blue pajamas had been swapped out for Athena's yellow ones. One look at Athena's now awfully Trucy-esque face and the remote's power was confirmed. She quickly switched back and left the room.

So, Trucy had a magical remote control with the power to switch bodies. What did she plan to do?
11232121.title: Before the end of the game

112321211.content:
Trucy considered using the remote for something practical like magic, but she couldn't shake the feeling that using it for something like that was in some way cheating. Real magic shouldn't be used in a magic act! (A magic act is only cool because it isn't actually magic!)

So, now that practicality was out the window, she was left with recreational uses. That was still a pretty open selection of choices.

She peeked back into Athena's room. She was out like a light and the night had just started.

The night had just started. She had enough time to flip everything around to the point that even she wouldn't remember what went where by the time everyone woke up, if she so chose. But she could take a different approach and simply wait until morning. She'd be a bit easier to catch, but she'd also get to see the immediate payoff of her actions.

So which did she go with?
112321211.title: Mess around.

112321212.content:
So she had the power to swap bodies, she decided. Why not do something productive with it?

Of course, with such a mystical device, her mind jumped to her magic act. The use of a body switching device would be both impressive and undetectable!

On the other hand, maybe some other use would be a better way to make the most out of this situation.

What did she pick?
112321212.title: Do something practical.

1123212121.content:
The best thing to do with the remote would be it improve her magic act. After the Mr Reus incident, Trucy had to stop using a particular trick. After all, if everyone who watched her trial knew of the secret behind the trick, they wouldn't be amazed by it. This remote would be a suitable replacement for that trick. Trucy had a show tomorrow, so she had the rest of the night to think of a trick with the remote.

Trucy spent the next hour or so think of a way she could use the remote in an act, eventually, she thought of something. She called it "The amazing transforming assistant!" She would transform her assistant (Either Apollo, Athena, or one of the Famme sisters) into other people, right before the audiences eyes!

Trucy had even practiced how she would use the remote during the show! She would point her wand at the person she wanted to shapeshift, but that was merely to distract both the audience and her assistant. The remote itself would be in Trucy's other hand, concealed by her cape. During the trick she would quickly pull the remote out of her bag and quickly put it back in after the trick.

She practiced the trick while looking in the mirror for quite a while, she wanted to make sure she had perfected the trick before tomorrow. After she was satisfied with herself, she finally went to bed.

The next morning, everyone was preparing and helping her set up her show, Trucy made sure to remember to bring the remote with her this morning and, before she went to the show area, she made preparations for her trick. The 'Shapeshift' button could register the forms of multiple people, all you had to do was select which person you wanted the target to shapeshift into. Trucy spent most of her morning running around and registering people's bodies for the shapeshift. She had around 15 bodies saved, more than enough for the show.

The question now was, who would be her guinea pi- lovely assistant for this brand new trick?
1123212121.title: Magic

choices: She turns Apollo back to normal
She turns Apollo into someone else
11232121211.content:
"C'mon Polly, I need your help for this trick!" Trucy was begging Apollo to help her with the show.

"No way, not after last time." Apollo was being stern about not helping not helping Trucy out with this show.

"Pleeeeasse?!" Trucy asked again.

Apollo tried to refuse again, but he caved in and agreed to help. "Alright, but no cutting in half, no stuffing in a box, and no sword tricks."

"Deal! Don't worry, all you'll have to do it stand still and watch me work my magic!"

The show went great for the most part, the audience liked Trucy's magic panties trick and everyone loves Mr. Hat. However, the show wasn't over yet. It was time for the grand finale!

"For my final trick, I bring in my assistant, Polly Justice!" Trucy announced and Apollo sheepishly walked on stage. "Watch, dear audience, as I change Polly before your very eyes! This is my new trick, The Amazing Transforming Assistant! No tricks, no gimmicks, only real magic!" Trucy announced her trick to the audience.

She pointed her wand at Apollo, while simultaneously secretly pointing the remote at him and pressed the Shapeshift button! Within a few moments, Apollo began to shrink and his clothes changed. Before he could even process what was going on, he had changed into an exact replica of the Famme twins. He was understandably shocked.

The audience clapped at Trucy's trick. "Thank you, thank you, but I'm not done yet! I have plenty other people to turn Pollu into, but first, let's ask Polly how he feels!" Trucy said and motioned for Apollo to speak.

"T-Trucy, what did you-" Apollo began to speak, but stopped once he heard the unfamiliar voice exit his mouth.

"You're speechless, I see! Well, without further ado! Let's change even more!" Trucy said and pointed the remote at Apollo again and pressed the shapeshift button.

Apollo once again began to change, he had regained his height, but sadly not his gender. He was now an exact copy of Athena. However, Trucy pressed the Shapeshift button to register Athena while she was asleep, so Apollo was now dressed in Athena's pajamas

"It looks like Polly's ready to go to bed! Too bad there's no sleeping during my show!" Trucy said and pointed the remote at Apollo again

Apollo once again shrank half a foot, once this shapeshift had finished, he could barely see a thing. The only source of light was two tiny holes in front of his eyes. He was wearing a cardboard box over his head! He couldn't look down at himself to see who he had become, but he had a good guess about who it was.

"Now he's trying to hide from my Magic! That won't do!" Trucy said and turned to the audience "Maybe if he was an amazing magician, he would appreciate the magic more! What do you say folks? Should I make him a magician?" The Audience cheered in agreement with Trucy, who once again pointed the remote at Apollo.

This time, Apollo Shapeshifted into and exact copy of Trucy. As with the other shapeshifts, the only thing he could do was stand still with his mouth agape.

"Alright, Polly, now that you're the magician, I'll let you say bye to the audience!" Trucy said and practically skipped off stage, trying to hold back laughter.

Apollo attempted to end the show in the way Trucy normally would, but he just ended up running off stage after Trucy. The audience clapped the whole time.

Apollo confronted Trucy "Trucy! How did you do this?!" Apollo practically yelled.

"Magic." Was the only thing Trucy said.

"Well, turn me back!" Apollo said, not wanting anything to do with this.

"Sure thing, Polly!" Trucy said and once again pointed the remote at him
11232121211.title: Apollo

112321212113.content:
Trucy discreetly pointed the remote at Apollo just as she had been doing, but this time, he didn't change. That was peculiar. And very worrying.

"Quit stalling, Trucy," said Apollo. "I'm uncomfortable."

Trucy could do little more than stare. "...Uh... yeah, I'll be a sec. Just have to... recharge the ol' magic! Haha!" Trucy said, running further backstage and into her dressing room.

Apollo was left alone, an exact copy of Trucy, backstage. He waited patiently, though, right where she left him. He twiddled Trucy's thumbs. He hoped he wouldn't have to get used to looking exactly like her.

Trucy was hoping the same thing, but the remote hadn't worked, which is why she needed to check the thing. She took a seat in her room and pressed the same "reverse" button again.

How did the remote respond?
112321212113.title: The remote doesn't work

1123212121132.content:
As she pressed the "reverse button", Trucy was presented with an error message. While she was glad to see the remote was working as intended, it was still not fun to see what had caused the remote to stop shapeshifting.

What error message was the remote displaying?
1123212121132.title: With an error message.

11232121211321.content:
Renaining daily uses: 0; Please wait 23:54 until recharge. Was what was displayed on the remote's screen. "What?! I can only use the shapeshift 5 times a day?!" Trucy yelled out shocked at the remote's limit. She would have to be careful in the future about not using it too much, but, putting the future aside, she had a big problem right now. Apollo was stuck looking like her for the rest of the day!

Deciding that she couldn't just sit around in her dressing room all day, Trucy sheepishly exited and walked toward where Apollo was. "Heeee, Polly, funny story..." Trucy began to speak.

"Tell me after I'm back to normal." Apollo said and began to tap his transformed foot impatiently.

"Well then, you're gonna have to wait a long time for me to tell you, like, until tomorrow." Trucy said, trying to turn the bad news into a joke.

"WHAT?!" Apollo yelled. "What do you mean I'm stuck like this for the rest of the day?!"

"Well, um, my magic can only transform people five times a day apparently." Trucy explained, she left out the fact that a remote caused all of this. She didn't want to share it.

"I don't believe you, magic isn't real." Apollo said.

"If magic isn't real, how are you currently in my body?" Trucy said smugly, Apollo tried to say something, but he couldn't think of a suitable explanation.

"So, what do I do now?" Apollo said, unsure how he would get through the next 24 hours.

"Dunno." Trucy said nonchalantly. "I guess you can just wait at home and I'll come around to change you back when my magic's ready."

Apollo thought it over and decided that was the best course of action for now. "Alright, but the moment you're ready, change me back." Apollo demanded.

"Don't worry! I'll change you back as soon as possible, but until then, enjoy being in the body of an amazing magician." Trucy said with a smile.

Apollo walked away, he walked very awkwardly as a result of not being used to Trucy's body. As Apollo walked away, Trucy looked at the remote and wondered what to do now. She couldn't use the shapeshift function until tommorow, but did the other functions still work right now?

"Only one way to find out!" Trucy said with a grin and walked off, her goal to test if the other functions still worked right now. "I wonder if Jinxie will want to help me?" she said to no one in particular as she headed off toward Tenma town
11232121211321.title: Renaining daily uses: 0

choices: Pass the time, trying to ignore any changes.
Explore the opportunities now opened to him.
112321212113211.content:
Apollo eventually made it back home, though the walk there could hardly be called pleasant. For the first half, after he shuffled his way out of the theater and dodged every question pointed his way, his long walk was punctuated by him losing his balance every few steps. But, possibly even worse, it was like some switch flipped and for the rest of the trip it was like Trucy's muscle memory had kicked in and began walking with a cheery feminine gait. His brain wished he knew what his body found so enjoyable about all this. He would never get an answer for that.

But all trips come to end, as did Apollo's trip home. Relief washed over Apollo as he went inside and took a seat.

So he was home. Now what?
112321212113211.title: Follow Apollo

112321212113212.content:
Trucy made here way to Nine-Tails Vale to see Jinxie, she made sure to call ahead to tell Jinxie that she was coming. She also told Jinxie over the phone that she had something amazing to show her.

Once she got there, she began to make her way toward Kyubi manor. After the murder of the alderman, no one was living in the manor. The place was being cleared out and all of the alderman's belongings were being removed. It was a sad sight to see. Jinxie had been helping with the clean-up. As Trucy made her way into the manor, she bumped into Phineas Filtch, the caretaker. He seemed to be helping out with the clean-up, but Trucy had a feeling he was lining his pockets with the alderman's belongings.

Trucy saw Jinxie up ahead and waved high to her, after they exchanged greetings, Trucy told Jinxie about the amazing package she had received last night. She told her all about the magic show she had this morning and how Apollo was currently an exact copy of her. After going on and on explaining everything she had done with the remote, she reached into her bag to show it to Jinxie. She paled as she felt what was in her bag, nothing.

There was nothing in her bag! The remote was gone. She thought back, did she forget to bring it with her? No, she remembered bringing it with her right after she tried to change Apollo back. Did she drop it? No, it was in her bag the whole time and she never dropped anything that was in her bag before. Was it stolen? Who would have....Trucy then remembered who she had passed on her way into the manor. Phineas Filtch!

She turned around to see if he was still in sight, she had to get it back before Filtch finds out what the remote could do. As Trucy turned around, something happened. What happened?
112321212113212.title: Follow Trucy

1123212121132122.content:
Trucy quickly turned around, ready to run toward Filtch and get the remote back. However as she turned around, everything began to go dark and within seconds, she couldn't feel anything. She had been possessed.

Trucy's body blinked for a few seconds before immediatly looking down at itself in shock. Filtch had just pickpocketed the remote from Trucy. He had no idea what it did, so he just pressed one of the buttons and the next thing he knew, he was a ghost! In his panic, he flew over to the remote's owner for help , but the second he had touched Trucy, he went into her body.

"Trucy, is something wrong?" Jinxie asked who she though was her friend.

Filtch looked up at Jinxie, he knew he couldn't just tell her bout what had just happened, he'd be treated like a crazy person. "No, everything's fine" Filtch said with a fake smile while rubbing his hands together. As he rubbed his hands together, he noticed he was holding something, the remote! It must have followed him after the possession.

"Thank goodness, after you stopped moving and starting staring off into the distance, I was afraid you had been possessed by a Yokai" Jinxie said

'Well, you were half right' Filtch thought to himself. He wondered what he should do now, with this remote he could do anything! There was no way he would be giving this thing back.

Speaking of the remote's owner, perhaps he should just stay in Trucy's body for now. She was the only one who knew of the remote, so if he stayed as her, he wouldn't have to worry about her taking it back.

Or he could just use the same function that he used earlier to float into another body, one that Trucy wouldn't be able to notice was acting differently.

Either option was equally viable, but which one did Filtch decide to do right now?
1123212121132122.title: Trucy's consciousness fades (She's poss...

11232121211321222.content:
Filch quickly pointed the remote at himself and pressed the posession button. As soon as he did that, Trucy seemed to regain consciousness and stormed off in his body's direction. Lucky for Filch, she wouldn't find anything. So now left the question of who to possess.

The obvious was Jinxie Tenma, who watched Trucy walk away confused. She was standing right there, and since she was friends with Trucy, she'd be a very unlikely suspect for the pickpocketing.

Did he go with it?
11232121211321222.title: Possess someone else

11232121211322.content: What was the error message?
11232121211322.title: Something else.

112321212113221.content:
"Out of battery" was the message displayed on the remote. "What?!" Trucy said shocked that this remote, the remote that can do impossible things like swap bodies around and transform the bodies of others.....ran out of battery power. She turned the remote around and saw there was a battery hatch. She removed it with ease, luckily it seemed that this impossible device runs on Double A batteries.

Thankfully, she had some in the dressing room, so replacing it was no problem. However, as she replaced the batteries, she noticed something in the battery hatch. It seemed to be another button for the remote. This peaked Trucy's interest, the manual didn't mention anything about a fifth button. She wanted to try it right away and she had the perfect test subject oly a room away, Apollo!

She left the dressing room and began to sneak toward Apollo, making sure he didn't see her. She pointed the remote at him and pressed the new, unknown button.

What effect did the new button have?
112321212113221.title: Out of battery

1123212121132211.content:
With an excitable, secretive press of the mysterious fifth button, nothing seemed at first to change. Trucy's first thought was that maybe it was some kind of universally-unaware swap but she dismissed that as a little over-the-top and pointless.

It was strange. When had the idea that something was over-the-top ever stopped her mind wandering before? And even this suspicion from nowhere felt odd. All of these thoughts and feelings made sense to her, and yet everything she knew about herself made it obvious that she shouldn't be thinking this way. That was what made no sense!

But she watched a smile grow on what looked to everyone like Trucy's face, and as Apollo began to look around the room with increasing excitement, barely capable of preventing himself from walking around backstage and talking to the crew like they work for him, it became obvious to her what this fifth button did.

"Personality Swap."

For some reason, the urge to keep haphazardly using the remote as she had been grew much weaker. She started to wonder if keeping this all a secret from him was that great of an idea in the first place.

Does this personality shift convince Trucy to come clean?
1123212121132211.title: Reader's Choice

11232121211322111.content:
Trucy decided that the best thing to do for now would be to come clean to Apollo and tell him about the remote that caused all of this. The more she thought about it, the more she thought it was outright silly that she kept it secret in the first place. She walked over to Apollo, who was still walking around backstage with excitement.

"Hey, Apollo. You probably already know this, but I lied about how I caused your body to change." Trucy began to explain "The thing that caused it was this remote, I'm sorry for not telling you." She said and show Apollo the remote.

Apollo eyed the remote in fascination. He thought it was amazing. "So, if that remote can change bodies, you can turn me back to normal at any time?"

"Yes, in fact, I'm going to turn you back to normal right now." Trucy said and pointed the remote at him.

"Wait! do I have to turn back right now? I barely had any time in this body." Apollo protested, he didn't know why, but despite really wanting to go back to his own body a few minutes ago, he now really wanted to stay as Trucy, something about being a magician really seemed to appeal to him right now.

Trucy thought about it for a minute, Apollo seemed to really want to stay as her for now, but the more she thought about it, the more risky it seemed for there to be two Trucy Wright's walking around and no Apollo Justice. "Sorry, Apollo, but that won't do. I can't have two of me running around. Plus, you have your job as a lawyer to think of, what if a case pops up while you're in my body? I'm going to turn you back right now."

"Aww, you're no fun." Apollo said with his head down. Trucy pointed the remote at him and pressed the 'Undo Shapeshift' button. In a few moments, Apollo was back in his normal body. "Well, I guess I'll head home now, since you won't let me have any fun." Apollo said and began to walk away. Trucy noticed that he walked the way that she normally walked.

Trucy wondered what to do with the remote now. The more she thought about using it for the magic trick she had done today, the less it appealed to her. In fact, the entire idea of putting on magic shows didn't appeal to her at all. She thought that it was most likely a result of the 'Personality Swap'

As she wondered what to do, she thought of two ideas. The first was the most obvious, swap her personality back. Everything would be back to normal and she would be her true self again, but did she really want that right now? She currently had Apollo's personality and was thinking a lot more rationally and acting more mature than she normally did. Did she really want to go back to being her usual, childish and spontaneous self?

The other idea she had was to 'Aware Swap' with Apollo before he got too far away. The thought of being a defense attorney was suddenly very appealing to her. At least, more appealing than being a magician. Plus, Apollo wanted to be her a few seconds ago, it wasn't like she was stealing his body against his will.

What did Trucy decide to do?
11232121211322111.title: Reveal the remote to Apollo.

112321212113221112.content:
"Wait, Apollo!" Trucy called out.

"Yeah, Truce?" Apollo answered.

(Ugh, nicknames. I regret every time I ever called him "Polly",) Trucy thought to herself. Anyway, she waited for Apollo to get in inside voice range and then spoke.

"Well," said Trucy, "I have an idea, that I think would be best for both of us, just for the time being."

"Yeah?" said Apollo.

"How about we just switch bodies with this?" Trucy asked, holding the remote out to Apollo.

"It can do that, too!?" Apollo said, practically bouncing. "Yes! Absolutely!"

"Okay. Get ready."

Trucy pointed the remote at her, then at Apollo, pressed "aware swap", and suddenly found herself looking out through Apollo's eyes. This felt right. And from where she was standing, it looked like it felt right to Apollo, too.

"Yay! Thank you, Truce!" Apollo said, giving Trucy a bear hug. Trucy shrugged him off. "No problem. Here, get this thing away from me," she said, passing the remote to him.

"Really?" Apollo asked.

"Yeah. I'm sick of the thing."

"Well... thanks! I'll see you!" Apollo said, running off with Trucy's body. Besides his memories, there wasn't really any way to tell a clear difference between him right now and Trucy normally. The same applied to Apollo's body's current occupant.

So, who do we follow?
112321212113221112.title: Aware Swap with Apollo

1123212121132211121.content:
Apollo was practically skipping. He was extremely happy that Trucy swapped their bodies, for some reason, Trucy's body just felt natural to be in. He couldn't think of himself being a defense attorney, it just didn't feel right, but the image of being a magician and performing for crowds felt completely natural. He was no longer Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney, he was Trucy Wright: Magnificent Magician.

Plus, she also gave him the remote! With this he could do whatever he wanted! He examined the remote to see what buttons it had. Each of the buttons were labeled with one word. 'Aware', 'Unaware', 'Possession', and 'Shapeshift'. The shapeshift button had a small screen with pictures of bodies (Some of which Apollo recognized as the ones he had been turned into earlier) and a small 'Undo' button. He flipped the remote over and saw that the battery hatch was left open and their was a small unlabeled button next to the batteries.

His mind wandered with the possibilities of what he could do with it. Obviously he would continue to use the Shapeshift button for Trucy's Amazing Changing Assistant act, but there were other things he could try out in the meantime! His wondering about what to do was interrupted however, by an argument.

"You must let me in! I need to know how Trucy Wright accomplished that feat!" A familiar voice yelled. Apollo recognized the voice as belonging to Wesley Stickler.

"I'm sorry sir, but Trucy isn't in right now." Bonny De Famme said.

"That does not matter! I merely need to look through her belongings! I need to know how she accomplished that transforming act! Even her magic panties trick looks plausible compare to that!" Wesley practically yelled.

Bonny was left silent due to the much taller man yelling at her, she was never good at standing up to others when Betty wasn't around.

Apollo looked on at the argument with a bit of rage. How dare Wesley yell at Trucy's assistant (And by extension, now Apollo's assistant)! Apollo was going to walk over and yell at Wesley, when he got a dubious idea. One involving the remote.

He aimed at Wesley and pressed one of the buttons, then he proceeded to point at Bonny and press the same button. What did Apollo do to them?
1123212121132211121.title: Follow Apollo in Trucy's body.

11232121211322111211.content:
"No objections?" Stickler asked. Bonny couldn't work up the courage to say anything. "Very well, then. If you will excuse me..."

As Stickler walked by to enter the building, Apollo snuck up behind him. Then, a few moments later, Welsey fell, and Bonny took a step forward for what looked like no reason. But Apollo, of course, knew why she'd done that. Apollo was the one who caused it in the first place.

(Wow, this thing is really cool!) Apollo thought to himself.

He walked over and started helping Bonny, in her new body, up from the fall.

"Ugh..." Bonny said. "Trucy? I thought you already left."

Apollo took Bonny's hand and pulled her to her feet. "I was about to, but I heard yelling. Are you okay?"

"I think so..." Bonny said, still yet to notice anything amiss.

Then she looked down.

"Trucy-!?" Bonny said, gasping as she heard her voice. "Something very strange is happening!"

Apollo nearly started to giggle, but then he remembered how scary it was when it happened to him and held it in. "What's happening?"

"I..." Bonny said. "This is going to sound strange, but... I don't think I'm actually this man."

"Really?" said Trucy. "Who are you?"

Bonny spotted her body, watching from a distance with a suspicious look in her eye. "I think that's me."

"Hm..." Apollo said, tapping a finger to his chin. "And how do I know you're not just pretending to be Bonny so I let you in the building?"

Bonny frowned. "What!? I would never do something so rude!"

Apollo smiled. "Then that proves you're not him!"

"I suppose an inferior mind such as your own is predisposed to such insults," Bonny's body said.

Bonny forcefully pointed at her body. "See? I would never say such a thing!"

Apollo was pretty sure he'd had his fill of Bonny panic. He could explain the situation in private, but that risked Wesley eavesdropping, and he didn't want to give out the secret and leave the aftermath for when he inevitably gave Trucy her body back.

So what did he do? Did he risk it?
11232121211322111211.title: Aware Swap

112321212113221112111.content:
Apollo wanted to fill Bonny in on the remote, but pulling Bonny away to talk about something in private would be the equivalent of asking Stickler to eavesdrop on them and learn about the remote. If there was anyone he didn't want to now about it, it was Stickler. Apollo planned to have fun with the remote at Stickler's expense.

Apollo feigned ignorance for now "Hmm...if you're Bonny, and Stickler is in your body. Then you two must have swapped bodies!"

Wesley sighed from Bonny's body "Surely that conclusion didn't require much brain power."

Apollo ignored the insult, for now "So, how did you two swap bodies?"

"I have no idea! I just want to be in my body again!" Bonny said from Stickler's body.

Before Apollo could respond, Wesley pointed at him and began making accusations "Whose to say that you didn't cause this?! You clearly possess the ability to do impossible things to people's bodies. You yourself demonstrated that in your show today!"

Apollo supposed he was right, Trucy was changing his body during today's show, maybe he should have just watched this situation from a distance. "Well, whose to say you didn't do this?" Apollo threw back a fake accusation at Stickler.

"What?!" Stickler said in shock.

"Yeah, you probably tried to steal Bonny's body so you can sneak backstage and try to find out the secrets behind my tricks!" Apollo said with a smug smile.

"How dare you?! I am an intellect, not some body snatching thief. I have no means of causing impossible circumstances such as this and even if I did, I would never do so!" Wesley desperately tried to defend himself.

"Uh-huh sure, I don't believe you. In fact, I'm certain you cause this." Apollo said, he was determined to keep the blame from himself. Bonny remained silent as the argument unfolded before her. Apollo pointed at Wesley "And as punishment for stealing Bonny's body, you have to do her job and clean up all of the props for the show!"

"Hm, I am above doing such pointless tasks for those I owe nothing to." Wesley refused.

"Oh, you do. After all, you work for me 'Bonny'. Now you better hurry, or your sister will yell at you." Apollo reinforced his order.

Wesley knew that any attempt to argue would just lead them into an infinite loop, so he chose to obey for now and went off to clean up the props.

Apollo turned to Bonny in Wesley's body. "Go home and rest for now, I'll see if I can find a way to get you back to normal" He told her, she nodded and walked away.
112321212113221112111.title: Keep it a secret.

choices: Betty was told about the change.
Betty was doing clean-up somewhere else. Nothing important.
1123212121132211121111.content:
What an exquisite opportunity this was! Despite his initial apprehension towards manual labor of this nature, it occurred to him in a flash of wisdom from the heavens that he could take advantage of this situation to examine the props he had been instructed to handle and to, in doing so, find any measure of trickery involved in their construction.

The auditorium was completely empty, save for the stray props he'd been tasked with putting away. This was his chance! He first chose to examine the magic panties once again, simply because that meant he'd have it out of his sight more quickly. He learned nothing new, as expected, and put it away.

That wasn't what he was interested in anyhow. It was that insane shape-shifting trick! He had earlier suspected real magic, but he had now decided that there was no way. No stage magician would be so cruel to trick-spotters such as himself as to use real magic in their act, would they? Of course not, it was utterly inconceivable in every respect!

He located an odd-shaped shoe mark from when Apollo's shoes changed in place, and searched the area for some sort of hologram or melting clay or... something at all. But there was nothing. Not even a hole in the ground! Maybe it really was real magic!

"Bonny! Have you only put away one prop this whole time!?"

Wesley turned to face the voice behind him. It was Bonny's twin sister, Betty de Famme.

"Oh... my apologies," Wesley said, struggling to think of an excuse. "I was sidetracked."

Betty clenched her fists. "'Sidetracked' isn't going to get us home in time to watch the Castlevania reboot, you lazy bunny! Hurry up!"

That scared Wesley into focusing on the cleanup, but considering how long she was gone, he couldn't help but wonder what she'd been doing all this time.

Was she being brought up to speed on the body swap?
1123212121132211121111.title: Follow Wesley as Bonny

choices: Betty accidentally let's the fact she know about the swap slip
11232121211322111211111.content:
----Ten minutes ago----

"So, you're telling me that some crazy fan is now in the body of my sister?" Betty asked, not believing a word about what Apollo claimed. "I'd sooner believe that you're magic was real."

Apollo sighed, he supposed he'd have to show Betty proof that the swap was real. He aimed the remote at Betty and pressed the shapeshift button. In a few moments, Betty's body had morphed into an exact copy of Trucy's. She immediately looked down at herself in shock. "Believe me now?" Apollo asked smugly.

Betty was silent for nearly a minute, she examined her new body, just making sure that all of this was real "How'd you do this?!" She practically shouted.

"Magic." Was the only word Apollo said, just as Trucy had earlier.

Betty didn't believe it, but she couldn't think of any other explanation. "Okay, I believe you."

"Good." Apollo said and shape-shifted Betty's body back to normal.

"So, what do you want me to do about the fan in Bonny's body?" Betty asked.

"Whatever you want. He needs to be taught a lesson. Work him as much as possible." Apollo said like he was giving mission orders.

"Oh? and what's in it for me?" Betty asked, she wasn't going to do this without reward.

"Any body you want. I can switch bodies around and shapeshift people. If you give Stickler the worst day of his life, I'll give you ANY body you want." Apollo stated his offer. "Just make sure he doesn't find out that I caused the swap or that that you know he isn't Bonny"

A wicked smile appeared on Betty's face. "Deal"

-----The present-----

The wicked smile hadn't left Betty's face as she watched Wesley in Bonny's body do all the work. She was going to have some fun. Both in giving Wesley orders all day and in what will come after
11232121211322111211111.title: Betty was told about the change.

choices: Nothing important. Just a random bird pecking at the window.
1123212121132211122.content:
Trucy went back to the office. She remembered that Apollo kept some mangas there that he "wished he could wipe his memories of so he could experience it for the first time again", so, now that she had his personality, it made logical sense that it would appeal to her in this state, too, and so here she was.

She recognized the one at the top of the pile as one of said "forget and read again" mangas, so she grabbed it, sat down, and flipped it open. It was strange. It was some weird story about a boy raised by banished royalty in a magic kingdom. She spent an hour or so reading it, but she just didn't get the appeal. Maybe it just reminded him of something she didn't know about.

But her pondering found itself interrupted by a rhythmic knocking sound. What was it?
1123212121132211122.title: Follow Trucy in Apollo's body.

choices: Trucy gives Apollo a break... for now.
Trucy decides that the fun's not over yet!
1123212121132212.content:
As any good designer of a product of this magnitude would need to foresee when creating even the prototype, there would have to be some form of failsafe in the event that it was used irresponsibly. If they had an ounce of sense, they would implement some way to prevent situations from becoming so unbelievably convoluted that it would require an eternity to fully untangle the effects of a few days of what would seem at first to be harmless pranks. Anyone who would design this remote without a reset feature is frankly, a complete and utter buffoon who should not have such powers, much less give it to an underage magician with a penchant for pranks. Without it, lives could and would be destroyed irreparably if the remote were lost, damaged, stolen, or otherwise tampered with.

Thankfully, the designer of this device was somewhat competent when they had the bare minimum amount of morality required to place just such a feature on the remote, well hidden enough that it wouldn't be noticed at first glance by those malicious enough to remove it. The button's text had long since faded away, likely due to many, many former users of the remote having remorse for their actions and ha, no. It was usually the victims forcing it away and mashing that button to high hell and back. Fortunately for Trucy, the remote was also designed sturdily enough to withstand those impulses of the madly driven.

Fortunately for Apollo, Trucy had the impulse to press said "reset" button. As Trucy pressed the button, Apollo's form shifts up a few inches (though not as many as he'd claim it did), and his clothing shifted back to its former pristine white button up shirt and boldly striped vest. The cape melded into his back, changing into a deep burgundy backing, and a teal tie (aka fashion noose). The hat as well shifted along with his body, its threads moving along Apollo's torso in a surely unpleasant experience to provide the extra material necessary to create some pants with a length longer than the knee.

Now that Apollo was back to normal, he looked down at his now ungloved and rebraced hands. He was shocked and surprised that Trucy got on the ball so quickly! He knew she would eventually, she was a good person like that, but he did think that she would've taken her sweet time getting him back to his former form.

Now comes the real question:

Does Trucy want to shift him back, or is she going to leave him be for the time being?
1123212121132212.title: Be kind, and rewind.

11232121211322122.content:
As Apollo turned back to normal, Trucy realized what this button must be. The Shapeshift button already had an undo function, which meant that this new button must have been a reset button. One that could undo everything that the remote had done. Granted, she may have been jumping to conclusions, but it was the first logical thing she thought of. More importantly, this meant one other thing. She could do whatever she wanted with this remote and not have to worry about going around and individually undo everything she had done! This would save her so much time!

Now, onto the matter at hand, Apollo. As Apollo looked around for Trucy (So he could say thank for turning him back to normal and then get as far away as possible) He suddenly felt another change, this felt familiar "Oh no-" Apollo began as his body once again morphed. He once again lost his height and gender, his clothes also changed. In a few moments he was once again an exact copy of Trucy Wright. "-Not again"

After changing him, Trucy walked up to him with a large smile on her face. "See, I changed to back to normal, no problem at all."

"But you immediately turned me back into you!" Apollo practically yelled.

"Shh! People are staring!" Trucy urged him to be quiet.

"Turn me back to normal......and let me stay that way!" Apollo demanded.

"Aw, C'mon Polly! What's wrong with being me?" Trucy said

"I can think of way too many things to count." Apollo said in a deadpan tone.

"Well, when you put it that way.....nope!" Trucy said and stuck out her tounge.

Apollo just stared at her angrily.

"I was going to go around and use my magic on other people, but since you're already here, why don't we both have fun with this?" Trucy asked.

"You were going to do this to other people too?!" Apollo asked, shocked that Trucy was haphazardly using this on anyone she felt like.

"Yup! Don't worry, I can turn everything back to normal at anytime! So, you wanna join in the fun?" She asked him.

Apollo considered Trucy's offer, his answer was obvious. He had to go along with her, just to make sure that she didn't do anything potentially dangerous with this power. "Fine, I'll go with you."

"Yay!" Trucy said happily as she hugged Apollo. It felt strange to hug herself. "Oh, it may be weird for there to be two of me walking around. Want me to change you into someone else? There's plenty of people I can turn you into! Or do you want to stay as me?" Trucy asked.

"Can't I have my own body back?" Apollo asked, desperate to be himself again.

"Nope." Trucy said and once again stuck out her tounge

What did Apollo choose?
11232121211322122.title: Trucy decides that the fun's not over yet!

choices: Switch over to the new clothes.
112321212113221221.content:
Apollo lets out a sigh as he slumps down a little bit, "Alright, well, it's gonna be a lot easier to keep track of things if I just stay as you. Besides, there'll be a lot less to explain if we end up bumping into whoever I would've picked. Frankly, I would rather not get arrested for identity theft today. Flattery may be the sincerest form of flattery, but I don't think someone like Blackquill would be as into the idea of someone parading around as him."

"Oh, Blackquill! Polly, that's a great place to get started! What do you think would be best, him getting swapped on stage, or a surprise role reversal in court? That'd be way past awesome!"

"..."

"Fiiiiiine. One step at a time; I'm sure you'll see things my way once we get the ball rolling." Trucy grabs Apollo by the hand to take him into her dressing room.

Trucy enters the dressing room, with Apollo being dragged in close behind her. "First thing's first. We need to get some more batteries for this thing." Trucy waggles the remote a little, "I am not having our fun cut short again! Now with these," Trucy grabs the batteries and throws them all in her magic panties. As she does her usual hammerspace routine to make them disappear, her smile grows wider, "These'll last us at least a whole day of fun! Imagine it Apollo, the limitless possibilities! Anything is possible!"

"Yeah, no kidding. Anything is possible." Apollo parroted back at Trucy, though with a far less enthused tone whilst raising an eyebrow.

"That's what I said, Polly! Glad you're getting the picture!" Trucy seemed to have missed the tone that Apollo was speaking with.

Trucy was suddenly distracted by an idea she had. Apollo could see the lightbulb going off in her head, and only put his arms down in a futile attempt at self-defense when he saw her put the remote down to start combing through her dressing room's closet.

She mumbles to herself, "Where did I put that thing? I know I left it around here somewhere... C'mon... Ah, there it is!"

Apollo walks forward, somewhat concerned by Trucy's sudden and manic search through her belongings to find some unknown outfit that he had no clue about.

"Ta-dah!" With perfectly practiced bravado, she twirls around to present Apollo with an old outfit of her. It was practically a palette swap of her stage magician's outfit, right down to the little bangles at the end of each point of her cape. The only differentiating factor was that the primary color of choice was red, not blue.

"Thought you might like this outfit, Polly! It's in your favorite color~!" Trucy sang as she rocked it back and forth a little.

"What, don't you wanna be twinsies~?" Apollo replied, his singing unintentionally devoid of the sarcasm he meant to place in it.

"...Y'know, you are absolutely right! The type of magic we could get up to would be way better if we just dressed the same! We would be able to do magic that would knock the socks off even the Femme twins!"

"Tell you what Polly, why don't you make the call again? Do you want to have a little originality in your act, make this a duo? Or do you want to make this a synchronized solo so we can make some magic? It's totally up to you!"

What does Apollo do at this juncture?
112321212113221221.title: Stay as Trucy

choices: Try the remote on other people
Apollo comes up with his own suggestion
1123212121132212212.content:
After the minimum amount of consideration, Apollo chose to change into the outfit that Trucy had picked out for him. He wanted to have some amount of familiarity while in Trucy's body, even if that familiarity only amounted to the color of his clothing. "I'll change into that outfit." Apollo told Trucy.

"Alright! Here you go! Now hurry up and change! We have people to pizzazz!" Trucy could barely hold back her excitement. She left the dressing room while Apollo changed clothes.

Apollo sighed, this was not the kind of day he was expecting when he woke up this morning. He tool off the outfit Trucy's body was currently wearing and began to change into the other one. He kept his eyes closed for the sake of Trucy's privacy. The process of changing clothes took a while (Due to Apollo being unable to see what he was doing), but he eventually finished. He exited the dressing room and found Trucy waiting outside "....Ta...da" Apollo said with half enthusiasm and struck a pose.

"What took you so long? You weren't looking at my body, were you?" Trucy joked around.

"Believe me, the idea never crossed my mind." Apollo said, no lying required.

"So, what should we do now?" Trucy asked for Apollo's opinion.

"You're the one who could change bodies, I'm just following your lead right now." Apollo said with a shrug.

"Polly! That won't do! We're a duo now, you have to make some decisions too!" Trucy said.

Apollo raised an eyebrow at that statement, he had been making many choices since Trucy had transformed him. However, he chose not to argue with her for now "Alright, what are my choices?"

"Well, we could go around and test this out on whoever we want. Don't worry about messing people's lives up though, I have a way to undo EVERY change we make all at once. So we can do whatever we want, no problem." Trucy explained the first of Apollo's choices, as vauge as it was. "OR, we could practice our magic act! After all, we can't have one Trucy be a master magician and the other knowing as much magic as a lawyer."

Apollo gave it some thought and eventually came to his decision, he and Trucy would....
1123212121132212212.title: Switch over to the new clothes.

11232121211322122121.content:
Apollo shrugged. "Okay, I guess the first one. Like you said, no permanent consequences."

Trucy bounced. "I agree! Let's do it!"

So they're going to use the remote to mess with people. But what in particular are they going to do?
11232121211322122121.title: Try the remote on other people

11232121211322122123.content:
"Actually... I have an idea of my own," Apollo said, arms crossed.

Trucy crossed her arms in turn. "Oh? Okay, let me in on it!"

What was the idea?
11232121211322122123.title: Apollo comes up with his own suggestion

112321212113221221231.content:
Apollo thought to himself that the quickest way out of this situation would be to make Trucy as sick of body-switching as he could, and that meant going big. So, how to go big?

Eventually, it occurred to him, just as Trucy had run out of patience. "Come on, Polly! Out with it!"

Apollo put a finger to his forehead. "Okay, here's my idea. How about we go around town, and shapeshift everyone we can into you?"

"...Whoa." Trucy looked to the side, deep in thought. "Why?"

"... I dunno, marketing?"

"...Whoa." Trucy turned back to face Apollo. "So... we go around town, turn everyone into me and then back, and then use it to promote my show?"

"Sure."

"...Whoa." Trucy took out the remote, staring intensely at it for a few moments. "This is the best idea I've ever heard."

(And the most mentally exhausting,) Apollo hoped.

So, Trucy-fying rampage it is. But do they decide to wait, or go and do it now?
112321212113221221231.title: Reader's choice

choices: Someone they knew, and they noticed the remote
Someone they knew, and they were completely confused as to what was going on
1123212121132212212312.content:

Trucy looked around at her handiwork and smiled. "Looks like we change everyone around here, let's go somewhere else!" She said as she playfully marched off. Apollo followed close behind, he didn't want to lose track of the real Trucy in this chaos.

"I gotta hand it to you Polly, you actually had a fun idea for once." Trucy said with a laugh. Apollo gave her an annoyed look, if you asked him, he'd say he was always a pretty fun person. Although, this situation was the complete opposite of fun in his eyes.

11232121211322131.content:
Eager to test out this new, mysterious button, Trucy pointed the remote at Apollo and pressed the button. In a mere moment, Apollo suddenly had a blank look on his face and stopped moving entirely. Trucy watched, waiting for something to happen, but nothing did. She walked up to Apollo and waved a hand in front of his face. "Hello? Earth to Polly." She said, but got no response. He just stood there like a statue. This made Trucy worried. "Say something Polly!" She practically yelled.

"Something." Apollo said, he suddenly looked confused "Why did I say that?" He wondered aloud. He seemed not to notice that he had been unresponsive a few seconds ago.

Trucy let out a sigh of relief, glad that nothing was wrong with Apollo. She was still confused as to what the button did though. It didn't seem like Apollo's body changed at all. He was still acting like himself too. She wondered what changed. Thinking back on what happened a minute ago, she had a vague idea. She pointed the remote at Apollo again and pressed the button again.

Once again, Apollo's expression went blank and he stopped moving.

"Say, 'I'm Trucy Wright, world's greatest magician', Oh, and say it like how I would" Trucy commanded.

"I'm Trucy Wright! World's greatest magician!" Apollo said, doing a perfect impersonation of Trucy. After he said that, a look of fear appeared on his face. "Trucy! You need to change me back fast, I think your body is starting to make me act like you!" He said, clearing not remembering the command Trucy had given him.

Trucy smiled, she now knew what the new button was. 'Command'. It seemed that whenever the button was used on someone that person would have to do whatever they were told to do. Trucy's mind began to wander when thinking of the possibilities, but first, she would need to test this button's limits.

She pointed the remote at Apollo and he was again entered the vacant state. "Polly, tell me something you would never tell me." Trucy said, testing out how vague she could be with commands

"I keep my money inside my law books." Apollo gave away a secret, he suddenly began to freak out "AHH! Forget you heard that! Why do I keep saying weird things?!"

Trucy made a mental note of some books she'd have to read later as she pressed the button again. It was clear that this remote could control what people said, but could it make people do things? "Polly, for the next two minutes, run around in circles making airplane sounds!" Trucy commanded with a smile.

Apollo began to do exactly what she said, but not without getting looks from people around him. While doing what she said, he didn't say anything, he was unable to due to one of the things she ordered being "Make airplane sound the whole time", but he was mentally aware of what he was doing 'Why can't I stop?!' He thought to himself as his body refused to listen to him.

Once the two minutes were up, Apollo sat on the ground and tried to catch his breath. Trucy could hardly hold back her laughter. It seemed that this command button would lead to a whole lot of fun. The question now was, should she keep testing it out on Apollo? Or should she go find a new person to try it out on?
11232121211322131.title: Reader's choice

112321212113221311.content:
Trucy chose to keep using it on Apollo for now, after all, he was sitting right there. Why waste time looking for someone else to test it out on? "Hmm, what to try now?" Trucy thought before she got another idea. She pointed the remote at Apollo and once again pressed the command button. "Apollo, you can only refer to yourself by the body you're in" She said. Apollo seemed to go back to normal, but there was only one way to find out "Hey, Polly. Who are you?" Trucy asked.

Apollo was very confused by the question "What are you talking about Trucy? I'm Trucy." He said, his eyes going wide at the end of his sentence "Why'd I say that?! I'm not Trucy, I'm Trucy!" He shouted, once again getting his name wrong. "I'm Trucy Wright, I'm a magician!" He said, losing his patience

"Gee, Polly. I didn't know you liked being me so much. Trucy said with a giggle.

"Trucy, I'm not in control of what I'm saying. You have to change me back fast!" Apollo practically begged.

"Sure. I'll turn you back, if you can tell what your body looks like." Trucy said. She already knew that Apollo couldn't say his name, but could he describe who he was to other people?

"You know what I look like! I'm a girl, I have brown hair that I keep in a pony tail, I always wear a magician outfit." Apollo began to attempt to list things about himself, but due to the command, his sentence was twisted so he described what Trucy looked like.

"Well, in that case. You're already in the right body! You're exactly how you described!" Trucy said with a smile.

"I told you I'm not in control of what I'm saying!" Apollo yelled again.

Trucy couldn't stop giggling at the results of this command. She wanted to go further with this? How much could he have Apollo do at once? Could she have him act like her? If she did that, it would be like having a twin. Of course, on the inside Apollo would probably be screaming and trying to protest against acting like Trucy, did she really want to do that to him?

Another idea she had was to make Apollo think he was in the right body. Sure, to everyone else he would still be Trucy Wright, but he would think that everything was normal. He'd go about his daily routine, just with her body.

Of course, those were only the first two things that popped into her head. She was sure that if she put her mind to it, she'd think of plenty of fun uses for this function. So, what did she do?

Apollo snapped out of his trance and looked around "Huh? Where'd they go?" He asked confused, wondering why Trucy and Ema left him behind.

Ema snicked "It looks like it worked. He can't see us standing right in front of him" Apollo didn't react to Ema talking either, meaning that the not hearing part of the command was working too.

Apollo stood up, thinking that Trucy and Ema left him behind, he peaked his head out of the dressing room, trying to see if Ema and Trucy were in the hallway outside.

"Yeah, but let's see if he reacts to what we do to him." Trucy said before she ran behind Apollo and pushed him out of the dressing room.

As he landed on the floor, he looked around. "What just happened?!" He said, to him it was as if an unseen force suddenly propelled him forward. As he stood up again, Trucy and Ema ran out of the dressing room after him. Trucy made sure to lock the door on their way out.

Apollo tried to open the door, only to find it locked. "What?!" He practically yelled. He was sure no one else was in there, there weren't exactly many places to hide in that room. He tried everything he could to get the door open, but it was no use, the door was locked. If it weren't for the command, he would hear Trucy laughing right in his ear.

He looked around to make sure no one was around, he didn't want to be seen by anyone in this outfit. Even if he wasn't really himself, the situation with Ema earlier made him nervous. He just kept blurting out that he was Apollo for no reason. He feared what would happen if he ran into someone else he knew and said the same things. It was bad enough having Ema know, he didn't want anyone else to.

"Well, Dr. Skye, I believe it's your turn to try it out." Trucy said as she handed the remote to Ema.

Ema adjusted her glasses "Why, Thank you." She said and pointed the remote at Apollo. She was really excited to try the remote out for herself, she had just seen Trucy use it, but the experience of using it herself was completely different. The question now was, what to do to the test subject? What did she do to Apollo?
112321212113221311321112112211.title: They make Apollo not notice at least one of them

1123212121132213113211121122111.content:
Ema pressed the hidden button and Apollo froze in place again, staring blankly into the distance.

Ema had wanted to simply test the functions of the device -- to see what it was capable of and what areas of the brain it was capable of overriding -- but now that she was holding it...

What did she really choose to utilize this function for?
1123212121132213113211121122111.title: Used another command

choices: Ema doesn't want to do that
11232121211322131132111211221111.content:
"Alright Trucy. We know that we can make him do things, and make him not notice things, but can we make him see something that really isn't there?" Ema asked the hypothetical question.

Trucy seemed to think about it for a second before she talked " Well, I guess there's only one way to find out"

"Okay, first, let's lead him to the main stage." Ema said before turning to Apollo. "Apollo, you will walk to the main stage area." She said and Apollo began to walk against his will.

Once they got to the main stage area, Ema pressed the button again and gave another command "Apollo, your brain will register this stage as a courtroom. You are currently in a trial and that fop Klavier is the prosecutor." Ema gave her command.

Suddenly Apollo began to look around, he then ran to the left side of the stage "your honor. The defense asserts that the defendant is Not Guilty." Apollo began to give an opening statement to an invisible judge. He didn't seem to even notice he was still in Trudy's body.

Ema and Trucy sat down and watched the show before than. Apollo was having one sided conversations with a judge and prosecutor that didn't exist. Eventually, the two of them got bored.

"Hey, how about we join in?" Trucy suggested

"Huh?" Ema asked

"We make him think that we're the judge and prosecutor. We can have a bit of fun with this little mock trial that way. I bet you could make Polly pull his hair out as Klavier" Trucy explained her idea

Ema shivered at the thought of anyone seeing her as that fop, but she had to admit, it could be interesting. Did she agree to try it out?
11232121211322131132111211221111.title: Seeing how far she can push it, for science

choices: Apollo starts to remember more clearly.
Trucy finds him before that happens.
11232121211322131132112.content:
As they had equal strength, this tug-of-war was a matter of pure strategy, and Apollo managed to win with a surprise jerk of the wrist, sending the remote flying out of Trucy's hand. Immediately, Apollo bolted, choosing to hide underneath the Penrose stage to examine it more closely while Trucy searched up above.

Staring at the remote, he found that he couldn't interpret what most of it meant. Although that "shapeshift" button sounded awfully familiar. It looked like he'd found the secret to that trick. Apollo rolled his eyes. That was clearly cheating.

But more importantly, he still couldn't shake that odd memory of the remote being pointed at him. He sat under the stage, staring at the remote, for what felt like a good twenty minutes. Is that enough time for it to hit him?
11232121211322131132112.title: Apollo gets the remote

choices: Command her to do embarrassing things
Take advantage of his current body to mess with her life
112321212113221311321121.content:
As Apollo stared at the remote, memories began to flood into him. He remembered Trucy pushing a button on the bottom side of the remote and telling him to do things. He also remembered doing everything that she said against his will. He then realized that was why he was wearing all the outfits Trucy made him wear. He got mad over this. Trucy was controlling him against his will!

He heard Trucy's footsteps nearby. He quickly ran out from under the stage and pointed the remote at her. He pressed command button and suddenly she stopped moving. Was this what happened to him whenever she used it? "Trucy, you will stand still and only talk when answering my questions." Apollo gave a test command, and it seemed to have worked. Now for the interrogation "Trucy, where did you get this remote? and what does it do" He asked her. Trucy told Apollo everything she knew about the remote. He now had a good understanding about what was going on. "Okay, so. How often did you plan to use it on me?" Apollo asked, wanting to know how close he came to dodging a bullet.

"Anytime I got bored." Trucy answered.

Apollo's gritted his teeth. She planned to do embarrassing stuff like this to him all the time. Well, two could play at that game. He may be stooping to her level, but there wasn't exactly any other way he could get back at her. He thought of embarrassing punishments for her. He needed to think of something big enough that she would never even consider using the remote on him again.

The first idea that came to his mind was using the 'Command' function on her and having her do embarrassing things, like she had done to him. Of course, as Trucy told him, this had a limitation. She would only do the things he said, so any unexpected event could help her fight off the command.

The other idea came to him as he looked down at his current body. To the rest of the world, he was Trucy Wright. He had access to everything. He had her magic career, her friendships, her home, her love life. If he worked hard enough, he could mess those all up for her. Not in a major way, of course. Just enough that she wouldn't want anything to do with the remote. The only problem would be that he would have to do all of that himself

As Trucy stood motionless, Apollo thought the two ideas over. In the end he decided to....
112321212113221311321121.title: Apollo starts to remember more clearly.

1123212121132213113211211.content:
No, no, messing with her life was far too cruel. If "an eye for an eye" was bad advice, then "both eyes for an eye" was even worse. He'd settle for one eye, and that meant run-of-the-mill, inconsequential embarrassment. Of course, it was going to be much harder to find a way to embarrass Trucy, the girl who once spent over an hour repeatedly mentioning her panties in public without clarifying that it was a prop, but he could at least start by narrowing his options down.

He could just use the "command" function on Trucy in her normal state, but he also had a huge library of shapeshifting templates, not to mention the other functions. So, does he choose to use them, or just the vanilla command function?
1123212121132213113211211.title: Command her to do embarrassing things

1123212121132213113211212.content:
Apollo tried to think of commands to embarrass Trucy with, but no matter how much he racked his brain, he couldn't think of something that could embarrass her. Whether that was a compliment to Trucy or an insult to himself is up to debate. He elected to go with plan B instead, take advantage of the fact that she put him in her body. He pointed the remote at Trucy and shapeshifted her into an exact copy of him. He then pressed the command button. "Trucy, for the next 3 days you will act exactly like me. You also won't let anyone know about this swap. Head straight for my home and get ready for my daily routine tomorrow." He ordered her and she walked off, walking exactly how he would.

Apollo looked down at himself and wondered if he made the right decision. Sure, he would get the chance to mess with Trucy, but he also just condemned himself to being her for three days. "This better convince her." Apollo told no one in particular. He looked at the clothes he was currently wearing and wondered if he should change, he opted against it, he had seen that closet far too much today.

He wondered what he should do to mess with her life. The first thing that came to mind was her magic show, he was sure she had another coming up soon. If he wanted, he could ruin the show with a horrible performance or something like that. Maybe even doing something on stage that people would forever judge Trucy for. He wouldn't do anything too major of course, he wanted to teach her a lesson, not ruin her entire career.

The next part of her life he currently had access to was her home, Mr. Wright was currently in Khura'in and Trucy as staying with Athena. If he went to her home and did a bit of 'Re-arranging' to her bedroom, no one would bat an eye. He may even look around a bit and see if he could find any secrets Trucy might be hiding from everyone. That would get back at her for the "Tell me where you keep your money" command Trucy had given him earlier.

The third thing Apollo thought of was messing with her relationships with her friends. Apollo had to admit, he didn't know much about Trucy's private life. He would just cause a few little fights with some of the friends he did know she had. Once again, nothing too major. He couldn't forgive himself if he permanently damaged a friendship.

After thinking over these ideas, Apollo decided to...
1123212121132213113211212.title: Apollo takes advantage of being in Trucy's body

choices: Attempt to get better control over this power
Try to find a way back to normal
11232121211322131132113.content:
As Apollo and Trucy struggled to pull the remote from each other, they both ended up losing their grip at the same time, the remote landed on it's face, pressing all the buttons at the same time. There was suddenly a bright flash and both Apollo and Trucy passed out.

Apollo was the first to wake back up, he looked down at himself and saw he was still on Trucy's body. Nothing seemed to have changed. Before Trucy woke up, he grabbed the device. He had no idea how it worked, but it's clear it was responsible for what was happening all day

He looked at the remote and saw that it's screen only said ERROR ERROR ERROR "That's not a good sign" he said in Trucy's voice.

Next to him, Trucy began to wake up, she saw that Apollo had the remote "Aw dangit." You got it first. "I was hoping to make you wear De Famme's outfit next"

As soon as Trucy said the name, Apollo felt his body begin to morph, within second he was an exact replica of one of the De famme twins. "What?!" Apollo said as he looked down at his new self, he was sure that the remote was how Trucy was doing all of this, how did she change him?

"Woah! How'd that happen? Maybe I really am magic!" Trucy said with an ammused smile.

"This isn't any fun for me, you have no-" Apollo's sentence was briefly cut off "-idea how shocked.....I....am" he said....with Trucy's voice!

He was now in Trucy's body again, but unlike before where he had shapeshifted, he had now swapped into he body and she was in his.

"How'd that happen?" Trucy said looking down at her new self, now that she was involved against her will, she wasn't as enthusiastic.

"I don't know! Can you switch us back please? I'm tired of looking like you." As he finished his sentence he once again felt a sudden change in his body. He once again had the body of one of the De Famme twins. "Thanks" he said

Trucy looked at him confused "I didn't switch us back yet?" She was clearly unaware of what had just happened.

After some more talking and some more random changes, Apollo and Trucy had figured out what had happened. They had somehow gotten the remotes powers and it would activate whenever they spoke a sentence that can be interpreted as one of the functions.

Throughout their conversation, they had accidently done Aware, Unaware Swap, Shapeshift, and Command several times. They hadn't accidently possessed one another yet, so that one probably needed a more specific phrase.

What do they do now?
11232121211322131132113.title: The remote is dropped on It's face

112321212113221312.content:
The remote felt heavy. Body switching felt like child's play now that she had this kind of power!

Apollo stood up. "I... have no idea why I just did that. I feel like I just lost my mind."

Trucy had had enough of Apollo, at least for the time being. There were so many more possibilities to explore!

She used it on Apollo again. "Hm... Okay, I want you to start twirling around in circles until I'm out of sight, then, as soon as you can't see me anymore, forget everything that happened in the last two minutes and leave. Go!"

Apollo obeyed, twirling away. Trucy struggled to stifle her giggles as she rounded the corner.

So, Apollo was taken care of. What did Trucy plan to do next?

At what point does she finally decide to take action?
1123212121132213121.title: Use it for fun.

Trucy was feeling sad to say the least. She was just getting off the plane from Khura'in with her dad and the others. Well, except for Apollo. Apollo had chosen to stay behind in Khura'in and reform the legal system. It was his choice and she supported it, but she missed him. Over the past two years she had gotten pretty close to Apollo, they were practically siblings in her mind, but now he was gone and it would be quite a while before she would ever see him again.

She needed something to cheer her up, that's when she remembered the remote she had received a while ago. She hadn't used it at all since the first day she had it. It wasn't like she had completely forgotten about it or anything, she just didn't have any chance to use it since that day, but now that things seemed to have calmed down a bit, it was the perfect time to use it again.

She looked around at the people around her. The first person she eyed was Uncle Edgeworth. She rarely saw him because he was always busy with his duties as chief prosecutor. Who knows when the next time she would get a chance like this? If she wanted to try it out on him, she needed to act fast.

The other two people she eyed were her dad and Athena. They seemed to be as conflicted about Apollo's decision as she was, maybe if she used and possibly shared the remote with them, they would cheer up a bit?

She needed to make her decision fast as they were leaving the airport. She chose to use the remote on...
11232121211322131212.title: After the end of SoJ

112321212113221312121.content:
The more Trucy thought about it, the more she realized that this was probably the only chance she would ever get to use the remote on Edgeworth, she aimed the remote at him and pressed the Command button. "Edgeworth, you'll take me to your place so we can try out this remote. Oh, and make sure Daddy thinks this was your idea, okay?" Trucy commanded. She added the last part so she wouldn't be accused of pestering Edgeworth.

Edgeworth walked over to Phoenix. "Wright, it appears that Trucy is still feeling very upset about Mr. Justice's decision. Perhaps it would be best if I took her out someplace to relax." Edgeworth suggested.

Phoenix put a hand to his chin and thought about it for a minute, he gave a nod of agreement before he spoke "Yeah, that may be for the best. Her and Apollo were very close. She could use some time away from the office."

Now that Phoenix had agreed, Trucy and Edgeworth made their way to Edgeworth's car. As Edgeworth drove away, Trucy looked at the remote and wondered what to do with it. She hadn't used it at all since that one time with Apollo a few months ago, so maybe she should retest the functions to jog her memory. The question was, which one to try on Edgeworth? She had a whole car-ride to think about it, she wasn't reckless enough to try it out on him while he was busy driving.

She looked over the options, trying to figure out which one to use when they got to their destination. In the end, Trucy decided to use _____ on Edgeworth.

112321212113221312122.content:
She decided that Phoenix and Athena would get more enjoyment from being involved with the remote than Edgeworth, despite the fact that she wouldn't see him again for a while. First, though, just to make sure it still worked, she waited until they were in the cab back to the office and used Command on Athena.

Her expression had gone from somber to completely vacant, and more telling was Widget's now neutral expression. "Until we leave the car, you can only answer my questions with 'yes'," Trucy whispered into her ear. Both Widget and Athena starting looking sad again.

"Man, this is pretty sad, huh, Athena?"
