112321212113221312122.title: Phoenix and Athena

choices: Trucy mails the remote to Khura'in and swaps with someone there
Trucy does something else with the remote
11232122.content:
Trucy was sitting around the office bored. She had been doing this a lot lately, she had gotten used to messing around with Apollo during days when she didn't have a magic show, but now that he was living in Khura'in, she had no one to mess around with. She wished she had something interesting to do.

The moment she wished she had something interesting to do, there was a knock at the door. She went to answer the door, but found no one there, just a package addressed to her. There wasn't anyone in the hallway either, it was as if the package had appeared from nowhere.

She brought the package inside and looked at it's contents. Inside she found a remote and a manual. The remote had four functions 'Aware Swap', 'Unaware Swap', 'Shapeshift, and 'Possession'. The manual that came with the remote covered in detail what each of these buttons did. Trucy was always one to not believe in the impossible, so she immediately believed that this remote could do what it claimed.

Now what to do with it? The first thing that came to mind was to simple test the remote out at home. Her dad and Athena were both here and she was sure that the two of them would like to help her test out the remote. However, another thought came into her head. She missed hanging out with Apollo and she couldn't just leave home to go to Khura'in, but with this remote, there was a way she could!

She could register the remote with herself via the 'Aware Swap' button and then mail it to Khura'in and have Apollo point it at someone and press the same button, then she'd be in Khura'in! No plane necessary! Of course, this plan did have a lot of risks, did Trucy really want to try this?
11232122.title: After the game

112321221.content:
While this plan did have risks, Trucy was willing to take them. After all, the best victories are the riskiest ones or something like that. She point the remote at herself and pressed the 'Aware Swap' button. She then put the remote back into it's package, she neglected to put the remote's manual in the same package. She then began to write a letter to Apollo

'Dear Polly,

It's been really boring without you around.
I've wanted to visit you in Khura'in for the longest time, but obviously I couldn't
But I think I found a way that we can hang out.
Inside the package is a remote, we'll use this!
It'll make a lot more sense after you use it.
Oh, but make sure to call me before you do!
I don't want it to happen while I'm in the middle of doing something!

From - Trucy'

She put the letter into the package and went to the post office to mail them to Apollo in Khura'in. Hopefully they didn't get lost in the mail, that would be a disaster.

----2 Weeks later-----

Over the next two weeks Trucy had done nothing worth noting. She had been eagerly waiting a phone call from Apollo. As luck would have it, today was the day she finally got that fateful call.

"Hello?" Trucy asked eagerly over the phone.

"Hey Trucy, it's me Apollo. I don't quite understand what you meant in your letter." Apollo said confused.

"Like I said, it'll make more sense after you use it!" Trucy said with excitement. "All you have to do it point the remote at someone and click the 'Aware' button! Then I'll be in Khura'in with you!"

"Trucy, that makes no sense at all." Apollo sighed.

"Just try it! C'mon Polly!" Trucy was getting impaitent, she want the swap to happen already!

"Fine, give me a few seconds." Apollo said, he didn't hang up the phone. He kept it with him as he took the remote out of the box and aimed at the target.

In an instant Trucy was no longer looking at the ceiling of the Wright Anything Agency. She was now looking at the scenery of the foreign country of Khura'in. It was clear the swap had worked! She wondered whose body she had been swapped into, she looked down at herself to see the body of....
112321221.title: Trucy mails the remote to Khura'in and swap...

choices: Test it on a Wright Anything Agency member.
112322.content:
Today's show had gone as well as ever. Magical Girl Trucy Wright had landed every trick perfectly. It was one of those especially good shows, where the sword switching trick was so convincing that a few people ran in fear when she tossed the rubber sword into the air.

But the most noteworthy event of the night wasn't anything from the show itself. It was the package left behind at one of the tables, a simple cardboard box labeled "A magical tool for Trucy Wright".

"A magical tool"? What could that mean? Surely someone wasn't just giving her a magic prop, right? Whatever this was, she had plenty of time before bed to take a look at it. Trucy picked up the package and took it to her apartment.

(A body switching remote?) Trucy thought to herself. (But... how could that be possible?)

The magician in her immediately tried to work through how a body-switching trick could conceivably happen, but she stopped herself. She didn't even know if this thing worked yet!

Trucy figured she could test the remote on somebody. But who?
112322.title: Dual Destinies

1123221.content:
Trucy decided to test the remote on the people closest to her, the people at the Wright Anything Agency. Of course, other than her, only three other people worked at the Agency.

Those three were. Her dad, Phoenix Wright; Ace Attorney, Apollo Justice, a lawyer who worked for her father, and their newest recruit, Athena Cykes; Another lawyer. Who did she test the remote on?
1123221.title: Test it on a Wright Anything Agency member.

11232212.content:
Trucy made her way the the Wright Anything Agency with the remote. Thankfully, Apollo and Athena were there. They seemed to be working on something. Of course, Trucy was the boss, so surely their work could be put on hold for a magic trick. "Hey guys, want to see a new trick I've been working on?" Trucy said with a smile on her face, holding the remote behind her back.

Apollo didn't look up from his work "Sorry, Trucy but we're- Ouch" Apollo was interrupted by Athena elbowing his side. "We'd love to see your magic trick, Trucy" Athena said with a smile.

"Okay, close your eyes for ten seconds!" Trucy ordered them to do. Athena listened to Trucy without issue, Apollo didn't want to do it, but complied out of both a desire to make Trucy happy and a fear of Athena getting mad at him. Once Trucy was sure that both of their eyes were closed, she aimed the remote at Apollo and hit 'Aware Swap' and then proceeded to point the remote at Athena and press the same button.

Trucy couldn't tell if the swap had actually worked. Neither Apollo or Athena had reacted yet. "Alright, open your eyes!" Trucy ordered. "Okay? what did-" 'Athena' began to say, but stopped talking and put a hand at 'her' throat. Seemingly surprised at her new voice. She looked over at 'Apollo' and just stared speechless. Once 'Apollo' opened his eyes he pointed at 'Athena' and screamed. It was clear that the swap had worked.

Apollo in Athena's body was covering his ears, that scream combined with Athena's sensitive hearing wasn't exactly a good combination. Once he had recovered, he turned to Trucy "How did you do this?" He asked, both scared due to the sudden body swap and curious as to how Trucy was able to do this.

"Oh, Polly. You know a magician never reveals her secrets." Trucy said playfully. She had considered telling both of them about the remote, but she decided against it.

Apollo rolled Athena's eyes "Alright, can you swap us back now?" Apollo asked.

"HOLD IT!" Athena yelled in Apollo's voice, causing Apollo is Athena's body to once again cover his ears "Oops, sorry" Athena apologized "But, as I was going to say, whats the rush? Trucy can switch us back anytime! Let's stay like this for a while!" Athena said, practically jumping up and down from excitement.

"No way. We have a case to work on, I have more important things to worry about than the difficulty of being in a girl's body." Apollo immediately turned down the idea of staying swapped.

"C'mon Apollo, it will be fun." Athena said then turned to Trucy with a devious smile. "It's up to Trucy anyway! Well, Trucy, do you want me and Apollo to stay swapped or do you want to spoil the fun and turn us back to normal?" Athena asked.

What does Trucy do?
11232212.title: Apollo or Athena

choices: Swap them back, then do an unaware swap.
112322121.content:
Ordinarily, Trucy would have loved to keep the two lawyers swapped. After all, getting to really know each other would probably clear out any lingering misgivings the two had after everything with the Phantom. However, Apollo had an important point: they were working on a case. Odds were that it would demand every ounce of their concentration, and Trucy didn't want someone else to be adversely affected.

"Sorry, Athena, but I don't think Daddy would be happy if we risked a client's freedom over this."

Apollo looked relieved. "Thank goodness."

Athena pouted, which Trucy thought looked funny on Apollo's face. She soon relented. "I guess that makes sense."

"Don't worry, Athena. We have plenty of time for that later. But right now, I'm going to need you to close your eyes."

Athena did so, as did Apollo. It was then when Trucy remembered the unaware swap option the remote's manual had described. It could still be entertaining to watch the two lawyers in the wrong bodies acting as if nothing was wrong, and it wouldn't interfere with their preparation for the case. What did Trucy decide to do?
112322121.title: Swap Apollo and Athena back (maybe).

1123221212.content:
Trucy quickly did an unaware swap. From her perspective, Apollo and Athena were now back in their own bodies, but to the rest of the world, they were still each other. Now that the first step was done, she quickly did another swap, an Aware Swap this time. Now, they would think that they were in each other's bodies from her perspective, but to the rest of the world, everything was fine now.

Apollo looked down at himself. He was clad in the same yellow uniform he always wore and his long orange hair was the same as usual, but something seemed off. Athena was thinking the same thing, she had the two horn like strands of hair she always had and was wearing her usual red uniform, but something did feel right.

That was when Apollo and Athena both noticed what was wrong. Apollo noticed Athena was wearing his bracelet and Athena noticed widget around Apollo's neck. They must have followed us when our bodies got swapped!" Athena said as she quickly removed widget from Apollo's neck and handed him his bracelet. Apollo thought about what Athena just said. Something didn't feel right about that, but he didn't have time to think about that. They had other things they had to focus on. He slid on his bracelet, strange, was it always this loose on him?

"Alright! Vamanos! We need to hurry and settle this case! I want to get back and experiment with Trucy's body swap trick more when we get back!" Athena said and nearly dragged Apollo out of the office. Trucy couldn't help but giggle at Apollo's body acting so excited and dragging a reluctant Athena's body.

Trucy did wonder how this Unaware swap would effect them though. Without her special hearing, Athena wouldn't be able to properly use widget and Apollo would hardly be able to notice his bracelet tighten on Athena's smaller wrist. Trucy was sure they would be fine though, even if they were unable to use their special skills, they were still capable enough to solve one small case. In the meantime, she had to figure out what else to do with the remote
1123221212.title: Swap them back, then do an unaware swap.

choices: Test it on a random passerby
112331.content:
Kay peered through her binoculars across the shore of Gourd Lake. Something was going down here today, and it was up to her to find out what. Or, more accurately, it was up to the police, but Detective Gumshoe has let her help out, much to Mr. Edgeworth's dismay. Helpful as Kay could be sometimes, she was more than a little reckless and overenthusiastic. Regardless, she was determined to help out. When he swapped with Alita, he was sticking his arm out the window, once they swapped Alita probably wasn't expecting to be holding something and dropped the remote. Wocky looked over the remote, it didn't seem to be damaged at all, thankfully. The remote being on the ground gave him an idea. Alita had no idea how this swap happened, Wocky had planned to tell her after he swap, but now he waned to keep it a secret from her. If he kept it to himself he could have fun and swap with her at random times without her knowing how! He hid the remote in a nearby bush before he entered the home and headed up to his room.

Once he entered the room, he saw his body standing and looking at the door. The pose it was standing in made it clear Alita was in his body. "Wocky, what happened?" Alita asked, her voice was mostly scared, but there was a faint hint of anger in it that Wocky didn't notice.

"Alita-baby. I switchero'd our bods!" Wocky said with a smile, this was the first time he had spoken with Alita's voice and he enjoyed the feeling of someone else's voice leaving his mouth.

"Could you swap us back now?" Alita asked "I can't stay in your body, it, it would be improper for your future wife to stay in your body for too long." to anyone else, this would seem like an excuse made within a few seconds, but Wocky believed she was being sincere.

"Nah, babe. I'm a G! Improper is how I live!" Wocky refused to swap back, they had only just swapped a few moments ago.

Alita was panicking internally. Not just because Wocky had broken all laws of nature by swapping their bodies, but because of something much worse. She knew very well about Wocky's body's condition. half a year ago it was determined that he had half a year to live. He would be alive for at most a few weeks, maybe even less. If the fated time that the bullet moves to his heart happens while she was in his body....she didn't want to think about it. She needed to get him to swap them back, as soon as possible.

Alita was about to say something to Wocky, when suddenly someone else entered the room. It was Wocky's mother, Plum Kitaki "Ah, Alita, I didn't hear you come in." She said

It took Wocky a few seconds to realize that she was talking to him "Ah, yeah, jus' got here a few seconds ago." He said, he tried his best to at least try to sound like Alita when talking to him mom

"Alita, since you will be my future daughter-in-law, I was hoping the two of us could go out today." Plum offered. Wocky rolled his eyes, he had no interest in hanging out with his mom, he was about to say no, when suddenly his mom slightly removed her sword from her broom "Let's hurry now." She said, almost threateningly.

Wocky followed his mom out of fear for his life. Leaving a similarly panicking for her life Alita behind
125311211.title: Aware Swap

125312.content:
It was a boring day for Wocky Kitaki, trapped in bed for what felt like an eternity. After his trial, he finally gotten the surgery he needed for the bullet trapped in his chest. However, it was a rather invasive process with a significant recovery time. He’d been lying down for what felt like weeks and had lost a lot of weight too; he hadn’t felt this bad since he got shot in the first place. The only shining light to come out of this was that the court seemed to turn a blind eye to his attempted assault of Dr. Meraktis in the wake of his operation.

Still, a court trial would at least be interesting. All he had to do at home was watch TV and read; it wasn’t gangster at all! His parents backing out of the gang life made things all the more boring as well, even if he was starting to sympathize with their motives.
Ring Ring Ring

That was the doorbell, Wocky supposed. Deciding to test his legs, he pulled himself out of the bed and stood on the floor, wobbling a bit. “Alright Wocky, just down the stairs and back…” he muttered

---

For some reason, no one else in the house managed to beat Wocky to the door. It was definitely strange, but Wocky figured his mom would get on his case for walking around anyways, so he was grateful for it. He found a small package on the patio outside and figured he would examine it himself.

Back in his room, he opened up the box and found a small remote and a set of instructions. According to the pamphlet, the device was a body swapping machine, capable of turning the user into someone else through a number of functions. It might’ve been the pain killers, or maybe he was just going stir crazy, but Wocky didn’t care about how ridiculous it sounded, he wanted to give it a try! Anything to skip out on bedrest.

Looking over the functions again, he decided he wanted to try out…
125312.title: After

12531221.content:
Thinking his options over, Wocky soon chose to test out the possession button. If he wanted to use any other button he would have to leave his room. If he got caught outside his room his parents wouldn't let him hear the end of it, plus after how hard it was to get out of bed he didn't want to go walking around.

Taking a deep breath he pointed the remote at himself and clicked the possession button. In a moment he was floating above his body in some strange ghost form. He looked down at his body, which had gone back to lying down bored. The remote actually worked, either that or he was having some kind of fever dream.

After a few seconds on experimenting he figured out how to move in his new ghost form. He floated around his house, happy to freely leave his room, and thought about who to possess. The first people to come to mind were his parents. They were probably home so he wouldn't have to go far to possess them.

Another thought that came to mind was to go to the nearby people park. There were plenty of people there and he was sure he could find someone to possess. While possessing someone he barely knew anything about probably wouldn't be the smartest thing to do, he was sure he could handle anything.

After floating around thinking some more he decided to...
12531221.title: Possession

125312211.content:
Floating around Kitaki manor, Wocky eventually managed to locate both his parents. His dad, Winfred, was sitting at a chair in his study with a newspaper. He had a mug of coffee and seemed to be relaxing after a long workday. He'd be an easy target since he wasn't in the middle of anything.

His mother, Plum, was making herself busy downstairs, sweeping away at the kitchen floor with that broom of her. She seemed busy, but she was always sweeping away at something even when there wasn't much dust. Wocky suspected she just liked to keep her arms busy, he wouldn't realistically be interrupting her.

Both options struck him as weird, but the whole thing was weird. In his head, Wocky justified it though. His parents wanted him to recover, and this would help! After all, his mental well being was at risk being stuck in that room all day. One of them could put up with him using their body if it meant he could walk around and get some sun. Which one did he possess?
125312211.title: Possess one of his parents

choices: Wocky carries the device with him
1253122112.content:
One second, Plum was sweeping away at the floor, content with her busywork. In a split second, however, the her eyes fluttered and the broom clattered on the floor, replaced with a remote that suddenly appeared in her hands. She seemed off-balance, looking all bout the room before holding her hands up to her eyes.

"Woah!" she cried out as she examined her thick arms. "This is whack - it really worked!" Plum - possessed by Wocky - turned her head downwards, looking over her whole self.

Wocky felt at the fabric of his mom's kimono, shocked to be wearing it. He wasn't just wearing the outfit, he was using her body. He ran a hand though her hair, pulling black and grey fabrics over his eyes. He patted down his waist and legs just to confirm his new proportions. Everything was different but one major thing was apparent: he was heavy. His mother's body was very wide, and she didn't have much of a chin either. However, despite her weight, Wocky knew for sure that her body felt a heck of a lot better right now than his did. The prospect of waiting out his recovery in another body became real and appealing all at once.

Unbalanced, Wocky bent over and picked up the broom in his off hand, looking to the device in the other. "It worked, for real! Ahahaha!" He laughed with Plum's voice. It sounded a lot like her own characteristic chuckle. He put the device down on the table for a second, and used his freed hand to crack open the broom, revealing the sword underneath. He grinned as he saw the sheen of the metal. "Well ain't no one gonna tell me what to do now," Wocky declared, "I'm the boss-lady now, after all."

Wocky didn't really have a plan in mind, he was just thrilled to have some freedom, even if he had to take his mom's body to get it. She was assertive and intimidating; people wouldn't boss her around! He looked back to the device for a moment. He supposed he would have to figure out what to do with that first. He could bring it with him, wherever he decided to go, but it might get in the way. He didn't have very many pockets at the moment, after all. He could likely find a safe place to hide it away in the house until he wanted to leave this body. However, Wocky had the suspicion he'd want to leave Plum's body soon enough anyways. His mother's body was novel, and he had the advantage of knowing things about her, but he felt it wouldn't be long before he found a better body to jump into. If he left the remote here, he'd likely be committing himself to this form longer than he'd prefer.

What'd he do with the remote?
1253122112.title: Plum

12531221121.content:
This was all a temporary measure for Wocky. After all, what would be the fun of having this device if he couldn't use it whenever he wanted? He wanted to play around with it after all, not sweep the floors all day as his mom! He threw the broom off in the corner and slipped the remote into Plum's sash for easy use. Not wanting to wait, he lumbered out the front door, glad to soak up some sunlight.

"Ah! Finally, suffocating in there," he said to himself as he walked the grounds of the compound, taking a deep breath of the fresh air. Plum's body was heavy and slow, but she was atleast in good health. Wocky's body would've been winded just getting down the stairs.

'Still, outside isn't all that more exciting than inside. I got to find something to do,' Wocky reasoned. With the remote, he could make any situation interesting so long as he had people. The first couple people to jump to mind were his legal team - Apollo and Trucy. They had barely visited him at all since his surgery! Some defenders they were. He bet it'd be fun messing around with them some as a bit of revenge.

Otherwise, he could just go anywhere in town and use the remote on random people. It had tons of settings and functions, after all. Not to mention, it'd be fun to try out new bodies while he was out and about. His mom's body had money, so it wasn't like he was very limited.

Where did he go?
12531221121.title: Wocky carries the device with him

125312211211.content:
Hailing a cab, Wocky decided to give his lawyer-man a visit. He couldn’t wait to see the look on Apollo’s face as Plum walked into the office to castigate him for his negligence. After all, a lawyer’s got a duty to ensure the well-being of their clients after all right? Shouldn’t that count even after the verdict?

“Where to, Ma’am?” the cabby asked, weirding out Wocky a decent bit. He didn’t really like the sound of ‘ma’am’.

“Yo! That’ ‘sir’ when you’re speakin’ to me,” Wocky told him off, sounding ridiculous from his mother's body. He either didn't realize this or didn't care.

The cabby raised an eyebrow in confusion. “Er, uh, sorry sir, where to?”

Wocky thankfully remembered the street name for the law office from a card Trucy had given him a while back. It was apparently the ‘Wright Anything Agency’. Thankfully, the driver recalled the location, and got Wocky there without much problem.

“That’ll be $8,” the driver said as Wocky pulled Plum’s body out of the car.

“Pffft, yeah right, not after that disrespect!” Wocky spat back while awkwardly straightening out his body's kimono. “Get outta here before I get my posse on you,” Wocky yelled, turning around and leaving the driver confused and empty handed as Wocky approached the office.

---

“Please young lady, you must tell me how you perform this trick! I can’t sleep at night with the curiosity gnawing away at me!” As Wocky entered, he encountered a familiar face that he didn’t expect to find: Wesley Stickler. He was the weirdo University student who was also outed as a panty thief at the trial. Specifically, he was outed as having stolen Trucy’s panties… as well as Plum’s. Wocky wasn’t particularly fond of the man for this transgression, and he could fairly assume Plum wasn’t either.

“I said no! Magicians don’t reveal their methods! Especially to weirdoes,” Trucy replied, turning her head away as she cross her arms. Wocky could see that Apollo was also present looking over some papers while sitting, apparently blocking out Stickler and Trucy. “Now if you can leave us alone, we have an important guest.”

“Yeah, that’s right!” Wocky pitched in. “Shut your mouth sick-o, I gotta word or two for Shorty and Mr. Law over there!” Wocky said, gesturing towards Apollo in the corner. Apollo raised his head from the papers, suddenly at attention when his name was addressed.

“Oh! Uh, hello, Mrs. Kitaki,” Apollo said as he pulled himself up from the chair. “How are things? Is there anything we can help you with?” He seemed nervous, which Wocky liked. When he was in his old body, Apollo only seemed annoyed. Finally some respect! Stickler also seemed nervous, shuffling around to put himself behind Trucy. It seemed he recognized a former victim of his ‘curiosity’.

Wocky realized he had a colorful cast of people laid out in front of him. Aside from Apollo, Trucy, and Stickler, he also had Plum’s body as a possible target for all sorts of mischief. Having authority was nice, and it'd be fun to keep up the act, but he could imagine a lot more possibilities if he pulled the remote now.
125312211211.title: He visits his old Lawyer

choices: Use it on them/Four way swap
1253122112111.content:
It didn't take long for Wocky to decide what to do next. While acting like his mother for a little while and getting some respect from Apollo for a while probably would be fun for a while, he figured it would lose its novelty after a while.

He figured he could cause a little fun mischief by using the remote. After all, why bother bringing it along with him otherwise? The question now was, what to do with it.

"Um, Mrs. Kitaki?" Apollo spoke up nervously, confused about why 'Plum' was just standing around.

"Shut it Lawyer-man! Tryin' to think!" Wocky snapped at Apollo, who then went silent. Apollo noticed 'Plum's' odd behavior, but opted not to confront 'her' about it. Instead he walked over to Trucy and began to talk quietly to her.

Too focused on thinking about what to do with the remote, Wocky didn't pay attention to what they were talking about.

Three thoughts came to his mind with how to use the remote here. The first was to use it to get a new body here. While the respect of that came with his Mom's body was great, the fact that he was his own mom did weird him out a bit

The second idea was to use it to mess with one of the other people here. Watching one or two of them reacting to being in a new body would definitely be fun.

The third idea was a combination of the previous two, he could use it on all four of them. This would be a bit difficult considering he would have to pull off multiple swaps, but the result would definitely be entertaining.

Giving it a few more seconds of thought Wocky decided to....
1253122112111.title: Use the remote now

12531221121112.content: Which did he decide to do?
12531221121112.title: Use it on one of them/Four way swap

choices: Wocky=Apollo's body. Trucy=Weasley's body. Apollo=Plum's body. Weasley=Trucy
125312211211122.content:
Opting to go for the most entertaining option. Wocky decided to perform a four way swap between himself and the other three. This would take a little bit of planning.

As he thought about doing this four way swap, he could help but hear a bit of Apollo and Trucy's whispered conversation "Do you think she's acting like-" was the part that he heard. They couldn't have realized who he was already, could they? He better hurry up and do this swapping before they did fully realize.

"Hey!" Wocky yelled at them. As he yelled he reached for the remote. Seeing 'Plum' reaching for a small object, Wesley jumped to the worst conclusion and hid behind Trucy and Apollo.

Now that he had the remote out Wocky was ready to begin the swapping. He decided that he would swap himself last, just in case the remote didn't travel along with him if he did a body swap.

How did the four way swap go?
125312211211122.title: Do a four way swap

1253122112111221.content: Does Wocky do aware swaps, or unaware swaps?
1253122112111221.title: Cluster Swap

12531221121112211.content:
Wesley visibly flinched as Apollo pointed the device at him and pressed the switch button. Trucy barely had time to register what was happening when he aimed it at her and did the same.

For a moment, the two just sorta stood there, disoriented. Trucy blinked a few times from Wesley's body. Wesley, meanwhile, took a look downwards at himself, realizing all of a sudden how much shorter he was.

"Th-th-that's me," Trucy suddenly realized as her eyes settled upon her own body, which was busy scanning itself over. She reached out an arm to point, but recoiled in shock when she saw it wasn't really her own. "Ack! How the- my voice?!"

Apollo turned around towards 'Wesley', clearly annoyed. Wocky took the opportunity to catch him off guard, registering him with the 'switch' button. "Look Wesley, I think it's time you went home. Mrs. Kitaki probably-" He didn't get a chance to finish as Wocky clicked the switch button again behind him, this time aimed at himself.

"Huh?" Apollo suddenly said, his perspective suddenly switching. He was standing behind... someone? Everything felt heavy to him and he wasn't sure why. "What just...?" He trailed off as he heard his voice, definitely not sounding like it usually did. He looked down, his of his own feet blocked by Plum's chest. 'I think I'm going to faint.'

It was right a Apollo realized he had something in his hands that the person in front of him turned around. Trucy was shouting by this point, demanding her body back. Wesley, for his own part, seemed more entranced than anything. Wocky's jaw just about dropped though when he saw his own face staring at him, a cocky grin accompanying it. His body didn't say anything but merely reached out, attempting to swipe away the device from Apollo's much smaller hands.

Apollo instinctively pulled away, holding the remote up high. He didn't know why but he felt it was important. "Yo! Give me that!" his own voice shouted, as it reached up to pry the device away. Apollo tried to fight back, but he didn't have any sense of balance, and found himself tumbling backwards. The device clattered on the floor next to him. Wocky as Apollo snatched it up, quickly stowing it away in his pocket.

"Hey, sick-o!" He suddenly shouted, addressing Trucy-as-Wesley. "Leave Shorty alone and go help the old lady here out, alright? She fell over!" he gestured towards Apollo, was was still struggling to get up in Plum's body. "If you do, maybe I won't call the fuzz for attackin' my assistant, you get me?"

Trucy was still in shock. "The - the what?! Apollo, it's me, Trucy!"

"Yeah sure, and I'm a gangster," Wocky replied, snickering to himself. "Now get outta here for real though and take her with you, before I change my mind," He said, gesturing his thumb towards Apollo and the door.

With a defeated and frightened look on Wesley's face, Trucy inched towards Apollo-as-Plum and struggled to pull him from the floor. "Come on, uh, Ms. Kitaki, we should go."

"B-but, wait, how did...?" Apollo mumbled, equally taken aback as he was escorted out the door. When it shut, Wocky gave a victorious smile, idly turning his hair as as he looked over to Wesley-as-Trucy.

"So uh, what's next, Mr. Justice," Wesley awkwardly asked, a sheepish grin on Trucy's face.
12531221121112211.title: Aware Swap

choices: Follow Wocky with the remote handling a case
Follow Wesley attempting to do a Magic Show
125312211211122111.content:
"Jus' sit tight for now, Shorty." Wocky dismissed Wesley. Wesley didn't seem to mind having nothing to do, he was far too interested with his new body. Wocky also began to take stock of his new body. While his mom's body was definitely better than his own, he still felt off due to the different gender and body shape. Apollo's body on the other hand felt much more comfortable.

Wocky's thinking was interrupted by a loud crashing sound on the other side of the room. He turned around to see Wesley in Trucy's body searching through a pile of Magic tricks and trinkets on the ground. "The hell was that noise?!" Wocky practically yelled in Apollos voice. 'Woah, Lawyer-man's voice is loud' Wocky thought to himself.

Wesley stood up in surprise at 'Apollo's' shouting. "I was just inquiring the location of one of my magic tricks when the large assemblage of trinkets fell over." Wesley explained. He put a cheerful tone to his voice in an attempt to sound like Trucy, but his large vocabulary and way of speaking sounded incredibly odd with Trucy's voice.

Wocky had a feeling he knew exactly what 'Magic Trick' Wesley was looking for. Although he chose not to confront him about that. Wocky thought about what to do next, however before he could think of anything he heard a cellphone ringing. After hearing it ring for a few seconds, he realized that it was 'his' phone ringing. He pulled Apollo's phone out of his pocket. "What?" He snapped as he answered.

The person on the other end of the phone wasn't someone Wocky knew, but their voice sounded like that of an older man "Hey Apollo, come down to the detention center. There's someone asking for you. It's a small case, but who knows, if you do a really good job you might actually get paid." The man on the other side of the phone joked before hanging up.

Although the thought of doing Apollo's job for him wasn't the most appealing to Wocky, he didn't exactly have much else to do. So he may as well do it. Wocky was about to tell Wesley to come with him, when he suddenly heard another phone ringing. Although this one had a much more girlish ringtone. It must have been Trucy's. It was clear that Wesley was to focused searching through Trucy's stuff to hear the phone. "Hey! You gonna answer that?!" Wocky yelled toward him.

Upon hearing Wocky yell, Wesley went over to a table in the middle of the room where Trucy's phone was placed. He answered it nervously "H-Hello?" He said. Wocky couldn't hear the entire phone conversation, but from Wesley's reactions, he put together what the call meant. Trucy had a magic show today. Wocky couldn't help but smile at the thought of Wesley in Trucy's body doing a show.

Once the phone call had ended Wesley turned to Wocky and said "I have a Magic show today, I h-have to go and get ready." Wesley said as he made his way toward the door. It seemed that all the joy he had at being in Trucy's body had turned into nervousness.

Once Wesley had left Wocky pulled out Apollo's wallet and looked through it for his address. He was going to be doing his job, but he was definitely not going to be wearing a suit all day.
125312211211122111.title: Follow Wocky and/or Wesley

choices: He manages to struggle through the show with Trucy's reflexes
He can't manage to pull it off
1253122112111221112.content:
Wesley was panicking internally as he made his way to the show venue. It was some kid's birthday or something apparently. Wesley honestly had no idea how to be a stage magician. Sure, he had spent a lot of time STUDYING how magic tricks were done, out of academic curiosity, but he didn't possess the dexterity to pull most of them off! He didn't have a lot of confidence in his showmanship either. Trucy was loud and personable, while Wesley himself was usually pretty quiet and reserved.

Regardless, he had to atleast present SOME effort at being Trucy. He had no idea HOW they swapped, but he didn't want to give himself away yet. He needed to find out her secrets, after all! He'd worry about getting back to his body later; a true man of learning would pursue this experience for all it was worth! Jittering with nervousness, he made his way to People Park, where the party was being held. When he got there he was at least thankful that Trucy's equipment had been dropped off ahead of time. 'Wait, no. If it wasn't here I could call it off!' he realized. Either way, he had to perform.

Climbing on to the stage, he stared owl-eyed down at the audience looking to him expectantly.

"Uh, hello," he said to the people owl-eyed. "I am Trucy, a magician. I have come here to entertain you with my legerdemain, illusions, and other various forms of tricks and showmanship. I hope this is amusing to you?"

He could hear the kids and some of the adults muttering to eachother in the audience. "What is she talking about... is she okay? ...I don't know what those words mean." He suspected he was already messing up.

"Uh, for my first trick, I will make an item seem to vanish from your sight," he explained, as he reached for an item from the crate. He hoped he could pull this off. Maybe Trucy's body would have the reflexes to make it work?

"Examine this card!" He explained, pulling the ace of spades from the top of the deck. "I will shuffle this into the deck, and upon examination, it will seemingly have disappeared from all existence!"

He prayed for his and Trucy's sake that this body worked for him as he began to shuffle through the cards up, looking down on the confused and murmuring crowd.
1253122112111221112.title: Follow Wesley attempting to do a Magic Show

12531221121112211122.content:
As Wesley shuffled the deck of cards, his hands slipped and accidentally sent the cards flying everywhere. The audience whispered among themselves about 'Trucy's' failed trick. Wesley's panicking intensified as it sunk in that Trucy's body's natural reflexes wouldn't be able to help him with this magic show. Attempting to fix the situation he tried to transition to the next trick.

"Uh, now let me introduce you all to the 'Amazing Mr. Hat'!" Wesley said. It wasn't hard to figure out that the mechanism for activating Mr. Hat was behind Trucy's coat. However, what Wesley didn't expect was for Mr. Hat to come out so fast and with so much force. The combination of the shock and the force of the wooden puppet caused Wesley to fall over. The short dress that Trucy was wearing made the position Wesley fell into look even more unprofessional to the audience.

Wesley stood back up and attempted to do the trick again. However it was clear he had no ventriloquist skills, he needed to open his mouth as wide as he could to say some of the large words in his vocabulary and whenever he did try to close his mouth his sentences came off more as muffled humming than actual words. Eventually he gave up all together

The rest of the 'show' went on similar to that. Wesley would try tricks, only to mess them up horribly. It didn't take long for the audience to start booing him and demanding that he get off the stage. It didn't take much convincing for Wesley to obey. He doubted that these people would ever hire Trucy again after his horrible excuse for a performance.

As Wesley packed up the magic tricks he had taken out during the show he suddenly realized something. He quickly began to look through the box of tricks and trinkets that Trucy had prepared for the show and he soon found what he had been looking for. "Yes! The elusive magical panties!" He yelled aloud. Trucy must have brought them here in advance for the show, which would explain why he didn't find them when he was searching the agency in Trucy's body earlier.

Although he had completely botched the magic show, he had still got something out of it. Now that he had them, all he had to do was figure out how the Magic Panties trick worked. Satisfied, Wesley began to make his way back to the Wright Anything Agency to study the panties. Unfortunately for him, as he began to leave People Park he encountered someone, who was it?
12531221121112211122.title: He can't manage to pull it off

125312211211122112.content:
Apollo had no clue what was going on. One moment he was talking to Mrs. Kitaki, and then the next he was being attacked… by himself. He could barely get up; everything felt so heavy and unbalanced.
"Come on, uh, Ms. Kitaki, we should go,” the voice was Wesley’s but something seemed a bit off to the tone. Wesley extended a hand to help Apollo up, but Apollo wasn’t sure why he was addressing Mrs. Kitaki as he did it.

"B-but, wait, how did...?" As he rose to his new feet, realization began to overtake him. He was Mrs. Kitaki. His own body, whoever was operating it, didn’t seem to care, and merely gave a smirk and a wave as ‘Wesley’ walked him out the door and down the sidewalk.

“Is uh, everything alright?” Wesley asked when they reached a streetcorner, looking distinctly uncomfortable. Apollo didn’t piece together why though; Wesley had good cause to be afraid of Plum after all. Apollo wasn’t too fond of the guy, so he decided he’d leverage that.

“Yes! Yes! Just go!” He yelled in a frazzled tone, shaking a fat arm at ‘Wesley’ who ran off in shock. Apollo sighed, and leaned against the bus stop.

‘[i]What on earth am I supposed to do now? This shouldn’t be possible! I’m just dreaming all this, right?![/i]’ While his body wasn’t acting normal, it didn’t seem like Plum was in it. Could he really just go back and confront… himself? Trucy and anyone else watching would think he was nuts if he called himself a body thief! He gave his new form another look down, realizing he couldn't even see Plum's feet from this angle. How was he going to adapt to this?

Little did Apollo know, it was Wocky who was using his body, and had swapped him into his mother’s possessed body. Were there any adverse effects since Apollo was swapped into a body that still had an occupant?
125312211211122112.title: Follow Apollo and/or Trucy

1253122112111221121.content:
‘Hey! What’s going on?’ A voice suddenly emerged, echoing around Apollo’s borrowed head.

“Huh?” Apollo said aloud, running a finger through Plum’s ear. “There something in there?”

‘What’s happening?! I can’t move anything!’ The voice rumbled again. Apollo could feel some slight pressure on his arms, like they were trying to move, but he managed to keep them still through his own will. It seemed he still had dominant control, but someone else was in this body with him.

“Who is that?” Apollo asked aloud, looking around, suddenly nervous. Was someone watching him? He couldn’t interact like this!

‘It’s me, P-plum! Or, well you!’ The voice, distinctly feminine, continued. ‘[i]Why is there another me in my body?![i]’

Apollo took a deep breath, trying to calm himself. “You mean, you’re in here with me?”

‘Of course! Who is this? Give me my body back!’

This only raised a million more questions for Apollo. Why was he in Plum’s body, and if she was in there with him, then who had taken his own body? For now though, he knew that if he kept talking to the air like this, he’d make Mrs. Kitaki look like a crazy person, he had to find somewhere private to keep up this conversation.

“Look, I don’t know how I got here,” Apollo explained, “but its me, Mr. Justice! We can talk more once we’re somewhere private. Do you know where to go?”
There was a momentary silence in Apollo and Plum’s head, before Plum’s voice returned and suggested…
1253122112111221121.title: Yes

choices: ...got the broom and went after his body.
12531221121112211211.content:
'I need to go back home!' Plum shouted mentally. 'All I remember was sweeping the floor, and now I'm here! Who knows what might have happened to my family! I don't even know how long it's been.'

That caught Apollo by surprise. She wasn't conscious when she came into the office? Someone else really must have been using her body then, which was worrying. Was that person in his body now? If so, then why was he now conscious in Plum's? It was all pretty confusing to wrap his head around.

'Mr. Justice! I demand you get me home this instant! I need to make sure my family is okay!' Apollo didn't really want to go to Kitaki Manor, it felt like it'd be a detour to him. What if the person who was in his body was running amok right now? Still, Mrs. Kitaki was right to worry about her family, who knows what this person did in her body. Not to mention, it might yield some clues. He had a sneaking suspicion as to what who was using Plum's body back at the office, but a lawyer always needed evidence to prove their claims. It wasn't like he was in much a place to confront them alone anyways.

Resigned, Apollo hailed a cab and had the driver take him down to Kitaki manor, which was temporarily his home. This seemed to placate Plum, who didn't make more noise along the way, opting to keep her thoughts to herself. Apollo opted to do the same and ignored the driver's attempts at small talk.

---

'Okay, we can talk now Mr. Justice,' Plum said as they entered the front door.

Apollo shook his head. "I need to check Wocky first," Apollo said firmly. "Where would he be?"

'He's on the second floor,' Plum replied. She seemed to agree with Apollo's decision, although her reason was more for concern than suspicion. Apollo trudged up the steps, with a hand clenched tightly around the safety rail to keep his balance. Every movement in Plum's body just felt like he was bouncing. She was so heavy that he was throwing her weight around constantly, he couldn't imagine who would want to steal her body.

Thankfully, he made it up the steps without tripping, and Plum guided him to Wocky's room. Apollo slowly lifted a hand and knocked on the door, "Uh, Wocky. Are you in there?" He asked.

There was a cough on the other side of the door. "Yeah mom," a quiet voice replied, "I'm fine."

Apollo turned the door knob, going in to the room to find a sickly looking Wocky sitting at the side of his bed. "What's up? Need somethin'?"

"Uh, I just wanted to make sure you were okay, uh, son," Apollo mumbled in the most motherly tone he could muster. "Do you need anything?"

"Nah nothin' right now. Where'd you go earlier, by the way?" Wocky asked.

"Uh, just went to the park for a walk," Apollo lied. There was a moment of quiet. "Just, yell if you need me."

"Sure thing mom, I'm going back to sleep." With that he plopped himself back down in bed and threw a sheet over him as Apollo-in-Plum left the room.

Apollo didn't understand. Wocky was really still in his body? He wasn't acting weird, other than being thinner than before. Who on earth was that at the office then?

'Oh thank heavens he's alright! It'd be horrible if something happened right after the surgery!' Plum exclaimed. Apollo was reminded of Wocky's operation to get a bullet removed from his chest a while back. That must've been why he seemed so weak, he was likely still recovering. He didn't seem to be acting like a different person at all though.

'Now, before we do anything else, we need to share our stories,' Plum said. 'I need you to tell me everything you remember today! We need to get you out of my body as soon as possible!'

Apollo gave a nod in agreement. Hopefully one of them had an important detail that could lead them in the right direction.

---

"And that's all that happened to me until you started talking at the bus stop," Apollo finished explaining, seemingly to no one, as the two sequestered themselves away in Plum and Winfred's bedroom. Apollo was very uncomfortable being in the couple's room, it felt like an instruction, but he supposed that Plum's mind gave him permission at the very least.

'Well, we need to find your body again,' Plum replied. 'It pulled something out of our hand, right? Maybe that was important! If we can catch him by surprise, maybe we'll find it.'

It made sense in principle, but it wasn't like they really had a body equipped for such an encounter. "Are you sure we can do that?"

'Ugh! Don't be a weakling. Do you even know who I am? Go find my broom, and I think he'll crack.'

It was a worrying suggestion. After all, it was still Apollo's body! If they hurt it, he'd have to deal with the consequences. He didn't want Plum screaming at him in his brain anymore though, so cowed to her order. He opened the bedroom door and...
12531221121112211211.title: Kitaki Manor

1253122112111221121121.content:
"Ah, there you are Plum," the voice that met Apollo in the hallway was deep, but still quiet somehow. He turned his head nervously, meeting the dark gaze of Winfred Kitaki, Plum's husband. "I'd been looking for you all day, where have you been?"

"Oh, uh, hello... dear," Apollo replied nervously. "I was just going for a walk is all. How are you?"

"I'm fine now that now you're back," Winfred said as he walked closer. Apollo took a step back awkwardly. "You're looking forward to tonight I hope?"

"What's tonight?" Apollo asked worriedly. Winfred was now uncomfortably close.

Winfred's eyes suddenly opened, revealing a small, soft set of pupils underneath his thick eyebrows. "Don't tell me you forgot, Little Plum." His tone suddenly became very sincere, almost hurt.

'Oh dear! This can't be a worse day! It's our anniversary night! Mr. Justice, please, just for tonight, you have to do this for me.'

Apollo's heart sank. He didn't want to have to do this, but there was no way he'd be spending the night going on a date with Mrs. Kitaki's husband. "I'm, er, terribly sorry m-dear, but I-" suddenly, something caught in Apollo's throat.

'I'm sorry, but you can't ruin this night!' Plum's voice was louder now. Apollo felt a pressure in his limbs like earlier, but much stronger now. 'If you won't do it, then I'm taking back control.'

Winfred was concerned, as his wife suddenly clamped her eyes shut and went silent as Apollo and Plum mentally battled for control of her body. "Plum, dear, are you okay? Do you need a doctor?"

'Plum, please, this is urgent! We need to find the body thief!'

'He won't go far! We'll do it in the morning tomorrow, this night is too important for me!'

Plum's body continued to shake slightly for a moment, before opening its eyes. Which of them had the stronger will?
1253122112111221121121.title: Winfred

12531221121112211211211.content:
It was a short, yet fierce mental battle. However in the end, Apollo's will was the stronger one. "I'm sorry, but I have something important to do!" Apollo said as fast as he could. He than made his way out of the Kitaki Manor before either Mr. Kitaki could say anything or Mrs. Kitaki attempted to take control again. While he was a bir worried that what he had just done could affect Mr. and Mrs. Kitaki's relationship. He brushed it off, After all, they had been together for years, this won't destroy their entire relationship.

'Mr. Justice! When this is over and I have full control of my body, I will make you pay' Apollo heard Mrs. Kitaki mentally yelling at him. Unfortunately for him, he had a feeling she was being honest about that. Choosing to not dig himself further into this grave, he didn't respond to her yelling.

Apollo hailed a cab, but for some reason the cab driver drove away once they saw Mrs. Kitaki's face, the driver yelled something about 'not paying earlier' while they drove away. Apollo felt like screaming, this was the last thing that he needed right now.

Apollo began to make his way back to the office. He couldn't believe that he had to walk all the way across town in Mrs. Kitaki's body. As he walked, he realized something. With how horrible he felt in this body, even if he did confront the person who was currently in his body, he didn't know what he would do. They could easily just push him out of the office again.

Then it occurred to Apollo, he could go and get some help in confronting the body thief. While he was sure that most people would think he was crazy, he was sure he could prove to some of close friends who he really was. He could head straight to the office right now and try to convince Trucy right now, he didn't know if she was either aware or affected by whatever had caused him to swap bodies.

Of course, he had other friends he could go to and ask for help, a few that came to mind were Clay and Vera. Of course it may be a bit hard to convince them who he was, but he was sure he could do it.

Who did he go to for help?
12531221121112211211211.title: Apollo

125312211211122112112112.content:
Apollo decided that his best options available were either Clay or Vera. Clay was his best friend, and was pretty smart and capable, being an astronaut of all things. He'd probably be able to stand up to the body thief with no problem. However, Apollo didn't think Clay to be a particularly superstitious person; convincing him that body swapping was real would be a nightmare. Also embarrassing. Vera was more shy and withdrawn. Despite her anxiety though, he felt like he'd probably have an easier time getting her on his side. Not to mention, she'd stay silent after the fact.

Who'd he pick?
125312211211122112112112.title: Someone else

1253122112111221121121122.content:
Apollo was hesitant to go to Clay for this. It was going to take a long time to explain what had happened, and it would be incredibly awkward and embarrassing as well. He’d rather get this all done with and move on. Therefore, he settled on Vera. She was more withdrawn, but at the same time a bit more agreeable. She’d keep quiet when the whole thing was over.

He was well acquainted with Vera’s home thankfully, since it had been a crime scene not that long ago. He drowned out Mrs. Kitaki’s protests and eventually she went silent. He worried that she was probably plotting her revenge during this time, but it was something he would have to deal with later. He needed to leave this body, hopefully she’d come to understand.

It was a long and tiring walk to Vera’s home. His legs hurt, and he could feel the sweat on Plum’s back as he breathed heavily. By the time he got there, the sun was hanging low. He needed to act before the body thief did something else to throw him off his tracks.

*knock knock*

“Vera, are you home? This is important!”

It was silent. The Misham home was dead enough as it was, but it had only been exacerbated after Vera’s father was killed. She was a lonely person already, and was hesitant to meet new people.

“Vera, please! Apollo sent me!” He hoped that would get her attention as he continued knocking. The door then cracked open slowly.

“Vera! Thank God, I need your help. Can I come in?”

The door opened wider, giving Apollo a better view of Vera who seemed…
1253122112111221121121122.title: Vera

12531221121112211211211222.content:
As Apollo looked her over, he realized Vera seemed off. Her hair was hanging free and loose, splayed over her shoulders. Furthermore, her outfit was different too. She had grabbed a white tanktop from somewhere and had thrown a blue jacket overtop it. Her jeans seemed looser and cut up as well, one hand vacantly in her pocket. She eyed Apollo with a mixture of shock and suspicion.

"Yo! What do you want from me?" She asked roughly, catching Apollo off-guard.

"Uh, er," Apollo stumbled and muttered, not sure what was happening. She was never this confrontational.

'Well? Is this really who you thought could help us?' Plum asked from within their head, obviously annoyed. 'You just wasted both our time!'

"Well?! What're you doing here!' She shouted, taking a step towards Apollo, who stepped back in response. What was going on!?

"V-Vera! It's me, Apollo! I, I, it's a long story! But I need your help! What's wrong with you right now?"

Vera suddenly seemed relieved for some reason, giving a smirk and then a laugh in response. "HA! What, really? That's why you're here? You want me to help? Hmmmm." he put a hand to her chin, as though in deep thought. Apollo was beginning to get really worried.

"Alright, 'Apollo', come on in," Vera said, turning around and heading back in, gesturing with her hand. "Must've been a long walk after all, you need to sit down."

Apollo hesitantly followed behind her with Plum's body, and took a seat on the living room couch. He didn't really want to sit, but he was far too exhausted to keep standing. Vera threw herself down on a chair on the opposite side. Her position wasn't very ladylike, her legs splayed out and her arms behind her head.

"Vera, before I go on, are you feeling...okay?" Apollo felt like he had an inkling as to what was happening here, although he didn't want to believe it.

Vera gave a snicker, "well..."
12531221121112211211211222.title: Different somehow

125312211211122112112112222.content:
"Well.....I'm feeling great. Don' know if I can say the same about 'Vera' though" The person in Vera's body said.

While Apollo had expected that someone had taken Vera's body, but he hadn't expected the body thief to come out and admit that they weren't Vera.

While Apollo was lost in shock, the person in Vera's body spoke up again "Yo! Ya hear me?" They said, trying to get a reaction from Apollo

Apollo had a vague idea of who was in Vera's body, but what he saw back at Kitaki manor went against this idea. "Who are you and why are you in Vera's body?" Apollo asked in a demanding way.

'Vera' rubbed the back of her head, seemingly disappointing, but then a smile appeared on 'her' face "C'mon Lawyer man, can't you tell? It's me, the OG of your law career, Wocky Kitaki!" Wocky said and crossed his arms, which looked very odd from Vera's body.

Apollo was going to say something, but he couldn't think straight with Mrs. Kitaki screaming internally 'Oh no! My little boy is stuck in the body of some strange girl! We need to find whoever's doing this and get him back to normal!' While Mrs. Kitaki was convinced that Wocky was a victim of the same person who put her and Apollo in the same body. However, Apollo had a different thought of Wocky's role in this.

"So, how did you do all of...this?" Apollo said, not having any word to describe the situation other than 'this'.

"Yo! Jus' what make ya think I did this?" Wocky said. He was pretending to be offended by the accusation, but he wasn't that very good of an actor, Apollo could tell right away that he did it, but he chose to present his evidence anyway.

"Me and Trucy both had suspicions when 'Mrs Kitaki' showed up at the agency. She wasn't acting anything like herself. We were going to confront 'her' on it, but before we could I was suddenly put into her body and before I could even react my own body was pushing me out of my own office." Apollo began his case by recapping the events that occurred earlier at the agency. "Then, when I was outside I heard Mrs. Kitaki's voice in my head, she said that her own body had been taken and she had no memory of anything that happened all day." He then went over what had happened outside the office. "That would mean, whoever the body thief was had access to inside Kitaki manor! The only people that leaves to be the thief are you and your dad, and unlike you, he doesn't have a motive!" Apollo pointed his finger at Wocky, however with Plum's huge arms, he felt it didn't have as much impact.

"Ha! A'ight I'll bite, why would I want to take my mom's huge body?" Wocky said, he was feigning confidence, but Apollo could tell from the sweat on his forehead that he was getting nervous.

"That's easy. You were bedridden after your surgery, you could barley move! So you went and took the closest body, your mother's! I don't know how you did it, but you're the only one with a motive!" Apollo finished his case.

Wocky was taken back by how Apollo figured this all out, but he kept his cool. Couldn't have his G image ruined afterall. "A'ight, you got me I did, But I a'int tellin' you how I did it!"

Apollo was going to reply, but suddenly he felt his control of Mrs. Kitaki's body slip from him. "Wocky!" Plum yelled, now having regained control. "You are going to return everything to normal this instant and when we get home, you are going to be in so much trouble!"

Wocky laughed "Man, lawyer man, you're even sounding like my Mom now." Once he was done laughing he looked at Plum's face and realized from her expression, that wasn't Apollo, that was actually his mom. "Oh no." He said, his facial expression changed as he began to panic for the first time since Apollo got here.

Plum's angry expression disappeared as Apollo regained control of the body. "Listen to your mother, Wocky" was all he had to say.

Now that Apollo was back in control, Wocky began to beg. "You gotta help me out here lawyer ma- Apollo. Ya got no idea what Mom's like when she's mad!" it seemed that Apollo was unfazed with Wocky's begging, so Wocky made an offer "I'll s-s-share the body swapping thingy with you, ya can have any body you want, anytime! Ya jus' gotta help me find a way to get away from my mom until she calms down!"

While Apollo knew that it was actually Wocky, he was in Vera's body, he could help but feel compelled to help Vera. Also, he couldn't deny that he was curious to find out about, and possibly use, whatever Wocky had used to do all of this. At the same time however, Apollo was already on Mrs. Kitaki's bad side, and he wasn't sure if he should make her even madder.
125312211211122112112112222.title: "Vera" comes clean.

choices: Apollo wants to go back to normal
Apollo decides to get a new body
1253122112111221121121122221.content:
"Fine Wocky, I'll help you get away from her if you can fix this whole mess and tell me what you did," Apollo agreed, "but I can't guarantee you any safety from her past that. She's your mother after all, you can't avoid her forever."

"Don't need forever man, just a week or so!" Wocky replied, giving a wry smile with Vera's face.

'Mr. Justice I swear the moment I get my hands on you, it will be the last thing you ever-'

Apollo wasn't sure exactly how he did it, but he shut his eyes tightly and clamped down all his concentration on the part of his mind that Mrs. Kitaki was using. Suddenly, Mrs. Kitaki just went silent. Apollo kept his eyes closed for a moment, before opening them slowly. As far as he could tell, Plum's consciousness had been suppressed for the time being.

"Apollo?" Wocky asked nervously from the chair, leaning forward in suspense.

"Yeah, its me," Apollo replied, suddenly feeling like a pressure had been lifted from Plum's body. If he had to guess, their consciousnesses both sharing one body probably put undue strain on it. Even when they weren't trying to, one of them was probably putting some resistance on the other. "I think I've put your mom 'to sleep' for now, but I don't know how long that will last. Now are you going to tell me what's going on or not?"

"Hah! Alright, well, I guess I owe you twice now, Law-man," Wocky exclaimed, back to his old self now that the tension was broken. Thrilled to be safe, Wocky began to detail his whole day out to Apollo, beginning with finding the remote and using the possession function. He then detailed how he had used his mother's body to get over to the law office to steal Apollo's body. He decided to leave out the fact that he gave Trucy's body to Wesley though; he didn't want to have Apollo turn on him now.

"And why are you Vera all of a sudden?" Apollo asked, wanting to know what happened to the real Vera.

"Your boss said I should go visit her," Wocky replied, shrugging. "I didn't really care to listen to him, but when he mentioned a babe was involved I figured I'd check it out! I liked what I saw, so I left your bod and took hers! Shame you and my mom came by and had to ruin it though."

Apollo was definitely disturbed by how casually Wocky was willing to take over someone's life, but he had to admit he was just a bit curious as well. He didn't care much for Plum's body, but that was largely because she was older and heavier, and also he wasn't expecting to become her. If he knew he could turn back to normal whenever he wanted, it'd be a lot less stressful.

"Anyways, I'm definitely not going to be able to stay in Vera here much longer," Wocky continued, running a hand wistfully through Vera's long hair. "Mom knows I'm here now, so I'm going to have to float along and go somewhere she won't find me."

"You'll let me use the remote first though, right?" Apollo asked, reminding Wocky of their deal.

"Huh? Oh! Right. Who's bod do you want then? You could head back to being your own boring self, or you could try out someone new. Vera here is pretty cracking! I'd recommend it, but I guess I can get it if you don't want one that's already been 'used', so to speak."

Apollo thought it over. It wasn't really right to take someone's body the way Wocky was, but it could be a valuable learning experience, right? If Wocky had used the possession function to take Vera's body, then that meant Apollo's original body was just on auto-pilot now. He could take a vacation while it handled his work for him. Besides, if he just went back to being himself, who would keep an eye on Wocky?
1253122112111221121121122221.title: Apollo helps out Wocky

12531221121112211211211222212.content:
"Alright, I want to use this device too," Apollo conceded. "What do we need to do?"

Wocky was grinning like a maniac as he ran off to pull a small remote from a cabinet drawer to the side of the room. "Here we are! First though, I need to use it, to find somewhere to lay low for a while. So I'll need you to point it at me and press the 'possession' option." Wocky put the device in Apollo's - technically Plum's - small hands and pointed towards the proper function to use. "Once you click that, Vera will be back to normal, so I'd suggest making yourself scarce quick! I don't think she'll be happy to see some strange lady sitting in her living room after all. Get my mom far away and then use possession on yourself, should fix you up!"

Apollo looked up at Wocky uncertain. "And whose body will you be taking?"

Wocky seemed to think at this. "Dunno yet! I'll figure that out. You'll have the remote though, so I'll need to come to you when I find one. Whose body do you have in mind?"

Apollo mulled his options over. Who would he pick? He supposed Vera herself would be the closest choice. It felt a bit wrong to take her body right after Wocky had just stolen it himself, but he was curious. Maybe he could help her out better if he understood her more? Otherwise, he had a list of people he knew that he could choose from. Trucy was right back at the office, so he could keep an eye on his own body, and the same could be said for Mr. Wright as well. If he wanted to avoid Plum though, he could also pick from any other acquaintance he had.


"Alright, I'll be in..."

12531221121112211211211222212221.content:
After some careful thinking, Apollo chose to take the body of Detective Ema Skye. Ema was a friend of his, although he'd be lying if he said that he knew her well. Perhaps if he became her he could get to know her better? Plus, he was tempted to try out being a detective for a little while. While he did feel a bit bad about possessing Ema and taking over her life, he got over the guilt by telling himself it was only temporary.

"Alright, I know who I want to become." Apollo told Wocky

"Took ya long enough, so, who you gonna be?" Wocky asked

"A friend of mine called Ema." Apollo went on to explain what Ema looked like so Wocky could find him later, however it soon became clear that his description of her wasn't going to help. "Just meet me at People Park in a few hours, I'll be the girl wearing the labcoat." Apollo explained to Wocky. It was a bit strange to he that he would 'be the girl' but, after this long day, nothing seemed that strange anymore.

"'kay, I can remember that. Now get me out of here before my Mom 'Wakes up' again." Wocky said, ready to go out and possess another person.

Apollo approached the door to Vera's home, pointed the remote at Wocky in Vera's body and clicked the possession button. He then quickly opened the door and left, leaving behind a confused Vera.

Apollo then began to walk away from Vera's home, he had no particular destination in mind, but he wanted to get Mrs. Kitaki as far away from Vera's home. He knew that when he left Mrs. Kitaki's body she would go to Vera's home to confront 'Wocky'. Apollo wanted Vera to at least get over the shock of being in the clothes that Wocky had dressed her in and the fact that she won't remember part of her day before Mrs. Kitaki came to her home.

Soon Apollo was at People Park, he had walked a good way across town and was now exhausted. He figured that this was far enough and then proceeded to point the remote at himself. In a instant he was above Mrs. Kitaki's body and was in some sort of Ghost-like form. He looked down at Mrs. Kitaki, she was confused at first, but that confusion was soon replaced by anger as she stormed off in the direction of Vera's home.

Now in this ghost form, Apollo floated through the park. He realized his mistake of choosing to possess Ema, he had no idea where she lived or where she would even be this time of day. He figured that he should at least look around People Park for her and hope that he found her.

Thankfully, through the most improbable of coincidences, Ema was at people park. She didn't seem to be investigating a crime. Apollo quickly flew into her body and possessed her.

For a moment, all Apollo saw was darkness, but soon his senses began to come back. He tasted something in his mouth, he soon realized what it was and spit it out. "Ugh, how does she eat these things?" Apollo said as he wiped some lingering Snackoos off of his tounge. He threw away the opened and half eaten Snackoo bag in a nearby trash can.

Now that he was done dealing with the Snackoos, he looked down at his new body. After spending most of the day as Mrs. Kitaki, he was happy to be in any body that was semi-athletic, Although it did feel strange to still be female. Thankfully, Ema's clothes were pretty unisex.

Apollo's attention was once again grabbed as he heard a voice yell out "Yo lawyer man! That you?" he heard someone yell right by him. It didn't take much imagination to figure out that that was Wocky. Apollo looked over to see who Wocky had possessed, he saw that the body that Wocky had currently possessed was...
12531221121112211211211222212221.title: Ema Skye's

choices: Apollo relented and stuck with Wocky for now
Apollo and Wocky split up for the moment
125312211211122112112112222122211.content:
As Apollo saw the figure who was approaching, he began to regret going along with Wocky. A few feet away was a young man with blonde hair, that went past his neck and curled into a drill past his shoulder. Klavier Gavin.

"Wow! You know how to pick a nice one, eh law man? Or should I say law-girl?" Wocky asked with an annoying grin as he twirled a finger around Klavier's hair. It was like Apollo's two least favorite people had fused into one extremely annoying person.

Apollo considered pretending he had no idea what Wocky was talking about, but realized he wouldn't be able to pull that off. He already told Wocky he'd be wearing a labcoat, and it suddenly occurred to him that the device had materialized in Ema's hand as he took her body. "Y-yeah. It's me, Wocky," Apollo replied, trying to mask his disgust. 'Please let me out of here soon...'

"Hah! Guess I know your type now. She was the cop back in the case, right?" Wocky asked. He probably knew the answer to that as he continued talking anyways. "I recognized this pretty-boy as the g-man who prosecuted me! Figured he could let me use his body as payback. You see his bike yet? It's pretty sick."

Apollo shook his head. "No not really. I was just going to give you the device and go for now," he said, trying to make an excuse to leave. He wanted access to the remote, but he didn't really know if that was worth sustained interaction with Wocky.

"Oh come on, lighten up!" Wocky shot back, suddenly moving in close and throwing an arm over 'Ema's' shoulder. Apollo could feel every hair standing on end, bristling at the violation of personal space. "'Sides, if we split up then one of us might get stuck! Wouldn't want that now, would we? Come with me and we can find something fun to do!

Apollo reflexively threw Wocky's arm off of him and awkwardly shuffled a few feet away. "Do you even know how to drive a motorcycle?"

"Hah! What kinda G don't know his way around a bike? C'mon law-girl you'll need a better excuse than that!"
125312211211122112112112222122211.title: Male

1253122112111221121121122221222111.content:
As much as Apollo wanted to get as far away from Wocky as possible. He realized the major flaw of leaving Wocky alone. In the short time that Wocky had the remote today, he had not only hoped into multiple bodies himself, but he had also swapped around other peoples bodies. If he was left alone again, he may cause even more havoc and confusion. Not to mention, if Wocky went into a different body, Apollo would have no way of finding him later when he wanted out of Ema's body.

"Ugh, fine. Where is the bike?" Apollo asked, his bitter tone to the situation made him sound like how Ema normally sounded around Klavier

"Ha! Knew you'd come around, follow me Law-Girl!" Wocky gestured for Apollo to follow.

1253122112111221121121122222111.content:
As Apollo fought with Wocky over the remote, he noticed something. It felt like a huge mental load had been lifted from his shoulders. Then, he put his finger on it. He was no longer sharing a body with Mrs. Kitaki.

As Apollo made that realization, he noticed that Mrs. Kitaki’s body went limp momentarily before regaining its composure. It seemed like Wocky had lost control and Plum was once again in charge of her own body.
Apollo let go of the remote that was still firmly in Mrs. Kitaki’s hands “Mrs. Kitaki, is that you?” He asked to confirm that she was one in control.

Mrs. Kitaki let out a hearty laugh “Yes! I can move around again.” She then put her hand to her head as if she had a headache. “My poor Wocky is stuck in here now, though.” She said.

Apollo hadn’t completely thought about that. Now that he was out of Mrs. Kitaki’s body, Wocky was in it. The question was now, how do they get Wocky out of Plum’s body and let Plum be the only one in her body.

Mrs. Kitaki viewed the remote. “So, which button do I press to get Wocky back to his body?” She asked Apollo

Apollo then realized, the only way they could do this was to use the Possession button and let Wocky fly to his own body. Unfortunately, he doubted that he could use the possession button on Wocky without Wocky flying and possessing some body that neither he nor Mrs. Kitaki knew.
“Well, Mr. Justice? What should I do?” Mrs. Kitaki asked, she was beginning to get impatient.

Apollo needed to think fast, there must be some way to either convince Wocky to go back to his own body or he needed to think of some way to get Wocky out of Mrs. Kitaki’s body without putting someone else in it. He didn’t want to tell Mrs. Kitaki that he didn’t know what to do, she was usually scary, but now she also had the remote in her hands. He didn’t want to risk making her mad. She could trap him in Vera’s body, or put him in some other one.
In the end, Apollo…..

As much as Apollo racked his brain, he couldn’t think of a way to get Wocky back to his own body. “I’m sorry Mrs. Kitaki, I have no idea what how we’re going to do that.”

Mrs. Kitaki was clearly not happy to hear this. “What do you mean ‘You have no idea what to do’?!” Thankfully Apollo hadn’t brought only Mrs. Kitaki’s broom sword when they came here. Otherwise he would definitely be feeling the sharp side of it now.

Apollo put up Vera’s hands defensively “I’m sorry, but the only way to even get him out of your body is to use the possession button and if we did that he could just fly into some random person’s body.”

Mrs. Kitaki was still mad, but it seemed she understood the situation enough that she wasn’t going to kill Apollo. She seemed to be thinking. Apollo figured that she was mentally talking to Wocky in the same way that he had been talking to her.

“Um, Mrs. Kitaki?” Apollo said, hoping that he hadn’t just interrupted her. “If you don’t mind, can I use the remote? I need to get back to my own body.” He said, stretching out a hand,

Unfortunately, Mrs. Kitaki pulled the remote away."No." She began. "If me and my precious Wocky are going to have suffer with this out of body experience. Then you'll have to suffer with us." She put the remote into her sleeve. "No one is going to use this remote until I am alone in my own body."

Apollo was going to argue with her on that point, but then he saw the look in her eyes and knew that there was no way he was going to convince her against this. "I swear that as soon as I think of what to do, you'll be the first to know."

With that final exchange, Mrs. Kitaki stood up and left Vera's home. Apollo was exhausted both mentally and emotionally. He wondered if helping Wocky out would have been a better solution than this.

He walked around Vera's house and soon came upon a mirror. Despite the face that he was in Mrs. Kitaki's body all day, the fact that Vera's face was staring back at him in the mirror was still unbelievable. "I swear I'll find out what to do as fast as I can, Vera"

Then Apollo realized something. The reason that Mrs. Kitaki's mind was with him earlier was because Wocky did a possession and then used a body swap. Did he possess Vera's body or did he use an Aware Swap? If Wocky possessed Vera then the Aware Swap a few minutes ago should cause both Apollo and Vera to be in this body. However, if Wocky had used an Aware Swap to get into Vera's body in the first place, then Vera should be in Apollo's body.

Apollo chose to find out whether or not she was in this body with him 'Hello? Vera? Are you there?' he said mentally. What was the response?
