12533331.title: Ahlbi Ur'gaid

1312.content:
It was a slow day at the police station, which was fine for most. A lazy day for a cop usually means a safe day for the community so long as everything was going okay. Detective Gumshoe was enjoying his lazy day at his tiny cubicle when the mail-room guy came through with a cart of parcels and boxes.

"Package for you detective," he said, interrupting Gumshoes' game of computer solitaire.

"Eh? From who?" he asked, not sure what it could be. He didn't have the cash to order anything at the moment, and he doubted anyone would send him a gift at his work address.

"Doesn't say, but it apparently passed security clearance. Maybe you have a secret admirer?" the man suggested with a laugh as he tossed the box on Gumshoe's desk and wheeled the cart away.

Gumshoe couldn't help but smile at the idea. "Let's see what we have then!" He said excitedly as he began to pull the box apart, finding a small remote and a set of instructions accompanying it.

---

After reading the instructions, Gumshoe was a bit glum. He was sure that someone was just playing a mean joke on him; there was no way such a device could be real at all. He idly wondered who would send it to him though, it was an oddly specific joke. He couldn't recall doing anything to make anyone want to send him a phony body swapping machine.

It wasn't like Gumshoe had anything better to do than try it, though. He was bored and there wasn't much crime going on. If it worked, then his day would become much more exciting, and if it didn't then he managed to kill a couple of hours. The way he saw it, there were three places he could test it. The first was the prosecutor's office, which was a stones throw away; if it worked then he'd certainly want Mr. Edgeworth to know. Gumshoe would be really useful on investigations with something like that. The second person who came to mind was Maggey; the two of them were close, so he figured she wouldn't mock him just for testing it out. Finally, the cell blocks for the prisoners were also pretty close, and Gumshoe had access to most of them. He knew that most of the people Mr. Edgeworth and Wright put away were pretty rotten fellows. He figured it wouldn't really be a big deal to use them as guinea pigs since most of them were murderers of some kind.

Where did he go?
1312.title: Investigations series

choices: Someone he runs into on the way to Edgeworth's office
13121.content:
After some consideration, Gumshoe decided to go to the Prosecutor's Office for his first test of the remote. If this thing really worked, he wanted Edgeworth to be the first one to know. It didn't take very long for Him to get to the prosecutor's office. He was allowed right in, after all, he was here very often to either see Edgeworth or clean Edgeworth's office.

As Gumshoe walked up the stairs to the floor that Edgeworth's office was on, he had a thought. Edgeworth wasn't the kind of person to just believe in something just because he's told, especially if what he's told sounds impossible. The only thing he believed in was evidence. How would he convince Edgeworth that the remote was real? That's when Gumshoe had a great idea. He would go to Edgeworth's office as someone else! Edgeworth wouldn't believe him i he just said what the remote did, but there's no way he wouldn't believe him if he someone else. Not even Edgeworth could think of a better explanation for why someone else was acting like him!

Now the question was, whose body should Gumshoe take? He was already at the prosecutor's office, so why not take the body of another prosecutor? Gumshoe gave some thought about what other prosecutors he knew and then he realized...he didn't really know that many prosecutors. The only to that came to mind were Franziska Von Karma and that Payne guy. There was no way he was going to take the body of that Payne guy, he was at least 20 years older than Gumshoe! He guessed he could switch with Von Karma, but if he somehow messed up, then he would be on the receiving end of a whip.

Of course, he didn't have to take the body of a prosecutor. Edgeworth had met many people over the years and Gumshoe was with him when he met those people! Unfortunately, Gumshoe didn't know where any of those people lived, but it was entirely possible, though improbable, that Gumshoe could run into at least one person that both he and Edgeworth knew on the way to Edgeworth's office.

As Gumshoe got closer to Edgeworth's office, he realized he had to make his choice. Who does he switch with?
13121.title: The Prosecutor's Office

choices: He gets interuppted along the way
131211.content:
As Gumshoe made his way to the prosecutor's office, he encounter someone he usually winced at whenever they met, Franziska Von Karma. "H-hello sir!" Gumshoe greeted her

"Detective, I assume that you're here to help a prosecutor with a case they're working on?" Franziska asked

"N-no sir. Today is a slow day for me and I don't have any-" Gumshoe was interrupted by Franziska's whip hitting his body.

"Fool! There are crimes going on every day!" Franziska said with another crack of her whip "A detective cannot afford to take a day off!"

Between whip cracks, Gumshoe reached for the remote in his jacket, for once he didn't need to just sit still and take the verbal (and physical) abuse. He clicked the Aware Swap button while pointing at himself, then swiftly pulled it out of his jack and pointed it at Franziska.

Suddenly Gumshoe's view switched around. He was now staring at his own body, and the whip was in *his* hand. His own body was staring at him confused. Gumshoe noticed that the remote was still in his body's hand. He needed to act fast!

He quickly whipped forward "Fool! Listen to what I say! Go out and find some crime to investigate!" He did his best Franziska impression. The shock from being whipped caused Franziska to drop the remote.

"W-what is going on?! Why are you-" Franziska began to demand answers, but was whipped again by Gumshoe, who was very happy not to be on the receiving side for once.

Franziska wanted more than anything to confront her own body about what was going on, however everytime she spoke she was met with the force of her own whip! She eventually gave up and bregrudidly walked away.

Gumshoe breathed a sigh of relief as he picked up the remote from the ground. If Franziska had payed less attention to him and looked down for even a second, the how ruse would've been ruined.

"Okay, got a new body. No way Mr. Edgeworth will think I'm crazy if I explain it to him now!" Gumshoe said as he resumed his walk to meet Edgeworth
131211.title: Franziska Von Karma

choices: He agrees and goes back to normal
He doesn't want to go back to normal yet
1312111.content:
"Mr. Edgeworth!" Gumshoe shouted in glee with Franziska's voice as he barged into Edgeworth's office. Edgeworth was shocked to say the least, he nearly dropped his cup of tea

"F-franziska?" Edgeworth asked "Are you feeling alright?" was all he could think of asking

Gumshoe had a wide grin plastered all of his borrowed face "I've never felt better thanks to this!" He held the remote forward to show Edgeworth

Edgeworth was now curious "and that is?"

"It's some kinda body switching doo-dad! It's me Gumshoe, Mr. Edgeworth! I'm in miss Von Karma's body!"

Edgeworth let out a sigh and rubbed his head. This was already beginning to give him a headache. However, he knew that Franziska would never make a joke like this "and where did you get this, remote?"

"I got it in the mail! Pretty cool huh, I'm a big important prosecutor like you are now!" Gumshoe said proud of himself

"No you're not, you merely stole the body of one. Speaking of, can I assume that Franziska is in your body?"

"Yup! She wanted me to go and do some work on my day off. So I took her body and pretended to be her before sending her off."

Edgeworth stood up "Right, well, let's get you back to normal"

Gumshoe was admitabley shocked "but, why sir?!"

"Because having someone like you stay in the bidy of Ms. Von Karma will only lead to disaster. We must correct this." Edgeworth said

How does Gumshoe respond?
1312111.title: Gumshoe meets with Edgeworth

13122.content:
Looking at his watch, Gumshoe figured he was going to get off soon. No one would miss him if he ducked out of the office an hour early, so he pulled on his coat, pocketing the remote, and decided to head on out to go show it to Maggey over at her place.

---

A car ride later, he was over at Maggey's place, with her reading over the remote's instructions. "Are you sure they weren't all gathered at your desk to see you try it?" Maggey asked. "Cause it seems like a mean prank. People at the station like to pick on you sometimes."

Gumshoe shook his head, "no, the mail guy had no clue where it came from, but he said it got past security so I doubt it'll like, zap me or anything. And if it is a joke, then they won't get the satisfaction of seeing my try it, right pal?"

Maggey simply handed the device back to Gumshoe and crossed her arms, "well, if you're deadset on testing it, you ought to be the one to press the button. Knowing my luck it'll come to life and bite me or something."

Gumshoe looked to her and shrugged his shoulders, "which of the buttons do you want to test out? Since you're letting me use it, you ought to make the choice, right?"

She shook her head in response. "I'm not taking responsibility for that! But I'll trust you with it" She gave a laugh and a wink, "it's funny how much deliberation you're putting into it. I think you should just try whichever one you want, its your toy. Just, if it works, let me have a try at it too, alright? I'd love to be someone with better fortune."

Gumshoe nodded, "glad you trust me! Alright, for the first test we'll use..."
13122.title: He goes to find Maggey

1312211.content:
Gumshoe pressed the aware swap button and in an instant he was now looking at his own body. He looked down and could immediately tell that the swap worked. He was in Maggey's body! He was a lot smaller and thinner in Maggey's body While he was interested in the body he was now in he was interrupted by the sound of his own body screaming. He looked back up and saw Maggey in his body touching herself all over. Amazed at how large and bulky she was

As she kept feeling around her new body to make sure that this was all real, Gumshoe spoke up "I guess it did work." He said with a small laugh.

Maggey just nodded in silence. She looked down and realized that she dropped the remote that was in Gumshoe's hand when the swap happened. She bent down and picked it up. "Who could have sent this to you?"

Gumshoe shrugged "Heck if I know pal, only thing I know is that it works."

"Well, now that we know it works, do you want to switch back? You're body feels so weird." Maggey said.

Gumshoe thought about it. On one hand, it was pretty weird being in Maggey's body. On the other hand, it felt so strange being someone else, maybe he should wait before asking Maggey to swap them back?

What did he decide to do?
1312211.title: Aware swap

choices: "We should split up now and meet later in the evening."
13122112.content:
Gumshoe fiddled with Maggey's glasses, not used to having such blurry vision. Looking down was even more strange; Maggey's body was so tiny! Not to mention, Gumshoe just felt off without his coat. All Maggey had was a tank top and jeans, Gumshoe wasn't used to having no sleeves, especially with arms as scrawny as hers. "So what do we do now?" he asked, his voice quiet due to discomfort.

Maggey darted her (his?) eyes away from Gumshoe's gaze for a second. "Well..."

Gumshoe gestured to the device, "do you want to switch back now? I don't mind."

Maggey raised her hands a bit defensively, "well, there's no rush, right? This is once in a lifetime after all! Would you be okay, just... staying like this for a day? I-I mean it might help us understand each- uh, the remote, right?"

Gumshoe smiled and gave a nod, glad that Maggey wasn't too put off by the experience. "Sure, pal! Should I start calling you detective then?"

Maggey laughed in response, "y'know, I never had the chance to get very far in the ranks, so sure. You can be Maggey Byrde, and... I'll be Detective Gumshoe I guess? Suppose that's a little bit of a step up from bad luck goddess."

Gumshoe got up from the chair, excited at the prospects that were before, "don't sweat it pal! With this, I think both our luck is about to turn around. Unlucky people wouldn't be sent something like this."

Maggey pumped a large fist and got up as well, "you're right! The world's our oyster now. So, how do you want to spend the day, Maggey?"
13122112.title: Don't swap back yet

choices: Let his body head out on its own.
Go back to normal and go find Edgeworth.
1312221.content:
"Alright then, I'll test... this one!" Gumshoe announced, as he pushed the possession button with his thumb.

From Maggey's perspective, Gumshoe merely blinked and shook his head, as though he had woken up from a nap. "Are you okay there detective?" She asked, somewhat concerned.

What seemed to be Gumshoe began to scratch the back of his head, "yeah, I think so. Just sorta... blanked out for a second there... what were we talking about again pal?"

A bit concerned, Maggey told Gumshoe to sit down for a second, as she went off to get some water for him. Little did she know, Gumshoe himself was actually floating up above, watching the scene unfold. 'Holy smokes, I'm flying!' He floated behind Maggey, trying to follow her in the kitchen to get her attention, but she couldn't hear him at all.

'C'mon pal, turn around!' He pushed himself forward towards Maggey, trying to get her attention, but instead of making contact he floated through her, and suddenly his perspective began to spin. He was thankfully physical again, but that's where the similarities stopped. Looking around the room, Gumshoe immediately realized he was about a foot shorter, and all the sensations of his body were different. He realized he was much thinner, wearing glasses, and his arms were bare in a tanktop. In his left hand was the device from earlier.

His heart pounding, Gumshoe sprinted from the kitchen to Maggey's bathroom, stumbling due to his new center of balance. Looking in the mirror, his fears were confirmed: he was in Maggey's body. "It- it's real," he shouted, stunned to heat Maggey's voice and see her face move at his command. He began poking and prodding himself all over; it was definitely real. His shock slowly turned to amazement as he looked down to the remote. He was Maggey for real! He could be anyone.

"You okay, pal?" Gumshoe heard his own voice call from down the hall.

"Uh, yeah," Gumshoe as Maggey called back, disturbed at hearing his own voice, "my, uh, stomach hurts!" He looked down one more time, examining his new arms and hands. Maggey gave him permission to test the device, but that wasn't necessarily permission to stay once he knew it worked. He looked to the remote and supposed he ought to return to his own body for Maggey's sake.

"Well, don't worry about me, I'm feeling fine now," Gumshoe's body continued. "I just got a call from Mr. Edgeworth though, he needs me for an investigation, so I gotta head out right away. Thanks for talking!"

Gumshoe realized that if he wanted to return to his body, he ought to do it right away. But if he did, he wouldn't be able to explain what happened to Maggey! his body seemed fine without him, it could probably handle the investigation while he found some way to explain things to Maggey without his body. On the other hand, maybe the device could help Mr. Edgeworth? Certainly, becoming anyone would aid an investigation.
1312221.title: Possession

13122211.content:
Gumshoe chose to stay in Maggey's body for now, Just until he thought of some way to explain to her what happened. He was pretty sure that his body would be okay on it's own during the investigation, although he'll have to ask Mr. Edgeworth what happened today when he comes into work tomorrow. He looked in the mirror one more time, just to make sure that it was all real. After double checking that every one of his senses wasn't lying to him, he walked out of the bathroom.

Gumshoe went to Maggey's living room and put on a blue coat, not because he was cold, but because he felt naked without one. He sat on Maggey's couch and thought about what to do. The sensations of being in a different body being even more apparent as he sat down, It was weird to say the least.

He could wait around Maggey's place until his body was done helping Mr. Edgeworth, but who knows how long that could take? His body could be out for most of the day. Alternatively, he could go outside and possess a random passerby, but there were two problems with that. One was that if he left Maggey's body and took someone else's, would Maggey believe that it was him in someone else? The other problem was the other person, Maggey gave him permission to use the remote on her, he would feel bad if he took the body of some random person without their consent.

There was also the third option, he could leave Maggey's place and go somewhere as her. Although he didn't really know where he would go, although it would be interesting being a different person and go to the places he would usually go. At the same time though, he didn't want to violate Maggey's privacy and going around town as her would definitley be a huge breach of privacy. Plus, he could risk running into someone who knows Maggey, and he would have no idea how to act like her if that happened, he could end up embarrassing her if he messed up.

After thinking it over he decided to....
13122211.title: Let his body head out on its own.

choices: Gumshoe's body, who was coming back.
Edgeworth. Something happened to 'Gumshoe' while investigating.
131222111.content:
Gumshoe figured the best thing he could do for Maggey at the moment was stay put and just wait things out until his body was back safely. He didn't want to freak her out by just leaving, and he didn't want to risk leaving the apartment in her body either. Flipping through channels on the television, he resolved to just let time pass without paying much notice to his current form.

The detective managed to do this for about thirty minutes before his patience wore thin. No matter how hard he tried to keep his attention on the TV, some sensation would drag him away from it and focus himself back to his new body. Either the glasses on his nose, hair tickling the back of his neck, an itch on his legs, or some other thing offered a distraction whenever he felt like he was nearly engrossed in what he was watching.

"I just need a different outfit or something," he told himself as he got up from the couch. "Will only take a moment," he muttered, walking over to Maggey's room. It was a pretty small an sparse area; just a mirror, some drawers, and the bed. Gumshoe through off the coat he had put on and looked in the mirror, now just in a tank top and shorts. He rubbed at his arms a bit, feeling weird at having them exposed. His hands moved downwards over Maggey's stomach, astonished at how skinny her body was compared to his own.

He looked from left to right nervously, as though he felt he was being watched, as he pulled out the front of Maggey's shirt and looked down. He quickly looked away, embarrassed that he did it.

"Wow," he mumbled, his face red at the action. "Let's just... see what there is to wear..."

---

"Well hello there, pal!" Gumshoe exclaimed with a smile and salute to the mirror, "how can I serve you?" It took a short period of time for him to get over his previous trepidation. After searching through Maggie's closet and finding her old waitress outfit, he quickly went out of his way to throw it on. The outfit looked great on her, but he assumed she preferred not to wear it due to bad memories associated with the job.

It was definitely a breach of privacy, but Gumshoe decided he would try to have some fun to relieve his stress while he was stuck here. Besides, it wasn't every day he would be using a woman's body. Why not try out something different while he was here?

He was fiddling with the ribbon, trying to tie it in the back of Maggey's hair, when the cell phone rang. He took a moment to finish it up and then grabbed the phone.

"Uh, hey, this is Maggey," he replied uneasily despite his prior confidence in the mirror.

Who was on the other end?
131222111.title: Stay at her place

choices: Gumshoe's body left something at Maggey's
1312221112.content:
"This is Ms. Byrde, correct?" Said the voice of Miles Edgeworth from the other end of the line.

"Oh, uh, hiya, Mr. Edgeworth, sir!" Gumshoe replied.

"Apologies for calling on such short notice, but something has happened involving Detective Gumshoe and I felt I should contact you."

"Huh!? What happened!?" Gumshoe said. Pretending to be Maggey might not have been as hard as he thought. But that didn't matter! What happened!?

What did happen?
1312221112.title: A call from Edgeworth

13122211122.content:
"I don't want you to panic," Edgeworth prefaced, "but detective Gumshoe was injured in an encounter with a criminal. We cornered our culprit, but he was too quick for us. Gumshoe took a nasty fall as a result."

Gumshoe felt his (Maggey's?) blood turn to ice. 'I'm not dead am I?!' The silence was brief but felt like a lifetime.

"Now I don't want you to worry," Edgeworth continued. "Thankfully, the detective was rushed to a hospital right away. He's out like a light and might need a crutch for a bit when he comes too, but the doctor's say he'll be alright."

Gumshoe breathed a sigh of relief, even if it wasn't great news. He had no idea what he'd do if his body had died without him in it! ...would the remote even work for him after that point?

"Uh, can I visit him?" Gumshoe asked, regaining some composure.

"I'm afraid not," Edgeworth replied, "the doctor's are saying they'll need a day - maybe two - to operate and let him rest before they'll admit visitors."

Gumshoe nodded. "Alright. Uh, thank you, Mr. Edgeworth."

"It's not problem Maggey. I'm sorry I had to be the bearer of bad news about this. My work on this case is done until the police catch the culprit, so if you need anything, feel free to give me a call." With that, the conversation ended, and Gumshoe was left to consider his options as he sat down on Maggey's bed, still dressed up in her Waitress uniform.

"Definitely not going back into my body while the doctors are looking it over," he decided. "What if I'm under the knife? That'd be horrible! Will at least have to wait until I can get visitors..."

But the question stood: what would he do with Maggey's body until then? It didn't feel right to just keep it without her permission. This was supposed to just be a short display of the device's abilities - not a 2 day sojourn! It'd be a betrayal of trust to just steal her life, but then, would she even know? She didn't believe the remote worked, after all. Being someone was certainly the best way to get to know them, and he'd been wanting to improve their relationship. Not to mention, when she finally wakes up, Gumshoe himself will be in the hospital. Hardly like she'd be able to blame him for a prolonged blackout when he's injured.

Regardless of his decision, he realized that it'd be weird to keep wearing her uniform, so he got back to his feet and began to change back into a normal outfit. He took a brief look in the mirror as he thought his course of action out.
13122211122.title: Gumshoe's body got himself hurt

choices: Call Edgeworth and ask about case information
131222111221.content:
Gumshoe chose to keep stay in Maggey's body for now, it was a breach of privacy and he felt bad about it, but he justified it in his mind by telling himself that he would be away from his body for at least a day, he couldn't take the life of a stranger and live that person's life, but he knew Maggey well enough to live her life for a day or two.

Gumshoe looked in the mirror again "Sorry Maggey, but I'm gonna have to stay as you for a bit, I'll make sure to be careful." He said, despite knowing that she couldn't here him. He sat down and though about what to do. One thought that came to his mind was to call up Mr. Edgeworth and ask about the case that he was just working on.

Gumshoe may be in Maggey's body, but his mind was still that of a detective. If there's a criminal on the loose, then it's his job to bring them in! The fact that this criminal was responsible for putting Gumshoe's body in the hospital only made it even more important that he catches him!

Investigating would be hard, considering that Maggey wasn't even a police officer anymore, let alone a detective, but Gumshoe had enough faith in his own personal investigative skills to think that he would succeed

However, Gumshoe wasn't sure if going out to find a criminal in Maggey's body was a good idea, if something bad happened, then Maggey would be the one to get hurt, or worse. The thought of Maggey getting hurt because of him sickened Gumshoe to his stomach.

Not to mention, Gumshoe also planned to live out Maggey's life until he was able to go back to his own body, it would be rather difficult to live her life while simultaneously running his own private investigation. What did Gumshoe decide to do?
131222111221.title: Gumshoe Keeps Maggey's Body

131222112.content:
Detective Gumshoe decided to just stay put for the moment, not really wanting to put himself on the spot in Maggey's body, but he didn't really know what to do in her place. Gumshoe briefly tried to lounge about and just watch TV, but it failed to take his mind off of things. He kept noticing strands of hair out of the corners of his eyes, or a stray itch would remind him of his different proportions. 'Is Maggey even awake at all for any of this?' he wondered, eventually forgetting what on the television as worrying thoughts entered his mind.

"I guess I can atleast try to talk to her somehow..." Gumshoe muttered in Maggey's high pitched voice as he began to brainstorm ideas. He didn't want to take anyone else's body yet, but one idea did come to mind. Looking around, Gumshoe eventually found a stray notebook. Flipping through, he skipped to an empty page and began to write.

'Maggey, it's me, Gumshoe! The device worked, but my own body had to run off. I'm sorta stuck without one for now.'

He was a bit hesitant, unsure as to how she would react, but picked up the device again and clicked 'possession', pulling himself out of Maggey's body.

Maggey seemed rather befuddled. "G-gumshoe? Where did you go?" she asked, getting no vocal response. She looked down and realized she had suddenly donned a coat, which she took off, rather disturbed. Looking at the clock, she noticed that about 10 minutes had gone by. "Did... I just black out?"

'Look at the note pal!' Gumshoe silently urged from above. 'C'mon!' Thankfully for him, she eventually did notice the message set out for her on the table.

Unfortunately, she didn't seem convinced. "Detective, is this a prank on me all of a sudden?" she asked, "cause its not funny! Now come on out, where-ever you're hiding."

If he had lungs, Gumshoe would've sighed. It seemed that Maggey would require more proof. Reluctantly, he floated back down, taking over her body again. The first thing he did was have her put the coat back on, both to make a point and make himself more comfortable once again. He then picked the pen back up and resumed writing.

'Its no joke! I'm not smart enough to pull something like this off, you gotta believe me - I used the possession button.' This time, Gumshoe decided to take off Maggey's glasses, putting them on the counter on top of the note. His vision suddenly went blurry but he could still see well enough to hit the possession button once again, resuming ghost form.

Maggey was much more confused this time. "What the - who - woah!" Gumshoe realized he might've went too far on that one, as Maggey soon fell backwards, landing herself on the floor. "Oooow..." she muttered, placing a hand on her back as she got back up. Thankfully, she could see well enough to locate her glasses on the small table, putting them back on and reading Gumshoe's addition to the note. She looked up around the room nervously before replying, "okay, now I might believe you."

'Yes!'

"But, uh, interacting with you is pretty hard if you don't have a body," Maggey said, still not sure she wasn't just talking to herself. "Do you think you could... get another one? Just for a bit? If you do, come back here and knock on the door 4 times."

Gumshoe figured this was the best option he had. He flew out of Maggey's apartment and down to the street below, hoping to find someone who didn't seem too busy to 'borrow' them for a moment.

---

Ultimately, Gumshoe only found a few candidates. First off, he found the strange sight of Mr. Wright in casual clothing (a hoody and a hat). Gumshoe had only ever seen him in the blue suit; he couldn't imagine Wright as anyone but a suit and tie attorney, but he supposed it was definitely a fortuitous encounter. If he wasn't dressed as an attorney, he probably was off work, right? He seemed to be alone, although the way he was seated at the bench made it seem he might've been waiting for someone.

The second candidate was one of the reporters he had seen on a case with Edgeworth not long ago. She was younger than the other one, and had spiky hair. She was still carrying that monstrous backpack and had her tape recorder hanging from her waist. She may have been on the job, but if the few encounters he had with her were any indication, she probably wasn't going to blow the lid on a big scoop any time soon.

Which did Gumshoe pick?
131222112.title: Possess a random passerby

1312221122.content:
Gumshoe thought about it for a while and soon decided to possess Nicole. While possessing Mr. Wright would have been more ideal since he would have been a man again, he had known Mr. Wright long enough to know that people almost always end up accused for murder when Wright was around, and Gumshoe didn't want to deal with that. While Nicole was involved with two of Edgeworth's cases, she wasn't involved with nearly as many cases as Wright.

Gumshoe floated toward Nicole and was once again in another person's body. He stumbled back an forth trying to get a steady balance. Between the large backpack and not being used to Nicole's body made it nearly impossible not stumble. After getting his footing he headed back to Maggey's apartment. He knocked on her door four times like she said.

After a few seconds Maggey opened the door and had a shocked look on here face "Is that you Gumshoe?" She asked. Surprised to see that Gumshoe went into another female body.

"Yeah, Pal, it's me. There weren't many people walking by." He said, once again surprised to hear another person's voice when he spoke, as he walked into the apartment. Once he was inside he took off Nicole's huge backpack and set it on Maggey's couch.

"So, who are you right now?" Maggey asked, curious.

"Oh, yeah. She was involved with a case Mr. Edgeworth worked on a while back, I think her name was Nicole or something, She's a reporter. Gumshoe explained to Maggey. After a few seconds of silence Gumshoe spoke up again "So now what?"

"Heck if I know. I'm still freaked out by all of this." Maggey said.

Gumshoe eyed the remote still in his hand. "Well, we could try out the other buttons. We know that possession button works. Maybe we could try the others? Or we can go somewhere, I don't know about that though. Wouldn't want to run into anyone Nicole knows. It's up to you though." Gumshoe said.

After thinking it over Maggey decided to...
1312221122.title: Nicole Swift (AAI2)

13122211222.content:
"Well," Maggey said, "we don't know how the rest of the buttons will react if you're in a body with someone right?" She gestured to Nicole's body which Gumshoe had commandeered. "Maybe they'd work differently in the circumstance?"

Gumshoe turned it over in Nicole's tan hands as he considered it. "That's... a good thought. I guess she must be in here with me after all, right?"

Maggey nodded, letting the thought of the possibilities overcome her apprehension at Gumshoe being in that weird woman's body. "Yeah! Like, what would happen if we used one of the swaps? Would she carry over with you or just stay there? Or what if I tried to possess you while you're possessing someone else? There's a lot of questions! We should try stuff out first."

Figuring that Maggey was probably way ahead of him, Gumshoe handed the device over to her. "Well, alright pal," he said in Nicole's voice, "try whichever you want. I sorta imposed this whole thing on you after all."

Anxiously, Maggey looked over the options. The swaps immediately posed a lot of questions; if they did an aware swap, would Nicole's consciousness stay with her body, or would it carry over to Maggey's? And what of unaware? Where would she end up, and would she even know her body was out of place? Finally, she could just try to double layer a possession to see what it would cause. Its possible Gumshoe would just black out like Nicole did, but there was no way to know until they tried it.

Which function did Maggey go with?

143.content:
Cody was kicking and screaming as security guards carried him out of global studios like the small child that he was. He had just been caught sneaking in on the production of the Steel Samurai movie, he snuck in through his usual method of going through the vent, but there were apparently guards around the entrance to the vent to keep away kids.

He needed to get in there and see what was going on! The Steel Samurai movie was the greatest thing to happen to any Steel Samurai fan, he needed to get in there and see the filming of the movie, but with all these guards doing that would be hard. If only he had some way of getting in there.

As the guards put him down outside of the entrance to the studio, Cody ran a block away and began to look through his backpack. He was looking to see if anything he brought would help him. He looked around at what he brought. Toy sword, trading cards, a exact copy of the steel samurai mask, and... a strange package.

"I didn't bring any mail! Who put this here? This backpack is only for extremely rare steel samurai merch!" Cody said, angry that someone put something in his backpack. "Well, finders keepers." Cody said as he began to tear through the package. Inside was a remote and a instruction manual.

Cody read through it and rolled his eyes. "Body swapping? As if!" He thought the remote was just some stupid prank. Although, it wouldn't hurt to try it. If it did work, then he could use it to get into the set of the Steel Samurai movie. He could sneak back in and before he got kicked out he could switch with someone in the studio and be there without anyone knowing!

But, did he want that to be the first thing he did with the remote? He didn't even know if it worked, did he want to risk sneaking in the studio the same way again for a plan that might not even work? Maybe he should go somewhere else first and try it before he goes into the studio?

What did Cody decide to do?

1431.content:
Cody didn't want to miss out on the Steel Samurai movie for anything. If the remote didn't work, he didn't care; he would just have to improvise a way into the the movie without it. He looked over the directions once more, trying to find functions that could help him. Shapeshift seemed to be the thing he wanted; he could turn into anyone else and fall under the radar! Possession could be useful too, but Cody wanted to collect an autograph or a souvenir while he was there, so it wouldn't be as good. Body swapping would likely be too dangerous - he didn't want someone else in his body making noise or getting caught.

Putting the box and instructions back into his bag, Cody skulked back towards the studio, this time taking a different path off to the west side of the building in hopes of avoiding the guards that caught him before.

---

About 20 minutes later, Cody found himself in a dressing room, although he wasn't sure whose. Filming had just started, so the rooms were a bit bare; for all he knew he was in the Steel Samurai's room itself! It was an exciting thought. He was about to dig around before he suddenly heard a rapping on the door behind him.

"Mr. Powers, are you in there?" the voice asked.

Cody's eyes widened as he realized his cover was about to be blown. Thinking quickly, he noticed a large, cardboard box off to the corner, just big enough to fit him. He ran over and scrambled to get underneath it just as the doorknob turned. "I hear you in there! Open up."

"Mr. Powers? Weird, I though I heard something," the person spoke as they entered the room. Cody pulled the remote from his shirt pocket, seeing this as a great time to test the device out. He looked though a small hole in the box, only to see...
1431.title: Try using it to get into the studio

14311.content:
Cody looked out of the box as pulled the remote out of his shirt pocket. The person who came in was Penny Nichols. Cody recognized her from other times he had snuck into the studio. She was an assistant and worked with the crew at the studio, although that was all he really knew about her. If he used the remote on her he would be able to go onto the set unnoticed and maybe even meet and get an autograph from the Steel Samurai himself!

Penny wouldn't have been Cody's first choice to use the remote on. He didn't want to become a girl, but who knows if anyone else would come into this dressing room anytime soon. He couldn't leave the dressing room, he might get seen and caught. Penny was the only choice.

But what button should he press? Possessing her would be the easiest thing to do, but what would his body be doing? Would it try to sneak in on it's own and get caught while he was in Penny's body? The next best one would be Shapeshift, if he did that he wouldn't have to worry about his body or anybody in it, but what if Penny saw him? Then there was Aware Swap, He would be in Penny's body, but she would also be in his, what would she do in his body and would it be a good idea to let a girl in his body? Finally there was aware swap, that really wouldn't help at all. If he used that it would only make it easier for him to get caught. After thinking it over he made his choice about what button to use on her.

As he pointed the remote, Penny began to leave the dressing room "I guess I was just hearing things. I gotta find him soon, filming is about to start." She said. It was now or never, he had to use the remote on her now or he might never get another chance to.

Cody pressed one of the button as she walked out the door. Which one of the buttons did he press?
14311.title: Penny Nichols

choices: Cody gets interrupted in his search
1431111.content:
Out of nowhere, Cody suddenly found himself standing up in the middle of the room. He felt the weight of a pair of glasses over his eyes and could feel longer hair tickling the back of his neck. Not to mention, he was a decent bit taller! Looking down - barely catching his glasses - he realized he did it! He was in that lady's body!

And as he realized what had happened, so did she. The box he was hiding in suddenly began to shake and move as it's occupant shouted in confusion and surprise. "What happened? Where am I?!"

Thinking on his feet, Cody suddenly had an idea. Using his new body, he walked over to the corner of the room, and threw the box aside. "Wait, WHAT?! Are you me!?" Penny shouted in shock. She suddenly looked down at herself, and became all too aware of her new body as well. Cody gave her no response, and instead swept up the device she had dropped on the ground, putting it away in one of his new vest pockets.

"Guards! A kid broke in to the studio!" He shouted, a bit surprised by his new voice.

Shortly, the guards who had thrown him out early marched into the room. Penny protested, insisting they didn't know what was going on, but they paid her no heed and dragged her off in Cody's body. Cody smiled victoriously, and pumped his arm. He imagined he'd get in trouble now; they'd probably tell his parents after kicking him out twice, but he'd worry about that later. He didn't really care for being a girl either, but it was a small price to pay to see the Steel Samurai.

Deciding to take stock of his new body, Cody set off towards the bathrooms. His face was a bit red as he reluctantly opted to go into the women's restroom to look at his new body in the mirror. "Wow! I'm like a real adult," he muttered in awe as he saw his new face repeating what he said in the reflection. Now no one would talk down to him like he was some little kid! He made a number of goofy expressions in the mirror, sticking out tongue and pulling at his cheeks, just to make sure it was all real. He also fiddled with Penny's glasses, a bit unhappy to find that she could hardly see at all without them. This lady would do for now, but he figured he might end up finding a different one soon.

"First, I need to find the Samurai!" he declared, as he rushed out of the bathroom, excited to have free reign of the studio.

As he walked he noticed how much taller he was. Assistant lady wasn't very tall, but she was at least a foot taller than him. As he walked he passed by fixed up Mr. Monkey statue. he stood next to it to compare his height. He wasn't as tall as the statue, but he half the size! He took a few steps back and rubbed the bottom of his nose with his finger. "Not so tall now, Mr. Monkey." He said smugly

As he celebrated his small victory against Mr. Monkey's size he heard a familiar voice. "Assistant!" The person yelled at him.

Cody turned around and nearly jumped when he saw who it was. It was that old security lady. Normally he would have to run as fast as he could when he saw her, but now he wouldn't have to. "Yeah, yeah. I'll do that, Oldy" Cody said and ran past Oldbag, nearly knocking her over. he didn't plan to actually go to the front gate, he just wanted her to shut up.

He reached into Assistant Lady's vest pocket and pulled out the remote once again. Before Oldbag could get away, he point it at her and pressed "Aware Swap", the device registering her as the first target.

An impish smirk on his borrowed face, Cody then set about finding a second target. He completely forewent checking the guard post, and instead ran towards what he knew was the employee area. It didn't take long at all now that he could take normal routes; he also could run faster with Penny's longer legs! 'This body isn't half bad!' Oldbag looks around more, trying to figure out what to do.

14311112111.content:
Running as fast as he could, Cody booked it to Studio Two, thrilled to finally find the Steel Samurai. He remembered being here a year or so ago, sneaking in on the filming of the show, only to see what looked like the Samurai lose a fight! It was a traumatic event for him, but he wouldn't let that memory hold him back getting to see his hero.

Breathing heavily, Cody finally reached the set, and saw a man bent over by the trailer a few yards off. "Jeeze... this girl... doesn't have much energy," Penny's body could've ran faster, but it definitely didn't have Cody's energy. Determined however, Cody took a deep breath, and approached the man by the trailer. looking down, Cody saw what seemed to be flowers laid out, around the place where he saw the Samurai lose last year.

"Steel Samurai!?" Cody blurted out, wanting to get his attention. The man leaped up and turned around, startled, and Cody finally saw his face.

"Penny? Don't scare me like that," the large, gruff looking fellow exclaimed. Cody was in shock - this man didn't look like a hero at all! He looked like a villain, in fact! "Also you know to call me Will."

"Uh, sorry Mr. Samu- Will?"

"Anyways, I guess you're here to get me on set?" he asked. "Tell them I'll be there in a minute or two. I'm almost done."

"Er, uh," Cody was starstruck and shocked at the same time. "Well, actually, filming is delayed for the moment. The director ran off, yeah."

"Really? Well, I'll be back soon anyways. Are you okay Penny? You're staring at me like I have five heads."

Penny must've been collecting them just like him. It wasn't a rare one, but it would do. "I want your autograph!"

Powers laughed, "could've sworn I already gave you one, but sure why not." Powers fished out a pen and wrote a quick signature on the card. "You happy?"

Cody just nodded in silence as he put the card away in his pocket. "Uh, I'll go now!" With that, Cody awkwardly left the studio in his borrowed body. He finally got the autograph, but it wasn't nearly as cool as he imagined. He totally blew it! He acted like a wimp in front of the Steel Samurai himself. "I just wasn't prepared," he told himself. "I didn't expect him to be so scary looking. I bet if I had a second try I could do it."

Cody slowly realized that he could have a second chance. All he needed was a different body and he could go meet the Samurai again! But then, he had already gotten his autograph and got some revenge on Oldbag. Maybe he should quit while he was ahead and just go home with his prize now? After all, he had an amazing device at his disposal. Not to mention, if he came back tomorrow, he could probably watch the Samurai fight the magistrate! Maybe he could even get some photos!

He lazily through off Penny's vest over the couch and looked around her kitchen for something to eat.

Not much for cooking, Cody threw together a sandwich and some chips. He spent most of the night snacking in front of the TV, but without the confidence or energy to go out and about with Penny's body, he eventually decided to go to bed early, crashing in Penny's bed much earlier than he would in his own body.

---

"...huh?" Cody muttered as he heard an alarm go off. It was summer, right? Why was there an alarm?

He pushed himself up from bed, and everything felt off. His sight was blurry, and his arms and legs were much longer than they were supposed to be. Looking down at his body, it all came back to him. He had found a device the day before, and he had taken a lady's body at the studio!

Getting to his feet, he looked to the night stand, turning off the alarm and fumbling around for Penny's glasses. "I can't believe that wasn't a dream..." Cody muttered, looking at Penny's reflection in the mirror. To be honest, she looked a bit bedraggled. Her hair was askew and her clothes were wrinkled as well, since Cody slept in them.

With a grimace, it dawned on Cody that he'd have to get ready to go to the shooting with Penny's body. 'Gross,' he thought, 'I don't want to have to bathe as her!' In his haste yesterday, Cody wasn't really thinking too far ahead about the logistics of body theft. He just wanted to watch the filming!

Thinking it over, Cody reasoned this was't really his body though. So what if Penny's coworkers think her hair looks rough, or that she smells bad? It'd be her problem in the long run, not his. With some resignation, however, Cody figured he ought to change clothes. Nervously, he looked to her clothing drawer and started searching for something to wear.

Cody's face was a bit red after his search, but he did manage to find a simple outfit. Cody flipped Penny's mirror around and closed his eyes as he undressed, changing out the long sleeved shirt and jeans for a plain yellow t-shirt and black running shorts. The process of undressing involved some uncomfortable sensations, but it was brief, and it'd be worth it to see more of the filming! He gave his body a look in the mirror and figured that it was good enough though; no one expected an assistant to dress nicely anyways. Satisfied with his small attempt, Cody went back out into the other room, remembering to grab Penny's vest as he hiked down the stairway of her apartment to head back to the studio.
14311112111221.title: Stay at her apartment

143111121112212.content:
Cody was about a block away from the studio when he heard the shout.

"There you are!" The voice was familiar - loud and screechy - but he couldn't quite place it. "Stop! You!"

Cody turned around, but didn't see anyone. "Down here!" Looking down, Cody found who was shouting: his own body! "What did you do to us!? Fix this!"

Cody was a bit surprised to be seeing himself from this angle. 'Is my voice really like that?' he wondered for a moment, gawking at Penny in his body. 'No wonder they want to kick me out of the place. What a loudmouth!'

"Well, are you going to say something?" Penny asked, stomping a small foot on the ground, which Cody had to laugh at. He didn't know why, but seeing his own body act so demanding was funny to him! He hated it when other people treated him this way, but it was a lot of fun when he wasn't on the receiving end.

"Nah, I don't want to fix it right now," Cody replied with Penny's voice, resting his hands behind his head shrugging. "I need your body to see the filming of the fight, after all! No one's going to let a little kid into the studio."

Penny was shocked at the reply. "Y-you can't just steal my body like that! How did you even do this??"

Cody rested his hands behind his head, "none of your business. Now leave me alone, or I'll be late!"

Penny sniffed the air for a second. "Did you even shower? I can't go into work like this!"

Cody wrinkled up his nose, "ew, no. That'd be gross as you. You're a girl!"

"Well when are you going to change us back!"

Cody thought about it for a moment, "whenever I'm done I guess. I dunno."

"Then you'll be stuck as a girl, Cody," Penny replied, still trying to convince him to leave.

Cody shook his head, "well then it'll be worth it to see this movie! Now leave me alone, or I'll tell security to get rid of you!" Cody turned tail and ran off to the studio, leaving a shocked Penny behind, still aghast. "What's that kid's problem?!"
143111121112212.title: Something happens along the way

1431111211122121.content:
Cody marched into the studio in Penny's body, scarcely stopping to notice the shell shocked look on "Oldbag's" face as he moved past the security gate. He wasn't going to let Penny get in the way of his goals! What was even bothering her so much? She could just wait in his body! It wouldn't be that bad, right?

As he walked onto the set where the fight was going to be, people still seemed a bit scattered and lost. Apparently the director was still stuck in the throes of some sort of panic attack. He was yelling and howling about the whole studio, telling everyone how they were doing everything wrong.

"He's acting like a cranky old lady," a stray staff member complained. "Won't calm down even for a moment..." It suddenly dawned on Cody that this was probably his fault, but he wasn't in the mood to fix it yet. His thoughts were focused back on Penny, and how she might get in his way.

"Where on Earth is the Nickel Samurai!? Get Engarde on set!" the 'Director' shouted from his seat, "actors these days have no punctuality!"

'The Nickel Samurai is going to be in this?! Awesome!'

"I think he's over in the locker room," an intern replied. "He'll be here soon, please, just be patient!"

That caught Cody's attention. Penny probably knew how he was getting into the studio, and it stood to reason she could sneak in too. If he wanted to make sure she didn't interrupt his 'adventure', he'd have to find a way to either hide himself or hide the remote. He could put her vest (along with the device) away in the locker room, so it'd be behind lock and key, but he could also throw her off by getting a new body. And if he was someone such as the Nickel Samurai, he could go beyond watching the movie; he could be in it.

With a plan in mind, Cody set off for the locker rooms in order to...
1431111211122121.title: Follow Cody

14311112111221211.content:
Cody crept into the day lockers, hearing nothing in particular. He walked a bit further into the room, finding it to be completely empty. "That's disappointing," he muttered to himself. He was sorta hoping to atleast meet the nickel samurai. With a sigh, he resigned himself to just hiding the remote. Finding an empty locker, he stowed away Penny's vest, containing the remote, and set a temporary code to it.

"There! Totally safe." He announced, proud of himself. Even if Penny managed to break in, she couldn't force him to do anything or somehow steal the remote from him.

Proud of himself, he strutted outside the locker room, intent on heading back to the location to watch more of the shooting, but a voice suddenly reached out to him.

"Hey you!" It was a woman that Cody didn't really recognize at all. She had long blonde hair that went down her back and a small, square pair of glasses, as well as a blue top. She had a phone in her off-hand, with a call apparently on hold. "You have a moment?"

"I need to get back to filming, so not really," Cody replied rudely. The woman ignored him and instead stared at him up and down. She seemed to be sizing up Penny's body.

"You can get back to filming," she said, "but we might be able to have something new for you today. I'm Adrian, in charge of casting. Mindy's body double can't make it on-set, and not too many people can fill the costume. The director's having a bit of a meltdown though and the producers will lose it if we delay two days in a row."

"What does that have to do with me?" Cody replied, eyes shifting about to make sure it was just them. 'Does she know what I did to Oldbag?'

"You look like you'd fit the costume well enough," Andrews replied with a shrug. "How would you like to jump into the costume and be the Pink Princess for a scene or two? We're in a bit of rush, so I bet the studio would let me fudge the rules for an afternoon. And if we need to do it again during the filming, well, maybe you can have them sign you on for a credit. So how about it?"

As Cody processed what she was saying, stars appeared in his eyes. "Really? I can be in the movie!?"

The lady laughed, "sorta. You'll be in costume the whole time though. We're in a rush but thankfully you don't need makeup. Just run over to Mindy's trailer and they'll get you a costume."

She didn't have to tell him twice; Cody took the order literally and bolted from the building, rushing over to the trailer. It bummed him out that he would have to be the Pink Princess, the girliest character of them all, but he put that aside in light of getting to be on-screen. In light of this, being a girl didn't seem all that bad! Even if it wasn't his real body who'd get the credit, he didn't want to pass up the opportunity.

'Maybe if I do well, they'll let me do it again!' Cody mused enthusiastically as he arrived at the trailer.
14311112111221211.title: Hide away the device

choices: He goes to swap them back with no trouble
He runs into Penny in his body
143111121112212112.content:
Cody was exhausted. He regretted putting Oldbag in Manella's body in the first place, for the entire filming she was constantly shouting and making everyone do each scene over and over again telling them that "If it isn't perfect, your not trying hard enough!". The filming went on late too, Oldbag pushing everyone to finish all the work today, the only reason the filming stopped was because the guy playing the Nickel Samurai refused to film anymore and went home.

Another thing that annoyed Cody a bit was the costume, it was easily the pinkest and girliest thing that he ever worn in his life. He returned to the trailer where he got it and put it back.

As he left the trailer he ran into Adrian. "Ah, there you are." Adrian said. "Thanks for filling in today."

Cody let out a tired reply. "Yeah, whatever."

Adrian pulled out a small business card and handed it to Cody. "I'll cut to the chase. I just heard from out normal stunt double that she won't be able to perform for two weeks at the very least. How would you like to stand in for her for awhile?"

Cody looked at the business card and thought about it, the exhausting day he just had still fresh in mind.

"Just think about it and call the number on that card when you've made your choice." Adrian said then walked away.

As she walked away Cody thought about the offer. While he wanted to be in the movie, even if it was only as a stunt double, he didn't want to have to deal with Oldbag's directing. He supposed he could just switch her and Manella back.

Going back to the locker room where he had left Penny's vest and the remote. He decided to go and switch back Sal Manella and Oldbag.
143111121112212112.title: After the Filming

choices: Cody tries to compromise with Penny
Cody finds a different way to shut her up.
1431111211122121123.content:
"There you are! What took so long?!" Cody heard the same annoying voice from earlier shout; his voice to be exact. Or atleast it used to be his voice. Penny was the one using it now.

"Oh, you again? What do you want?" Cody asked, a dismissive tone to his voice.

"What do you mean what do I want!? I want my body back!" She shouted, clearly distressed at how nonchalant Cody was being.

Cody gave an annoyed sigh, "I already told you, I'll give it back when I'm done. Now, it's been a long day, so leave me alone, alright? I'm tired."

Penny shook her head and pounded a small fist against Cody's stomach. It didn't particularly hurt. "Just give me my body back now! I don't want to be stuck like this; you could ruin my job!"

Cody pushed her away and crossed Penny's arms indignantly. "Hey! I'll have you know you might get a promotion because of me, so stop complaining!"

"A promotion, like what?"

"Like body double," Cody replied proudly. "...for the Pink Princess," he mumbled a bit more embarrassed as he looked away.

Penny seemed shocked, and was quiet for a moment as she processed it. "R-really?"

"Yeah! So just buzz off and let me keep doing what I'm doing, okay? I think I'm being you just fine," Cody said as he pushed back against Penny, sending her stumbling back. He continued walking towards the studio, doing his best to ignore Penny's presence behind him.

"Wait! No, I don't care if you get me promoted to Director, I need you to switch me back! Don't just leave!" It seemed Penny wasn't going to back down. Cody supposed he would have to do something about her to keep her quiet.

'Maybe I can do something to keep her happy for a while? That might quiet her down. Today was rough, maybe her body isn't worth it in the long run...' Cody considered as he pretended to ignore Penny. In truth, he was sorta just being contrarian for the sake of it. He had been considering giving Penny her body back since the filming finished, but it bothered him that she was trying to make him do it. He could just give her back her body, or maybe strike some sort of deal with her.

'Or I could just make it worse for her. Hah! Maybe I could promote her to director. Doubt she'd like that. Or maybe give her a job on security...' Cody thought with a mean grin as he patted the device in his vest pocket. He could switch Penny with anyone and threaten to leave her there if she didn't cooperate! He had barely tested the remote's other functions at all now that he thought of it. There were probably other ways he could use it to make her quiet down the more he thought of it.

Swap Penny with Manella in Oldbag's body

14311112111221211232.title: Cody finds a different way to shut her up.

choices: He goes back to Penny's apartment
Something else happens along the way
143111121112212112321.content:
It didn't take long for Cody to decide what to do next. With the combination of the annoyance of Penny in his body and the stressful directing of Oldbag it might be best to kill two birds with one stone and switch the two of them. That way he could keep Oldbag in his body away from the studio, and thus far away from him, and he could blackmail Penny with the threat of staying in Manella's body.

He slowly pulled the remote out from Penny's vest and pointed it at her, pressed the 'Aware Swap' button, and quickly put the remote back in the vest. It didn't seem that Penny noticed what he did.

He began to walk back to the set where the movie was being filmed. Penny was following behind him continuing to beg for her body back, he did his best to ignore her. Did he sound this annoying when he wanted something?

Soon they reached the studio and luckily for Cody, Oldbag in Manella's body was still there. She was yelling to the clean up crew about something, Cody was too annoyed by the multiple rants she had given during the filming to listen in on whatever she was yelling about.

He pointed the remote at her in Manella's body and once again clicked the 'Aware Swap' button. In a moment it was clear that the swap had worked. He looked at his own body which was looking around disoriented.

"Hey! No kids allowed on the studio, get out before I get security!" He looked down on Oldbag in his body. It felt great to be the one giving her orders and threatening to kick her out of the studio for a change. He put the remote back into Penny's vest

Oldbag just looked up at Cody, the realization of the situation kicking in. She just ran away from him, both in fear of security taking her away and in fear of whatever had swapped her body twice in the past two days would do something to her again.

Cody gave a confident smile as he saw Oldbag run away, but his grin turned into a grimace as he her Manella's body give out a scream. He turned around and saw Penny in Manella's body coming toward him "What did you do?!" She practically yelled.

"You didn't want to be me, so I swapped you again." Cody said, his smirk slowly returning.

"I want to be me again, give me my body back!" She demanded.

"Hmm, nope! I don't wanna" Cody smugly said. "I think I'll stay you for a little longer." He said and rubbed a finger under Penny's nose. "Oh yeah! I almost forgot, don't tell anyone about the swaps, not that anyone would believe you anyway, but if you do, there are plenty of worse bodies to put you in."

Penny was completely dumbstruck, she looked like she wanted to say some, but nothing came out. Soon she just gave up and walked away.

After she left, some other studio employees came up to Cody. "Don't worry about the director yelling about you doing something wrong, he's been doing that to everyone today." An employee said, not knowing what had actually just happened.

"Yeah, it was like he was like he was different person today." Cody giggled at his own joke "But I have a feeling he'll be better tomorrow." He said and walked way from the studio once again.

Once he was out of the studio again, he wondered what to do next. He supposed he could just go back to Penny's apartment like he did last night, but he was at 'his' job all day. He figured he had earned some fun. Although he didn't know where an adult could go to have fun, maybe he could spend some of 'his' money? At the same time though, he was tired, maybe he should go back to Penny's apartment and rest till tomorrow's shooting?
143111121112212112321.title: Swap Penny with Oldbag in Manella's body

choices: Cody manages to catch up with Sal
1431111211122121123213.content:
Cody figured he would wander the town for a bit until he found somewhere that seemed interesting to him. He opened up Penny's vest pocket to put away the remote as he walked across the street from the studio, but he stopped as he saw a distraught 'Oldbag' standing at the street corner. It looked like she was waiting for a bus, but the way she seemed to just stare off into space made it clear that a lot was on 'her' mind.

Cody of course, realized that this was a loose end he needed to tie up. Manella didn't know that Penny was now in his body, or that Oldbag was in Cody's body, but Cody wasn't sure how much Manella or Oldbag knew at all. At any rate, he did worry a bit at the prospect of the three of them teaming up against him.

His worry increased when Manella, seeming to grow impatient, walked away from the stop, returning to the studio. 'Oh no, is he looking for someone?' Cody's mind began to assume the worst; Manella was looking for Oldbag in his body, and he'd soon find Penny instead. He couldn't let Penny tell Sal that he was the reason for the swap.

Cody looked over the remote and its functions once again, examining the various buttons. 'There's the one! Please work.' he thought to himself as he quickly clicked down on 'possession'. With this he could follow anyone without being seen!

In an instant, Cody felt weightless. Right below him was Penny's body, just as he left it. For a second it seemed a bit stunned, but it quickly regained composure as it closed the vest pocket Cody left open and began walking away. "Man I smell... need to go shower," Cody heard Penny's voice mutter.

'It just acts like normal!' Cody realized. 'Doesn't even know I was there!' He would smile if he could, but he didn't exactly have a face. This was good news for him though - it meant he was free to leave Penny's body and it would just take care of things in his absence. Cody's mind was brimming with all sorts of ideas for 'excursions' he could take, until he remembered the task at hand. He looked back to the entrance, and realized he had lost track of his target.

'Dang it!' he shouted wordlessly as he floated across the road, trying to make up for lost distance. 'Can't let an old lady beat me!'
1431111211122121123213.title: Something else happens along the way

14311112111221211232132.content:
As Cody floated down the street in his ghost form, he realized he overestimated how fast he would be able to float. It took him a few minutes to get to the entrance to the studio. He probably should have waited till he got closer to Manella before he left Penny's body.

Once in the studio Cody looked around and to his disappointment he didn't see Manella anywhere around him. Suddenly and idea came into Cody's head, he floated upward and got an aerial view of the studio. While the fact that he was flying was amazing, he tried his best to stay focused and find Manella in Oldbag's body. To his shock, he could see Oldbag's body was already halfway to the area that the filming from earlier today took place. Cody knew he took a while floating to and above the studio, but he didn't think he took that long!

Cody quickly floated back down to ground level. He knew at this point that there was no way he could float over to where Manella was fast enough, he would need a body to catch up to him first. Thankfully for him, he saw three people nearby.

The first was the actor who played the Nickel Samurai, his name was 'Matt Onnguard' or something like that, Cody didn't fully remember it. While becoming a guy again, even if it was just for a short time, was tempting. Matt's body did have a disadvantage, fame. If he possessed him there was a chance that either fans or staff might stop him on his way across the studio.

The next person he saw was the Steel Samurai, or 'Will' as his name apparently was, but he would always be the Steel Samurai to Cody. While possessing him was extremely tempting, as he could become the Steel Samurai himself. His body would have the same problem as Matt's, maybe even more so since he was the star of the movie.

The third person he saw was that Adrian lady from earlier. While becoming a girl again wasn't something he particularly wanted to do, her body had less of a chance of being stopped then the other two. Although she seemed to be involved with the movie, she wasn't and actor like the other two were, so hopefully less people would want to see her

Realizing he was wasting time thinking about who to possess, Cody quickly made his decision and flew into one of their bodies. Who did he possess?

143111121112212112321321.content:
Cody wasn't very happy about it, but he saw the advantage to having a body that people wouldn't pay attention to. He did a lot of sneaking around, and generally it was best to act like you weren't out of place at all! His time as Penny reinforced that; people wouldn't pay attention to him, so he'd have free reign of the studio in Adrian's body.

Reluctantly, he dived into the bofy of the unsuspecting talent agent, who was typing out an email on her phone. To Adrian, everything momentarily went cold and faded to black as her consciousness took a backseat. For Cody, sensations began to return as his mind moved in and he regained a physical form. His first instinct was to wrap his arms around himself, as he all of a sudden felt cold and exposed with Adrian's bare arms and shoulders out to the wind. "Brrr... this body needs a t-shirt or something," Cody complained in Adrian's voice. He put the phone away in his left pocket, and realized the remote was now in his right. Glad that he still had it, he stowed it away in Adrian's right pocket. He realized it had been a while now since he heard his own voice come from his mouth, and it was starting to bother him less.

'Why would I want to go back right now anyways? Not like anyone lets my body do anything,' he thought as he took stock of his new form. Adrian's body was even more different than Penny's! She still had glasses, but her hair was much longer. Cody found himself running his hands through it, amazed at how soft it was. Penny just kept hers tied up, and Cody didn't bother trying to undo it. Her clothes were tighter as well, an highlighted just how differently Adrian was shaped than himself or Penny. In addition to her shirt leaving much of her upper body exposed, her pants were a lot tighter than what Cody was used to wearing. He felt around her legs and hips, noticing how long her legs were as well as how different her body was overall. It was a little overwhelming for someone like Cody!

Trying to get back on course, he took off Adrian's glasses and shook her head, sending hair flying about, as he reminded himself of the task at hand. He could explore what a girl's body was like anytime, right now he needed to reach Sal again. Using Adrian's legs, he began to run to the area he saw Oldbag's body approaching, the filming shoot. As Adrian's chest bounced and his breathing got heavier, he began to feel like he may have made the wrong choice.

Thankfully, Adrian's body was still faster than Oldbag's, who seemed to just be walking at a grouchy pace. Using his experience sneaking around, Cody caught up with Sal and trailed behind, managing to stay unseen. Observing from a distance, Cody watched as Sal...

Thinking it over, he did over react a bit, The only thing he saw was Sal in Oldbag's body walking toward the studio and he just jumped to the worst conclusion. "It's his fault, he forgot his stupid purse." Cody made an excuse for himself.

Rubbing the back of his head, he wondered what to do next. He briefly thought about going back to Penny's body, but decided against it. Cody recognized the voice as the Nickel Samurai. Weird, he didn't seem like such a jerk when he was acting on the studio with everyone. Cody didn't feel like getting scolded, he dealt with that enough when he was himself, so he hung up the phone.

Cody would have liked to switch into another body, but nothing was jumping to mind right away. The only person within view was Sal, and he was using Oldbag's body! Gross. Not to mention, the only people after that were the actors, and a day of just being a double had tired out Cody enough. "Guess I'll just keep this one for a bit. Might confuse Penny atleast," he decided, looking downward at his new, temporary body. He'd just have to try to adapt to the new sensations; as long as he had this device, it was a thing he'd need to get used to.

Searching through her limited pocket space, Cody realized that she didn't seem to have any car keys. "Aw, I was looking forward to driving..." he mourned. Cody couldn't believe the luck! The Steel Samurai costume itself was too small, but the next best thing worked.
