As he pulled the wig off the ground, he realized something about it was a bit familiar. Its was black, with the hair tied up top in a knot. "Hmm, where have I seen this?"

He decide to peruse the costume rack a bit more to jog his memory. He took off the mask, since it was hard enough to see with Adrian's glasses anyways. when he found what he was looking for; a set of robes that the woman who was following that lawyer guy around wore. He couldn't imagine what they were doing here. Maybe the director guy liked how it looked?

It was as he was looking over the robes that he heard the gate cling off in the distance. "Uh oh," he mumbled. Did a camera catch the noise of the stand knocking down? He realized he had to act quickly; it'd be hard to explain what he was doing in the Samurai outfit. He quickly disrobed, opting to throw the costume off into the corner rather than set it back up, and then considered what to do next.

Two thoughts came to him. He could try to pretend being Adrian. She seemed to be important, so she could probably go anywhere on set whenever right? He had barely been paying attention when she introduced herself though, so he couldn't really be sure. He had already forgotten her last name by this stage. The alternative option was to throw on another costume. If he put on the wig and took off the glasses just for a bit, Cody was willing to bet that Adrian would look reasonably different. If he had the bravery to try the robes, he could probably pass for an actress in the movie. He'd just lie and say he was running really late. No one would look too deeply right?

He knew he likely didn't have much time so he...
1431111211122121123213212122.title: Play around with costumes and other clothes

14311112111221211232132121222.content:
Thinking fast on his feet, Cody quickly grabbed the robes and wig. As the security guards knocked on the door he quickly put them on, he wasn't super positive that the wig was covering all of Adrian's hair or if he even put the robes on correctly, but it would have to do.

He opened the door to find a security guard. "The studios closed. All staff were supposed to go home."

Cody rolled his eyes "Well, I'm supposed to be here." he lied. "The scene I'm supposed to be in couldn't be filmed today. So, we're going to do it tonight."

The security guard didn't seem to be buying it "Is there anyone who can verify this?"

"Well, duh. Of course there is. Her name was Adrian, I can't remember her last name, but she seemed to be very important." Cody gave and excuse.

The security guard seemed to begin to buy it. "Alright, I'll beleive you for now, but rest assured I will be asking studio managment about his."

"Whatever." Cody said and closed the door on the guard. He put his ear to the door and made sure to listen for the guard walking away.

Once he was sure that the guard was gone, he took off the robes and the wig. "Ha! dumb guard! Maybe I should be an actor." Cody boasted as he rubbed Adrian's nose. He did briefly think about how he could have accidently gotten Adrian in trouble with his excuse, but he brushed off the thought, it wasn't like he was the one who would be in trouble.

While Cody wanted to play around in the Nickel Samurai costume again. He knew that would be risky. If he made another loud noise there was a chance that either that guard would come back or another guard would come. Looking at a clock, Cody saw just how late it was getting. Cody decided to just lay on a couch that was in the room with him and get some rest.
14311112111221211232132121222.title: Tried to disguise himself

143111121112212112321321212221.content:
After a good night of sleep, Cody woke up to various sounds of people working. He looked around, confused as to where he was at first, but then he remembered that he had slept at the studio overnight. He wasn't so surprised that he had woken up in a woman's body this time, after all, this was the second day in a row that the wasn't himself.

He got off the couch and stretched his limbs. He looked out a window and saw that it was still pretty early in the morning. This was definitely one disadvantage of taking an adult's body, not being able to sleep in on a summer day.

He looked in a mirror and saw Adrian's reflection looking back. It defiantly looked like he had just crawled out of bed. Her hair was a complete mess and her clothes were all wrinkled up. He supposed he could get Adrian ready for the day, but he decided against it. He was only planning to be her until he could find a better body to take. Since people were already working, it shouldn't take him too long to find another body. Plus, there wasn't exactly much in the way of regular clothes in this room, and as much as Cody would love to walk around the studio in the Nickel Samurai costume, it would probably draw too much attention to him. He didn't want anyone to suspect he wasn't who he looked like.

Cody left the dressing room and began to walk around the studio. He got a few odd looks from people, he ignored most of them, but would stick his tongue out and insult the occasional person. During his walk around the studio, Cody searched for a body to take, while he didn't find one immediately, he stumbled upon something very important.

His face paled upon seeing them. His body, Oldbag's body, and Manella's body, all with misplaced occupants were talking to each other. He crouched down hid behind a nearby bush to eavesdrop on them. He couldn't make out the whole conversation, due to distance, but he was able to figure one thing out. Penny told them that he was the one that caused the whole body swapping incident to occur.

Cody was angry at first, he couldn't believe that Penny had snitched on him, but his angry soon turned into laughter when he realized that none of them knew what body he was currently in. As far as they knew, he was still in Penny's body. Right now, Penny's body was acting as if nothing was wrong.

As Cody saw the three of them go off, presumably to confront 'Cody', Cody wondered what to do It would certainly be entertaining to watch the three of them confront and harass Penny's body while watching from the sidelines in Adrian's body. in fact, while he was watching them he could potentially use the remote on them and find a way to get them off his trail.

However, following them had risk. If he were to be seen in Adrian's body, they might put things together and figure out that he was Adrian right now. He didn't want them to know that he could jump into other bodies without swapping two bodies around. This also had the risk of them telling Adrian what happened and her also wanting to stop Cody.

As the body swapped trio walked away, Cody decided to....
143111121112212112321321212221.title: The next morning

choices: Cody decides to share the device
Cody decides to just ask Maya if she wanted to hang out.
14311112111222.content:
As Cody lied down, considering how to kill time, he heard a grumbling coming from his stomach. "Guess I'm hungry," he muttered. He had no idea when Penny last ate, but after running all about he had drained a decent bit of energy from her body. He got up from the couch, hand over his stomach, and began to look over the small kitchen Penny had attached to her living room. Unfortunately, there was nothing that he knew how to cook.

"Well," he reached a hand over his pocket, "she has money I guess. I'll go out for food!"

With that, Cody grabbed Penny's keys and stepped out the apartment door to go find someplace he could eat for the night.

---

About 10 minutes later, after some wandering, Cody came across 'Eldoon's Noodle Stand'. He decided it was good enough and pushed back the curtain to take a seat.

A man with a bowl on is head and what seemed to be stringy hair came out to greet. "Well hey there, young lady. What can I get for you?" he asked genially.

Cody replied with a scowl. "Don't call me young lady!" he shouted back, seemingly unaware of the irony that statement carried with Penny's body and voice.

The owner of the stand seemed surprised at the hostility, "alright alright, jeeze. What can I get you?"

Pleased with himself, Cody proceeded to order two bowls of ramen for himself with Penny's money. He began digging in, glad to finally get something to eat after being preoccupied with the Samurai and the Remote all day.

"Penny?" A voice called from a few seats away. Cody ignored it and continued eating.

"Penny! Is that you?" the voice asked again.

'Oh, yeah!' Cody suddenly realized, 'that's me!' He turned his head to the right to meet a somewhat familiar face; it was a woman about Penny's age with black hair tied in a not, and loose blue robes that went around her knees. It was the nice lady who had been with the mean lawyer way back during the trial. He remembered that she was also a fan of the Steel Samurai, which put her in his good graces. Thankfully, her lawyer friend seemed absent.

"Oh, uh, hi!" he replied, not recalling her name.

"It's been a while, Penny! I never got to thank you for those Pink Princess cards you know," Maya continued. "How have things been going for you. Still working at the studio?"

"Yeah!" he replied excitedly between slurps of food, an excited look spreading over Penny's face, "they're shooting a Steel Samurai movie now y'know? Its really exciting, tomorrow they're going to film the fight with the Magistrate and I'm going to watch!" He bragged with a level of enthusiasm that seemed uncharacteristic of Penny, but he didn't seem to care at all for acting like her.

"What!? Really?" Thankfully for Cody, Maya barely noticed. "You're so lucky! I've been off training, so I don't get much time to do anything fun."

Cody ran a finger under Penny's nose, "yeah, it's pretty great." Cody smugly crossed his arms before continuing, "I bet I could get you into the studio!"

Maya gave a laugh, "that'd be great, but I gotta head back home tomorrow. I haven't had a lot of time to myself recently."

Cody looked over to Maya and began thinking. He had fun today, but it was a bit boring at Penny's apartment. He didn't really know any of her friends, but Maya seemed nice to him. Maybe he could show her the device? She seemed like she could stand to have some fun too after all. However, that ran the risk of her telling someone else about, like that annoying lawyer guy. Even worse, she might ruin his fun if she found out that he wasn't the real Penny. She was cool for a grown-up, but even Cody realized that she might not be okay with him stealing someone's body. She hadn't noticed anything suspicious yet though, so maybe he could keep his true identity a secret for a while? He wanted to do something to kill his boredom at any rate, so maybe he could just ask Maya to do something normal with him.
14311112111222.title: Go somewhere else

choices: Switch back into Penny's body now
Don't go back to Penny's body yet
143111121112221.content:
Cody thought about it for a minute and in the end decided to tell Maya about the remote. While he was having fun with it on his own, he did get a little bored being on his own after awhile. Maybe bringing someone else in on the fun would help keep him from getting bored.

"I bet I can get you could be at home AND go to the studio tomorrow." Cody said, getting ready to show her the remote

Maya laughed "I wish, you know how far Kurain village is, there's no way I'd be able to come back to the city after my daily training. Wish I could though."

Cody didn't understand half of what Maya said, he barely knew her, he didn't even know her name, so having a conversation about her was hard for him. He did understand one thing though, 'I wish I could. Cody pulled the remote out of Penny's vest pocket. "I bet you could be in two places at once."

Maya laughed again. "Nice one Penny. That would be nice though, too bad it's impossible."

Cody rubbed his borrowed nose again. "No it isn't."

A puzzled look formed on Maya's face "What do you mean?"

"Watch this!" Cody said as he pointed the remote at her and did an aware swap. In an instant he was now sitting where Maya had been. Her body felt completely different from Penny's. Her hair was a lot longer then Penny's and the knot it was tied in felt weird. Her clothes felt completely strange. They felt so loose and he couldn't wrap his mind around not wearing pants.

Maya in Penny's body was freaking out, feeling around everything that felt different. She dropped the remote while she was freaking out. Penny's glasses fell off her face as she kept moving around in her seat so fast. "What? How? What happened?!"

Cody picked up the remote and showed it to Maya. He explained how the remote came from nowhere and what it did. He didn't tell her that he wasn't Penny though.

Maya was outright amazed at the device "Wow! That's amazing!" Was all she could say, thinking of all the things the device could do.

"With this you can come to the studio with me tomorrow, then we can both see the Samurai fight the Magistrate! We just have to either have you possess someone or swap your body with someone" Cody said happily. He pointed the remote at Maya in Penny's body. He wanted to get back into Penny's body so he could get to the studio tomorrow.
143111121112221.title: Cody decides to share the device

1431111211122211.content:
Cody flicked the aware swap button, and found himself back as Penny. Her body was just too convenient to pass up, not to mention he was more used to it by this point. Maya and Penny were both girls, but Maya's outfit just highlighted the... differences between his body and hers too much for him to feel comfortable. Penny's outfit was pretty unisex, which made it sorta easy to forget he was a girl, and he was starting to grow accustomed to the glasses.

Back in his stolen body, he turned his attention to an excited Maya. "So!" he said, pointing to the remote, "now you can stay as long as you want, and I know a way to make it so that you don't miss your training either." He proceeded to explain to Maya the possession function, and how it would cause her body to act as normal without her. "You can stay here and your body will do the training for you!"

Maya seemed hesitant, "but what about the person I possess?"

Cody shrugged, "it'll just be a day or two, right? Besides, you deserve a day off, don't you?"

"I guess," Maya said, thinking about it before snapping her fingers, "yeah! You're right. I'm always renting my body out to ghosts, someone else can put up with me."

Cody had no idea what she was talking about, but he smiled and nodded anyways, glad to have her on his side. "Yeah! You should use it now. You can stay at my place in your new body and we'll go together tomorrow."

Excited by 'Penny's' urgings, Maya clicked the possession button. Suddenly, the remote vanished, and Maya's body switched to a more neutral expression. "Anyways, Penny, it's been nice catching up, but I got to head out now. Gotta pack my bags and all that. See'ya!" She got up, straightening out her dress, and walked out of the noodle stand. Cody was a little worried for a second, being alone without the device, when suddenly the curtain to the stand opened up again.

"Wow! This is soooo cool Penny, you were right!" a voice said as a new person came in and sat down where Maya was. Cody could only assume Maya was at the helm of this person's body. It was...
1431111211122211.title: Switch back into Penny's body now

14311112111222112.content:
Maya was using the body of some woman that Cody had never met before. She was wearing a red outfit with a white, fur collar. The goggles she had on made it seem like she might’ve been a biker of some sort.

“Maya?” Cody asked, uncertain.

“Yep! In the flesh! Or, someone else’s,” she said with a grin and a shrug of the shoulders. “Desiree was an acquaintance of ours from a case Nick and I investigated. I listened in on her phone call before swooping in, it sounded like her husband was going to be out of town for a few days. Means she’s free as far as I know!” Maya said with a smile as she crossed her arms under Desiree’s chest. “She’s definitely a pretty one, right?”

Cody wasn’t really sure how to reply. His face briefly went red, suddenly intimidated by the much older woman in front of him. For some reason, Penny and Maya didn’t make him nearly as nervous.

Maya tilted her head, looking concerned. “You okay there Penny? Looking a bit feverish.”

“Uh, yeah! Its fine! You look great!” He replied, pulling up his hands in a bid to regain composure.

---

Thankfully for Cody, Maya brushed the gaff aside, too enthralled with her new body. She was running her hands through her hair, examining her outfit, and taking stock of her new proportions. She seemed overall thrilled at the prospect of having more time off, thrilled enough to not notice how ‘Penny’ was behaving.
“So this is your apartment?” Maya asked as they entered into Penny’s abode.

“Yeah! All mine,” Cody announced proudly as he swept a hand over the living room, even though it was admittedly stolen. “You can make yourself at him however you like. Uh, I’ll use the couch, you can sleep in my bed,” Cody said as an aside, feeling a strange pressure to be polite.

“Thanks Penny, that’s awful nice of you,” Maya responded with a smile, prompting Cody to go red again. He turned around this time to focus his attention on the couch, putting it together to make it sleep-able, suddenly a bit unsure of his decision to include Maya. Why was he suddenly feeling so nervous around her?
14311112111222112.title: Desirée DeLite

1431111211122212.content:
"So do you want to switch me back now so I can get a new body?" Maya asked who she thought was Penny as she fiddled with her new glasses.

Cody thought about it, and he figured he would have to switch back into Penny's body sooner or later since he was sorta 'borrowing' it. However, so long as it's occupant was someone he could trust, it wouldn't be a big deal if he decided to have fun and take a new one.

"No that's fine," Cody replied as he absently swung Maya's legs back and forth from under her skirt. "You can use mine for now, and I'll go get a new one!" He suggested, "that way, we'll both be able to be new people. Sound like fun?"

"Sure!" Maya replied. "I bet I could make a good you. Besides, it's your remote, right? You should be able to use it too."

Excited to finally get a new body, Cody gave a nod to Maya. "Just wait here! I'll be back shortly," he said as he clicked the possession button and floated out above Maya's body.

Cody hadn't really been thinking about how Maya's body would act without him in though. He wasn't the original occupant of her body OR the body he switched from in fact. Hoe did Maya's body act when he left it?
1431111211122212.title: Don't go back to Penny's body yet

14311112111222121.content:
Maya's body seemed to blink in confusion for a moment, as though it had blacked out. "Oh! Sorry about that Penny, I think I might have dozed off there for a second," her body said to 'Penny'. "I ought to get going, think I need to sleep."

Maya-in-Penny's body just gave a nod, fascinated at seeing her body act independently of her. "Uh, yeah, see you around Maya!" she said with a wave. it was definitely uncomfortable leaving her body to just act on its own without her, but the idea of getting to leave her responsibilities behind for a night held a definite appeal. Maya got up from her chair and walked out the curtain of Eldoon's noodles, waiting for the person she thought was Penny to return.

Cody, for his part, was thrilled to get the chance to use a new function. Possession was exciting, it was like he could fly! He floated upwards above the city and looked down at the blocks near the noodle shop as he searched for a new body to take. He had only chosen Penny because of her access to the studio and the fact that he had an opening. Now he was just limited by how many people were within a block or so! Although he supposed he had to pick someone Penny would be likely to pick, he figured he could maybe pick someone whose body had more authority than hers. For whatever reason, people kept trying to boss him around when he was her! He wanted someone people wouldn't mess with. This time, he decided to look for someone taller, or maybe a bit older.

After a quick survey of everyone who was within a block or so, Cody figured he would have to make a decision, lest he keep Maya waiting for too long. There were two people who stuck out to him. One was an older lady who had been walking with a bunch of older kids, they called her 'Professor Courte' and they wished her a good evening as they walked off. Cody thought she was dressed oddly for a teacher, wearing a green track suit, but he knew that people took Professors seriously! Not to mention she was taller than Penny by nearly a foot!

The other person appealed to Cody a bit more because he was a guy, but Cody realized that Maya might think it weird if 'Penny' took a man's body. He recognized him as one of the lawyers at the Steel Samurai trial. He was the one wearing a red suit with grey hair, although Cody couldn't really remember his name. He was the persecutor? Cody couldn't remember the right word for it. Cody thought he was a bit too stuck-up looking, remembered that everyone listened to him though, and would call him a genius. Cody was willing to bet that with his body, anyone would listen to what he had to say!

Which person does he choose?
14311112111222121.title: It acts like Maya

143111121112221212.content:
The decision was very easy for Cody. He hadn't been a guy since this morning and he really wanted to be one again. If Maya asked why 'Penny' possessed a guy, he could probably come up with an excuse. He flew toward the guy from the trial and possessed him. He stumbled a bit due to the man walking before Cody possessed him, but he quickly got his footing. After taking a few seconds to get used to the new body, Cody headed back to the noodle stand where Maya was waiting.

Cody made his way back to the stand and sat next to Maya in Penny's body. Maya was clearly shocked to see 'Edgeworth' at this noodle stand, she suspected it was 'Penny', but didn't say anything just in case it wasn't. Cody turned to Maya with a big smile on his face. "The possession button worked!" He told her

Maya nearly burst out laughing hearing 'Edgeworth' talk in such an upbeat and happy tone. "That's awesome Penny!" She said.

Now that Cody and Maya were both in different bodies one question remained, "what to do you want to do now? We'll have to wait till tomorrow to go and see the Steel Samurai filming."

Maya actually did burst out laughing now. "Sorry, it's just that the thought of Edgeworth being a Steel Samurai fan is way too funny." She said. "I guess we could wait at 'My' place until tomorrow. OR we could go somewhere else, with this remote we could have a lot of fun!" She suggested.

Cody thought about it. Going back to Penny's place seemed like a good idea, he was mentally exhausted from this complicated day and could use some rest. On the other hand, going around town with someone else as other people could be fun.

After thinking it over, he decided to...
143111121112221212.title: Cody possesses Edgeworth

14312.content:
Cody couldn't make out the person in clear detail, but they clearly looked like an adult. She had a large head of hair, an orange jacket, and a camera slung around her neck. She looked like a pretty silly person overall if Cody was being honest, but Cody figured that she probably had some sway in the studio, so he decided he'd take her body to have a look around.

How does he do it?
14312.title: Lotta Hart

143121.content:
As the strange women turned her back to him, Cody pressed the aware swap button from underneath the box and braced himself. In an instant, he could tell it worked as he felt a sudden, immense weight on his head. He pulled a hand upwards and ran a hand through Lotta's strange afro, and tugged a bit at her headband. The weight of the camera held his shoulders down as well.

Not to mention: he was tall now! Cody could feel his heart pound with excitement at the prospect. Now that he was an adult, he could go where-ever he wanted!

"WHAT IN TARNATION!?!" A loud voice tore through Cody's revelry. He leaped in surprise, and it took him a moment to realize it was his own voice, coming from underneath the box. Cody was about to rush over in order to reclaim the remote, when he was interrupted by two security guards rushing into the room.

"You! You're not supposed to be here!" exclaimed the scratchy and annoyed voice of a woman that Cody was very familiar with: Wendy Oldbag. "I've already kicked you out twice today!" Cody could have sworn she was talking to him for a second, but he knew that couldn't be true.

"Uh, the trespasser's over there!" Cody exclaimed, trying to hide his shock at his own voice, as he pointed over to Lotta, who was struggling to get out of Cody's own hiding space from across the room.

The other guard - a much younger woman with black hair adorned by several barrettes - gave a sigh. "I'll go get the kid Wendy. Can you manage the reporter?"

The older woman nearly spat as she grabbed Cody by his new wrist, "bah! Kids these days foisting all the hard work on their elders.. Yeah I'll get rid of her. Come on you paparazzo! You know the drill!"

Cody shouted, fussed, and fought the whole way, but Wendy somehow had the stronger will. With a violent shove, Cody landed on his backside outside the gate to global studios, still in this strange woman's body. He couldn't believe it! How could they kick him out even after he was a grown up? Was this lady not involved in the movie? Not long after, Maggey brought his old body as well, who seemed too frazzled and confused to fight back. As she let Lotta in Cody's body go, Cody quickly ran over to her.

"You! Do you still have the remote?!"

Lotta was like a deer in headlights, staring at her own body. "T-the what?"

"A small remote! I need it to fix this!"

She shook her head, still baffled. "I, er, the guard took something like that I think?!"

"Which one!?"

She thought about it for a second and replied
143121.title: Aware/Unaware Swap

choices: Have Lotta sneak in, in his body
1431211.content:
"The old one, she said something about 'Whippersnappers' and how 'back in her day' and stuff like that before she searched me-you-whatever and took the remote because she thought it was stolen from the studio!" The lady in Cody's body yelled at him before yelling questions about how this happened, Cody ignored her questions and began to think to himself.

Cody was practically clawing at his afro in frustration, he needed that remote if he was going to get back to his own body, and more importantly, sneak into the studio! He would have to sneak back into the studio right now, but could he do it in this Lady's body? She was much bigger than him and he doubted he could fit into any of the vents he had used to sneak in before.

That's when he had an idea, he could have the lady who was in his body now sneak in and steal the remote from Oldbag, because she was in his body, she could easily go through any of the ways that he went through and get that remote back! Although, Cody wasn't sure if he should rely on this lady, not only had she been caught too, but according to Oldbag, she had been caught once more than he was. Plus, she was an adult and Cody didn't want to rely on an adult to get something back for him.

Cody realized that he didn't have much time to think about this, he needed to get the remote back, and he needed to get it back fast. Not only did he not want to be stuck in this body, but there was one more important thing to consider. The remote is currently in Oldbag's hands! If she were to use the remote, or find out what it is, there was no way she would give it back!

The last thing Cody wanted was for someone else to find out about the remote, he had already screwed up and got into a situation where he had to tell this lady about the remote, but Oldbag knowing about it would be a thousand times worse! He needed to find a way back into the studio, and fast.

Before he chose what to do, he looked through this lady's pockets, ignoring the yelling of her from right next to him about invading her privacy. He was looking through her pocket's to see if she had anything useful for sneaking in, unfortunately, he couldn't find anything useful, but thanks to this lady's license he found out her name, Lotta Hart

What did Cody decide to do?
1431211.title: The Old One

14313.content:
Cody recognised the person who entered as that mean old security lady who was always chasing him around and throwing him out. Needless to say, he hated her. He grimaced at the thought of using the remote on her. However, he soon came to the realisation that this was the perfect opportunity to turn the tables. He still didn't particularly like the idea of using it on her, but getting revenge for all the times she'd thrown him out would make it worth it. Not to mention, she worked here. If he used the remote on her, he could walk around the studios all he liked without being thrown out.

Now there was just a question of which button to use. If he used an Aware Swap, he'd be in her body, getting to walk around Global Studios as he pleased, while she'd be stuck in his body, getting thrown out the front gate. Although, that did mean he'd be leaving the security lady to do whatever in his body, and there was always the chance she'd screw this up for him. Using the Possession button would get he out of the way completely, and he'd be able to roam the studios while his body snuck around getting some pictures or something. The Shapeshift button would turn him into the security lady, but she'd still be herself, so she wouldn't suspect anything wrong unless she saw him. He might even be able to ruin her reputation by doing things as her. The Unaware Swap seemed the most useless in this situation, since everyone would still see him as a kid even though he had the body of an old lady, but at the very least, if they had each others bodies, she probably wouldn't be strong enough to drag him away like she usually did.

"Hm? Could have sworn I heard someone in here," Cody heard the security lady mutter. "Must be my mind playing tricks on me. Better not be one of them whippersnappers." She stepped out of the dressing room, and was about to close the door, when Cody made up his mind, pressing one of the buttons just before the door was closed on him.
14313.title: Wendy Oldbag

143131.content: Which button did he use?
143131.title: Aware Swap/Unaware Swap

choices: Cody finds someone else to swap with
Cody stays in Oldbag's body for now
1431311.content:
As Cody pressed the button, he all of a sudden found himself just outside the dressing room. He was standing up, and by the looks of things, much taller. It felt weird being in a girl's body, and he could feel a bit of a pain in his hip, but the important thing was that the remote had worked. He was in the old security lady's body.

"What in the-!" Cody heard a voice call out from inside the dressing room. It took him a moment to realise it was his own voice, although not under his own command. He looked back into the room to see his own body bursting out of the box he'd been hiding in. "What's going on here!?"

With a devilish grin on his face, Cody walked up to his old body, and snatched the remote right out of its hand while its current occupant was busy freaking out over what was going on. "I'll be taking that," he said, already getting irritated by the old lady's voice coming out when he spoke.

"Wha-! You're-!" the security lady said from Cody's body, not sure how to react to seeing her own body.

Taking advantage of her confusion, Cody grabbed onto his backpack, saying, "You're not allowed to be in here anymore," and started dragging the security lady out of the dressing room. That was when she finally found her tongue. She started rambling, way too fast for Cody to keep track of what she was saying, although he was pretty sure he heard "whippersnappers" and "techno doohickeys" come up a few times. She kept struggling and trying to fight back as he continued to drag her along, but in Cody's young body, she didn't have the strength to resist him.

When they finally reached the front gate, Cody literally threw the security lady out of the studio, not even considering that he'd have to deal with any injuries his body sustained when he swapped back. For the time being, "his body" was the security lady, and this was revenge. "And stay out!" he shouted, before heading back into the studio. Now that he'd dealt with the security lady, he wondered what he should do next. He could explore the studio freely now, so he could probably find out where they were filming. He might even be able to get the Steel Samurai's autograph. However, after dealing with the security lady and walking around for a bit, Cody was starting to see the problems with becoming someone so old. The pain in his hip had gotten worse from trying to drag the security lady around with her constantly fighting back. He could sit down and have a rest for a bit, but he didn't sneak in and use some magical body swapping remote just so he could sit around and do nothing. Maybe he could use the remote again. Preferably on someone younger. That way, he could get rid of the pain in his hip, but since he was already in the studio, whoever he swapped with would still be someone who was allowed to be here. Of course, that ran the risk of whoever he swapped with freaking out and causing a scene, which might result in his body swapping antics to be discovered.

Robin was busy working on a sculpture in the fine arts club room of Themis Academy. Despite studying to become a prosecutor, she really wanted to become an artist. In here, she felt like she could really be herself for once. Well, that wasn't exactly true. Despite being female, she had been raised as a boy by her parents, and forced to hide her true gender. She still felt a strong resentment whenever she looked at her chest brace. She often wished she could just get this all out in the open, but she knew her parents would disapprove.

Just as she was almost finished with her sculpture, she suddenly heard a knock on the door. Robin couldn't help but wonder who it was. After no one seemed to enter, she figured she should probably go see who it was. Opening the door to the club room, Robin was surprised to discover there was no one there. "What?" Robin said aloud, confused by what had just happened. "Who ding-dong-ditches in a school?"

She was about to simply close the door and go back to put the finishing touches on her sculpture, but before she did so, she noticed a box lying on the floor in front of the doorway. Even strange was the fact that it seemed to have her name written on it. She looked around the hallway outside the room, but there didn't seem to be anyone around who could have left the package. How did they know she was in here, anyway? Regardless, Robin took the box and placed it on the table she was working at, before opening it up.

"Ha! As if!" Robin couldn't help but scoff at the contents of the box. Inside was an odd-looking TV remote, and an instruction manual that claimed it could swap people's bodies around. It was like something out of a crazy sci-fi movie, and almost certainly some sort of prank. "Kinda far to go for a prank, though," she mused, looking over the remote. It seemed to be crafted fairly well, although whatever it really did, she seriously doubted it could actually do what the manual claimed.

However, Robin had to admit that she was kind of curious. What if it did work? What if she could use the remote to swap bodies and such? As it ridiculous as it sounded, it might be worth trying, at least. Now that she had decided to try the remote out, she needed to figure out who to try it out on. Her first thought was to try it on her friends, Hugh and Juniper. If there was anyone she trusted enough to use a strange remote with, it was probably them. Plus, they probably wouldn't laugh at her too hard if it did indeed turn out to be a hoax. Not only that, they were from her shoes, it seems that whoever was in her body was a slob and rested their feet on her desk. More importantly though, there were quite a few files missing from her cabinet. The missing files weren't completely random either, there was one common thing linking all the missing files, Redd White.

"Okay, whoever was in my body wanted to get rid of my files on White, but why?" Mia thought aloud. Whoever was in her body wanted these files gone, but what ghost would want to take her body and protect White? White didn't exactly have many friends, anyone who worked with him was most likely doing it out of blackmail and you can't blackmail a ghost. That's when Mia turned her thinking around. What if no one was helping White? What if he did this on his own? That seemed to be the only plausable explanation. She gave that possibility some thought, but no matter what angle she looked at it, that was impossible. She was positive that Redd White was alive. There was no way a ghost of him could forcefully take her body.

Mia sat at her desk and gave it some thought. How could he have done this? Then she noticed that on her desk was a remote. She had a small T.V. in her office, but this remote was clearly not for that. The remote had five visible button. They were labled 'Aware', 'Unaware', 'Possession', 'Shapeshift', and a small 'undo' button right below the Shapeshift button. She had no idea what the 'Aware' and 'Unaware' buttons did, but she had a hunch on what the 'Possession' and 'Shapeshift' buttons did. If White had this remote, then it was entirely possible that White was the one who took her body.

That is of course, if this remote actually worked. She had no way of knowing that this remote could actually do what it was labeled as. It was entirely possible that this remote was just planted here by the person in her body to confuse her. It may be best to test it out. She looked at a clock in her office and saw the time, Phoenix would be coming in for work in about twenty minutes. Maybe she could try it out on him? Phoenix was her employee, she doubted that he would mind being her test subject....much

Although, Mia wasn't sure if she should let herself get side-tracked by the remote. Her body was still on the loose doing god knows what. She needed to at the very least find out where her body was and put a stop to it. She looked through what was supposed to be her schedule, she had planned to defend someone in court today, but there was no way that was happening now.....unless. While she doubted that whoever was in her body was going to be taking her law career seriously. If it was White in her body then it was entirely possible that he could attempt to ruin her career, thus securing his own. Even if he didn't know that she had a trial today her phone, which was currently in his possession, had reminders and alarms set in case she was running late, it was entirely possible that he could find out about it. Of course, if he wasn't there then and she showed up at the trial, she would be stuck in the courtroom defending while White was off doing something in her body.

When Phoenix entered the room, he looked at Mia with a confused expression. It didn't take much thought to tell why. "Chief, you look different today." Phoenix said, commenting on it, but trying not to come off as rude.

Mia said and once again pointed the remote at him. This time she clicked the Undo button that was below the Shapeshift button. As fast as all of the changes had happened, Phoenix's body had returned to normal.

Still taken aback by everything that had just happened. Phoenix asked the obvious questions. "Chief, how? why? what? where? when?" He stuttered out.

"Calm down, Phoenix. Sit down on the couch, this is going to be a long story." Mia directed Phoenix toward the office couch. She then proceeded to explain the remote to him. Well, she explained what she knew at least. She only knew for a fact what the Shapeshift button did and a vague idea of what the Possession button did. She still had no idea what the 'Aware' and 'Unaware' buttons did.

"Alright, so you got this remote and it can change people's bodies, but there's still one thing I don't get. When you turned me into you, you said 'I can't have three of me running around. There's you, the original and me, the second one, but who's the third?" Phoenix asked

"So, how are we going to get the person out of your body?" Phoenix asked, anxious to help out.

Mia was unsure how to answer. "I honestly have no idea. The only thing that I do know is that as long as I have this remote, he has no control over whether or not he can leave my body."

"So, he's stuck as you until we do something?" Phoenix inquired.

"Right, he won't be able to take anyone else's body." Mia answered.

"So, what if we make him want to go back to his own body?" Phoenix thought aloud. "You said this guy ran his own company, right? Mia gave it some thought, it could work. Redd White may have taken her body, but he still had his company to worry about. Maybe she could ruin Blue Corp. from the inside while she was at it. Does Mia go along with Phoenix's idea?

Did the car come down in time?
15221222.title: Marin Grossberg

152212221.content:
Redd began to panic as the elevator was taking a long time to come down. The guard could come back any second! He let out a sigh of relief once it did come down. He ran into the elevator and hit the button to bring him to the top floor, where his office was.

Once he had gotten to his office, he began to turn the place upside down searching for the thing. His entire plan relied on May leaving it here for safe keeping. If she had brought it with her, that may cause some complications. Especially if she used it on Grossberg.

Thankfully, his fears were unfounded. He found the remote behind one of the trophies on his shelf. It was actually a impressive hiding spot, no employee would dare snoop around his trophies and anyone who broke in, Redd included, would look it over since there isn't much space between the trophy on the shelf and the wall.

Redd grabbed the remote and began to make his way out of Blue Corp. To his surprise, the guard from earlier wasn't at his station. Did he abandon his post? 'Another reason to fire him later' Redd thought as he made his way to Grossberg's car.

He began to drive back to where he had dropped Grossberg off earlier. Now that he had the remote he could return to his body and think of a suitable punishment for Ms. May. He was feeling a bit paranoid now though, his whole breaking in and stealing the remote plan had gone smoothly, almost too smoothly. There were barely any guards on duty and he did find the remote rather easily. Did April purposely have the security be low.

As Redd got closer to his destination, he began to notice that a car seemed to be following him. He got even more paranoid. Was the car following him? Even if it was, there wasn't much he could actually do about it. He'd just have to be ready when he got to the lake.

Once he had arrived, Redd got out of Grossberg's car and began to walk toward the lake. He kept the car from earlier in the corner of his vision as he walked. He kept the remote clenched in his hand. If Ms. May did somehow outsmart him, he still had the remote. He could use it to fix the situation if things went wrong

Were Grossberg and April in Redd's body at the lake?
152212221.title: Yes

1522122211.content:
'There they are.' Redd could see them in the distance, three silhouettes. One of them was extra-large - definitely Grossberg. He clutched the device with April's dainty hand as he approached slowly from the distance. It was getting dark now, and the rustling of leaves as well as the noise of running water were making Redd's heart pound in anxiety all the more.

"...so, w-what are you going to do then?" Redd heard a distressed Grossberg say from a distance. Was Grossberg being spineless as usual or had April said something that had shaken him?

"Someone put you up to this, didn't they?" Redd heard his own voice now. "You clearly didn't organize this on your own. Tell me who else knows!"

Redd lifted the remote back up, looking over the functions again. He had to be careful about how he did this. 'The normal swap is obviously dangerous... maybethe shap-'

CRACK

His thoughts were cut off by the sound of a branch snapping under his feet. His face scrunched in am ix of anger and panic as April in his own body turned her head to look at him. When she Redd in her body holding up the device she was...
1522122211.title: Yes, they were there.

15221222111.content:
April's eye's widened at the sight of Redd in her body. "Wait, what are you doing here?" She asked. She squinted for a second, trying to make out more details, as her eyes settled on the remote. "What?! How did you get it back?!"

"Because I'm a genius, dearie," Redd replied with a smirk as he flicked a hand through his hair. "Honestly, after working for me for so long I'm offended you didn't realize that. You'll really have to be punished for that, in addition to your other trespesos. Anything you'd like to say for yourself?"

The guard that April brought with her seemed confused, as did Grossberg. "Look lady, I don't know what you think you're doing, but you have no position to be threatening my boss!" he said loudly, as he began to walk forward confidently at Redd-in-April.

"Hmm, a shame. I kind of liked you, but you're about to see to much anyways," Redd said coldly. He looked to the ground a few feet away, sighting a squirrel running by, and registered it for shapeshift. A second later, the guard was nowhere to be seen, with only a rodent having taken his place. "If you can make your way back to the office, I'll consider fixing you," Redd said offhandedly to the former guard, which scurried away in panic.

"EEK! Please Mr. White, uh, I'm sorry! It was, er, a moment of weakness!" April pleaded, terrified now.

"Yes I'm sure it was, and you won't have much chance to repeat it," Redd mused. He also shouted to Marvin while he was at it, "I appreciate your help Grodyberg, but this was technically a betrayal of my trust so you'll need to be punished as well." He had two options before him as he saw it. He couldn't use body-swap to fix this; it got him into this mess. He'd get his body back, but April would have the remote. He could IMITATE a body swap though through shapeshifting; he'd still technically have April's body but it'd functionally be the same as his own. He could then turn April back to normal and think up a punishment for her. The other method was possession; with it, he could just leave April's body and take back his own with April still in it. April would basically be put to sleep until he left his body again, which would be a sort of punishment, but he did prefer that she be aware of the concequences of her actions.

What did he use?
15221222111.title: Surprised

choices: Redd with the device once more
152212221111.content:
*Click* With a press of the button, Redd registered his own body into one of the forms stored on the shapeshift feature. With another press, he registered April's.

"What are you going to-" before she finished, April instantly was change from Redd White back into her old self, "-do... oh." The sound of her old voice made it clear that the game was over and she was back to normal. She seemed a little bit disappointed to be back in her own body after being wealthy and powerful for the day. Atleast he didn't turn her into a frog or something? Marvin seemed to be completely in shock, stunned by the whole affair.

Redd, meanwhile, finished the job by using shapeshift on himself, returning to his old form. "Ahhhh, glad to be back in my perfect, glorious body," he said as he straightened his tie, giving a forced smile back to April and Marvin. "Glad you didn't damage it any dear. Things would be getting much worse for you if you did."

"U-uh, you aren't going to do anything else Mr. White, a-are you?"

"Oh I'm afraid I must Ms. May," Redd replied, his voice still maliciously upbeat. "If I don't punish you, how do I know you won't do it again? Not to mention, Grossbug clearly isn't as loyal as he should be. I think I'll be needing something to leverage him more as well."

"W-what on earth is going on here?!" Grossberg shouted, eyes wide like a deer in headlights. "This is mmmmagic!? This can't be really happening!" He seemed like he was ready to run away, but was kept where we was by a mixture of shock, confusion, and curiosity.

"Oh I'm afraid its all very real, as you're about to find out," Redd said grimly as he raised the remote, clicking 'aware swap' once on April and once on Marvin. There was silence in the air for a moment, as the two began to realize what had happened.

"OH GOD, THIS IS WORSE. JUST TURN ME INTO A FROG INSTEAD, PLEASE!" April pleaded from Grossberg's hefty form. Grossberg, for his part, was in total silence.

"Hm, no. Be good and MAYBE I'll give you another body, but for now you stay there as your punishment, and Grossberg stays as you. I really ought to keep a close eye on him AND I need a new secretary, so two birds with one stone, right? I expect to see you bright and early tomorrow, 'Ms. May'. As for you 'Grossberg', you're dismissed. Don't bother coming to see me, I'll call you if I need something, how does that sound?"

Overly satisfied with himself, Redd left the two behind to handle what had just happened to them, heading back to his office with the device.

Who do we follow?
152212221111.title: Shapeshift

1522122211112.content:
April was screaming internally. How could this have happened?! She was in White's body, she was temporarily the president of Blue Corp and had all the power that went with that position, and it was all taken away because she had made the stupid mistake of leaving the remote back at White's office for 'Safe keeping'. Of course, she didn't only blame herself. She also blamed the man whose body she was currently being forced to inhabit. If he hadn't called her out here, then none of this would have happened!

Grossberg was panicking in a similar way, although he wasn't panicking over his own actions. He couldn't believe what had just happened. he had been transported into the body of a young woman and the one responsible for it was Redd White. He couldn't believe it, if he wasn't dreaming right now then that meant that Redd White not only had a large network of blackmail on people, but he now had control of people's bodies! He was invincible, if he couldn't get blackmail on someone, all he would have to do is take their body and create some blackmail.

"You!" April shouted from Grossberg's body and walked over to him "Because of you, my one chance to be in charge was ruined!"

Grossberg was frightened. He felt very vulnerable in April's body and although his own body wasn't the most athletic, he imagined that if April was mad enough she could easily badly hurt him in her body.

"And now...You're going to help me get revenge on White." April said as she finished her walk over to Grossberg.

Grossberg had a bad feeling about this "How?! You saw what happened to that guard! If we tried anything, he could turn us into bugs or something."

"Anything would be better than being in your body." April began "Not that I plan on being turned into a bug. White's just as human as anyone else. The remote is what let's him swap bodies. If we can steal back that remote, then he will be the bug under my foot."

"But how are you planning on doing that?!" Grossberg asked, he had a feeling on what her answer would be and he didn't like it.

"Simple, White loves having his secretaries around, I know that better than anyone else. All you have to do is wait for him to put his guard down and snatch it." April explained her plan.

"And what are you doing while I'm risking my life?!" Grossberg practically shouted, the plan sounded even worse as she said it aloud!

"Nothing, I can't do anything from your body! I wouldn't be allowed anywhere near Blue. Corp., I have no choice to rely on you."

As much as Grossberg wanted to reject April's plan, he knew he didn't have much choice. He was currently stuck in her body and he certainly didn't want to be stuck like this. Not to mention, he didn't want to be working as Redd White's secretary for who knows how long. "Alright, but the second something doesn't go according to plan, I'm backing out."

"Then don't mess up." April gave Grossberg a warning before she began to walk off in the direction of her home, she may have been stuck in Grossberg's body, but she would die before she would sleep at his house.

Grossberg similarly began to walk toward his home. Every step he took in April's body lead to a new, uncomfortable experiance.
1522122211112.title: April or Marvin

choices: Redd goes to see his own body
15222.content:
Redd found himself floating above his own office in a daze. He couldn't feel anything - his own body was standing below him - but he could somehow still see and hear. April May was holding still, looking confused, while his own body was standing without him, seemingly lost in thought.

"Hmmm, why did I call you in here again Ms. May?" Redd's body asked a nervous April May.

"Uh, you said you needed to test something sir?"

Redd's body snapped his fingers, as though in realization, "ah! Yes! The intercom, I wanted to make sure it was connected to your desk properly. That's all, you can go now."

April knew better than to question White, and she gave a nod as she turned and walked out of his office and back into the lobby. She took a seat at her desk, deciding to brush off her boss's weird behavior and get back to work. However, as she reached out for a pen, her hand froze and her eyes seemed to stare off into space, as though in a daze.

Eventually, she seemed to recover, her eyes going wide. She held her hand close to her face in shock, examining her sharp, colored nails with great interest. She pulled herself up from the chair, but nearly fell over due to her heels, seeming unused to balancing on them. "...can't believe it," she muttered as she pulled herself up with her desk. She took, short, wobbly steps as she moved from the desk and into the restroom.

"Aha! It worked!" Redd laughed with April's voice as he examined her face in the mirror. He gave himself a smile and a wink, heart pounding with excitement. "You're the boss Mr. White, anything you say goes!" he had her say. It was really true now though, who could really tell him 'no' when he had this kind of power at his disposal? He put April's hands onto her waist, covered by a short, white skirt, and rubbed them down her legs, finding the sensation of having no leg hair strange in addition to having most of his legs exposed. The skirt didn't really leave much to the imagination, and it was cut do far up April's hips any misstep threatened to show off even more skin than intended.

It was as he heard footsteps outside the restroom that Redd realized it might be a bad place to explore April's body. He gave his new pretty face another glance in the mirror before slowly stepping out of the bathroom and back to April's desk. He was beginning to get some sense of balance back, but just barely. Even if he got used to the heels, April's center of balance was entirely different.

Thankfully, when Redd returned the remote was still there. It barely seemed to cross his mind that he had left it behind as he picked it back up, looking over its settings. Redd wasn't entirely sure that he wanted to leave April's body behind yet. The allure of literally controlling someone was rather intoxicating to him! He had always called the shots; his employees followed his orders and the people he blackmailed did as he said, but this was a step above and beyond. Secretary work was beneath him, however. He wasn't going to waste time scheduling his own meetings or taking his own calls, that was April's job and he wasn't going to do it for her.

"Hmm, well maybe I can get 'Mr. White' to seeing my way," he muttered, arms crossed under April's chest. "I am him after all. If he says April doesn't need to work for a day, then April doesn't need to work for a day."

152222.content:
Redd didn't feel like talking to himself. That was be a bit too eccentrous, even for him. If he didn't want to do that, there were really two options for him. He briefly reconsidered that secretary work. It was a frightible thought, but perhaps there was some enjoyment to be had in it.

But really, he could just leave. Surely Mr. White would understand, even if Mr. White wouldn't see things Redd's way until he returned to his normal body.

So what does he do?

1552.content:
Ini Miney had her life taken away from her nearly a year ago. That incident at the clinic had ruined her life, she would forever be known as the woman who had killed 11 patients. That wasn't the end of her suffering however, the following week she had gotten into her car accident and lost both her sister and her face. For the past year, she had been living as her sister, Mini Miney, she hated it. She hated everything that had happened a year ago, and most of all, she hated the man who she blamed for all of it, Turner Grey.

Ini was going through her daily routine when she suddenly saw a package, where did it come from? She walked over to it and opened it out of curiosity. Inside was what appeared to be a remote and manual. The manual explained that the remote had four functions. 'Aware Swap', 'Unaware Swap', 'Possession', and 'Shapeshift'. The manual described what each of those functions were for. It claimed that the remote was able to swap around bodies and other similar functions, it seemed like complete nonsense.

Ini was about to throw the remote away, but something about it made her want to believe it. Maybe it was the fact that she had been living as her sister and studying the occult for the last year, but the remote didn't seem like the most ridiculous thing in the world. The question now was, what to do with it?

The first thought to come to mind was to use it on Turner Grey. He had ruined her life a year ago, her stealing his would be a fitting punishment. He would stuck in what would be stuck in, as far as he knew, the body of the sister of the girl he drugged and made crash and she would in his body and owner of the clinic she once worked at. This was her chance to turn around her life in a positive way.

but is that really what she wanted to do with it? She could use this remote to completely abandon all aspects of her old life, completely forget everything about herself and become someone completely new. Anything would be better than how she was now.

What did Ini decide to do with the remote?
1552.title: Ini Miney

15531.content:
It was another lonely day for Acro in his small room. He knew the circus was beginning to do well for itself thanks to its new star, "Maximilian Galactica", but it didn't matter a whole lot to him if he couldn't participate. Ever since the incident with the lion, he hadn't been able to walk at all, let alone be an acrobat. The fact that his brother was comatose only worsened his depression. The thoughts of all the other entertainers still going on as though nothing had happened made him almost as angry as it did sad.

As he sat in his room, emotions festering whilst the circus lights flickered in the distance, he heard a sudden rustling from the window. "Money, is that you?" he asked. Sure enough, the circus monkey climbed through the open pane, carrying a small box in its hands. "What'd you take this time?" he asked gently, happy to atleast get some company even if it was a kleptomaniac chimpanzee. The monkey put the box down on his lap and gestured to it, as though telling him to open it.

"Alright alright, I'll look at it," he said reassuringly. Opening the box up, he laid out the device and began reading over the instructions. "Hah! What a lovely thought, body swapping. Would be nice to have my legs back... way back when I could basically fly. Kind of a mean joke if it was meant for me."

Being able to walk would be nice, but it wouldn't solve Acro's problem. He was angry that the whole event was swept under the rug. He knew no one meant for him or his brother to get hurt, but it didn't stop him from just getting more and more upset every time the ringleader's daughter spoke of his brother in such light terms. "He's a star now," she would say, as though she didn't even realize it was her fault.

If this thing worked, he had to wonder where the limitations could be. He'd definitely be able to feel like part of the circus again if he swapped with one of the other entertainers. Heck, he'd able to move around on his own if he so much as shape shifted, right? A part of him quietly wondered what would happen if he used it on someone who was comatose. All the possibilities, for fulfillment, revenge, and even some sort of salvation gave him hope for a second, even if he thought the device was probably fake. "Well, I have nothing to lose, right?" he asked Money, who nodded in a fast motion. "May as well use it; if it doesn't work, then no one's loss."

What kind of person does he decide to test it on first?
15531.title: Acro

155311.content:
As Acro thought about what to use the remote for he heard his door begin to open. He quickly hid the remote under his blanket. Inside came Regina Berry, the daughter of the ringmaster. Ever since the incident Acro had come to resent her. It wasn't as if he could just stay away from her either, he was forced to see her everyday as she was the one who had to bring him his food and take out the trash.

"Here you go Acro! Moe made his signature burgers to celebrate a show well done!" Regina said with her usual happy tone as she placed a burger on a plate on a little table.

Acro wheeled his chair over to the table "Thanks." He said in a deadpan tone. He wasn't the kind of person to show anger in front of other people, however he couldn't force himself to show any other emotion when talking to or about Regina.

"I better go and feed Regant and the other animals. See you tomorrow Acro!" Regina said and began to walk out of the room.

Acro looked at the remote in his lap again. While using the remote to become someone that he resented wasn't his ideal plan, Regina was the only person that he saw on a regular basis, so if he wanted to use the remote on anyone, it would have to be her. He got out the remote as Regina walked. He pressed a button.

What button did he press?
155311.title: An entertainer at the circus

1553111.content:
Acro figured a swap would be the most fitting thing he could use on Regina. If she was the one who had to sit in a chair all the time, then maybe she'd be a bit less jovial about everything. "Hey, Regina," Acro forced himself to say, "could you help me with something real fast?"

She turned around, her face still locked in a smile. "Sure thing Acro! What do you need?"

Acro lifted up the remote, "what would you say if I told you that you could help me walk again, if just for a bit?"

Regina's eyes sparkled, "that'd be lovely! I'd do anything to help you, you know that. What is it?"

Acro forced a smile, "well, I think it'd be better to show you rather than explain it. I don't know how it'll work."

"Well go ahead and use it," she replied, hopping up and down, "I want to see!"

Acro didn't particularly care how she would feel about switching with him, but he at least wanted her initial permission so that she would remain calm. Once he was in her body, he'd figure out a new course of action. He just had to make sure she would sit still for long enough for him to figure out what he would do.

"Just hold still," he said, lifting the remote and pressing....
1553111.title: Aware/Unaware swap

choices: Acro stays at the circus for now
He decides to test the device with his brother
15531111.content:
In a flash, Acro was standing. 'I'm standing!' he realized in shock, looking down at himself. He was dressed in the red outfit of Regina, with her blonde hair floating into the corner of his vision. He reached down, putting his hands over her stocking-clad legs, thrilled to be able to just bend over. "It worked!" he shouted in amazement, putting a hand to his throat as he realized how high pitched his new voice was. He shook his head and glitter fell everywhere.

He then shifted his attention back to his own body, which seemed in a state of shock. "A-acro?" Is that- you?" Regina spoke in a stuttery, stunted manner, taken aback by how deep her voice was. She looked over her arms, now much larger and a deep tan. "I can't feel my legs? What happened?"

Acro noticed the remote had fallen on Regina's lap, covered by a blanket. In a swift motion, he scooped up the device. "We - we switched," he said, going back to a reserved tone that was unusual for Regina. "This was what I was talking about."

"You're... me? But now I can't move," she said, starting to sound a bit worried.

"It's okay, it can be undone," Acro assured her. "I just wanted to... borrow your body. Just to go for a walk. It's been a while since I've been able to take a stroll on my own, you know?"

Regaining her composure, Regina gave a smile from Acro's body. "Oh! Uh, yeah. I understand and I'm glad to help! Just, uh, be careful with it, and be sure to come back! The lions need me after all."

"Sure thing," Acro said to Regina as he turned to walk away, "thanks for understanding." He could feel Regina's heart pounding as he left the building, thrilled to feel free. He didn't particularly care that he was a girl, he had no intention of going back to his own body any time soon. He could maybe consider taking a new one down the road, but for now, Regina could stay as him. As he walked, he couldn't help but pat down his new legs, thrilled to have some sort of sensations below the waist. Regina definitely felt weaker than his old body in its prime, but the fact that he had one that could move around at all was a godsend.

Now he just had to figure out what to do with it. He didn't have any interest in being near the lions, so that was checked off the list. Part of him wanted to walk back around the circus and explore the place from his new perspective after so much time away. He could check out Regina's room if he so pleased and acquaint himself with his new body, maybe try to relive his acrobat days and see how athletic she was, or he could use the device and try to find a new body that was more to his liking. Alternatively, a thought came to him. His brother was in a coma, but it was because of an animal attack. Maybe if he had a new body... he'd be okay? It was a dark thought, since someone else would be subjected to a coma, but surely Acro could find someone deserving of such a fate. Looking down at himself, he realized Regina was already a candidate in his mind, as she caused the accident anyways.
15531111.title: Aware Swap

155311112.content:
Acro made his way to the exit of the circus, he had one goal in mind right now. Every since the accident, Bat had been in a coma, Acro couldn't accept this. Of all people, why did it have to be his brother that had to end up like that? Every since the accident, Acro prayed everyday for a miracle to awaken his brother, now he had one in his hand. With this, he could wake his brother up. His brother's body may have been damaged, but if he had a different body maybe he would wake up?

Acro left the circus, normally he would need someone's assistance to go anywhere and even then there weren't many places he could go, but now that he had Regina's body, he could go anywhere he wanted! The act of walking itself was amazing to Acro after all that time in the wheelchair. As he walked toward the hospital, Acro was tempted to run, just to experience the feeling of doing so again. He decided against it though, Regina's boots were clearly not suitable for running.

When he got to the hospital he was thankful that visiting hours weren't over yet. He asked to see Sean Dingling and was escorted to the room his brother was in. Not that he would have needed to be escorted, after all the times he had visited Bat in his own body, he had practically memorized the layout of this hospital.

Once in the room, Acro looked at Bat's body. Every time he saw him like this, he would get just as sad as he did the first time he saw him like this. If this worked, he would never have to see him like this again. Acro opted to use the Shapeshift button on Bat. Either of the swap buttons would theoretically put someone else in the coma in Bat's place. Acro considered doing that if the Shapeshift didn't work. He would gladly put Regina into an eternal sleep if it meant Bat would wake up

He opted not to use Possession because he didn't want to freak Bat out by putting him in some kind of ghost-like state immediately after he had been in a coma. Plus, there was no one in the immediate area that Bat could possess other than Acro, and Acro didn't want to be possessed and be unable to explain anything about what happened to Bat.

Acro pointed the remote at himself and hit the shapeshift button, registering Regina's form in the remote. He then pointed the remote at Bat and pressed the same button, in a few moments, Bat's body morphed into an exact copy of Regina's. Acro closed his eyes and prayed that Bat would wake up.

Did he?

So instead of using a swap or possession function, he pointed the device at Regina's back clicked "Shapeshift", which prompted a little light to blip on the device just as Regina closed the door. Acro waited for a little while, looking down from his window as Regina walked away to where they kept the tigers. Once he was sure he was secluded again, he decided to put the device to the test.

He could sense by the new shape of his body and all his sensations that it worked: he was Regina.

Slowly, Acro put his hands on either side of the chair, and pushed himself up. He stumbled, partially due to his new center of balance but also due to being crippled for so long, but managed to hold himself up by the window sill. He took a few clumsy steps, but to his amazement, he could walk. He swung a leg outward, a flourish of glitter flying about him, and gave a laugh of joy, not even caring that it was Regina's voice. "It worked! I'm her!" Now he could go anywhere! For a moment, he didn't feel like he had any limitations. With this device nothing could go wrong for him.

It'd be a while before Regina came back to check on him anyways; no one would miss him until tomorrow morning most likely.
15531122.title: Shapeshift
